story:
Short Summary

I’m Dr. Daniel Howard, CEO of Quantum Energy Consultants (www.quantum-ec.com).  We’re launching this campaign to make it undeniably clear how a clean energy and climate plan for America is far, far better for the economy, environment and quality of life.  

While President Trump is promising better economic growth with his fossil fuel energy plan, this project will uncover the trillions of dollars of hidden environmental and health costs in Trump's plan, showing how they will be devastating to the planet and the economy.  At the same time, Biden’s Clean Energy and Climate Plan is being proposed as a net cost to taxpayers, yet there are trillions of dollars of hidden benefits in Biden's plan that this project will reveal, showing how it is a triple win for the environment, economy and quality of life.

Our proprietary Total Cost Energy Model is the first energy model to assess a full spectrum of economic, environmental and health costs and benefits and express them in dollar amounts, making it easy for everyone to understand.

The first $25k of funding will go towards completing the project and broadcasting results before the election.  Every dollar contributed beyond that will go directly towards getting voters this key missing information before they hit the polls and implementing a clean energy and climate plan for America.

 

What We Need & What You Get

With your backing, we will apply our Total Cost Energy Model to uncover the trillions of dollars of hidden costs in Trump’s dirty fossil fuel energy plan as well as the trillions of dollars of hidden benefits in Biden’s clean energy plan.  

How it works:

Step 1.  We input Trump's energy plan and Biden's energy plan into our Total Cost Energy Model

Step 2.  We purchase the necessary input data to calculate the economic, environmental and health impacts

Step 3.  We run our Total Cost Energy Model for Trump's plan and Biden's plan

Step 4.  The Total Cost Energy Model outputs a full picture of the economic, environmental and health costs and benefits for both Trump's plan and Biden's plan

Step 5.  We broadcast the results widely so voters have the facts before they go to the polls

We’ve set everything up for the project.  Your support will enable us to purchase the data, complete the project and publicize the results before the election.  

As a thank you, you will receive a copy of our new Global and Local Sustainability eBook on what you can do to move the sustainability needle.  You'll also receive a Project Results Packet, which you can share to shine light on the benefits of a clean energy and climate plan for America.

 

The Impact

Every dollar you contribute will go directly towards bringing this key missing information to voters and implementing a clean energy and climate plan for America.

We will be broadcasting our results through multiple media channels, including press releases, targeted digital advertising and non-profit partnerships.  Also, project supporters will receive a Project Results Packet that they can share to help spread the word.

Thank you so much for supporting our campaign.  Know that your support will be playing an active role in creating a regenerative future that promotes long-term growth, saves lives and the planet.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our timeline is tight! We will purchase the data as soon as our funding goal is hit, run the models, and then begin publicizing this key missing information asap.  We need to raise a minimum of $25k to make this happen, $50k will allow us to extend our reach, and above $100k will allow us to have widespread engagement with swing voters and politicians.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Click share on our Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and LinkedIn posts
Send this campaign to people who could be interested
Make introductions to environmental press/journalists, donors and potential partners

More info: www.quantum-ec.com


Thank you, thank you, thank you!

Thank you, thank you, thank you!

story:
Better than diamonds

Using the latest groundbreaking technology, ApolloGem stones test positively as diamonds through a diamond selector and tester. 

Global Gemological Research Institute

All our stones go through The Global Gemological Research Institute which is the standard of excellence in gemstones services worldwide. The GRI provide a fair scientific assessment on each stone which comes with a serial number and full report certificate of authenticity that is recognized and trusted by the industry.

If you wish to query your certificate you are welcome to go to the GRI's website and type in the serial number of your gem onto the online database. 

Conflict diamonds ruin lives

Diamonds have been in the spotlight recently since we have become aware of the controversy surrounding it. From the increasing environmental disregard to the blatant human rights violations, it becomes apparent that conflict diamonds ruin the lives of many, as well as being responsible for the destruction of natural habitats and aiding in the rapid deterioration of our planet.

If you are looking for an eco-friendly, cruelty free, affordable alternative then we have got the solution for you! 

Introducing ApolloGem 

At ApolloGem we have formulated a lab-grown diamond made from Silicon Carbon using environmentally friendly technology, taking us one step closer to reducing our environmental impact on the earth. Our stones are proven to have a higher reflective index, specular glass and dispersion index making our stones more brilliant and have more sparkle then any natural growing diamond.

At Apollogem we have 2 colour options:

  • DE colour -Apollo Infinity
  • GH colour- Apollo Eternity 

​Meaning that our stones reach a colourless to near colourless perfection both achieving a clarity of VVS1!

VVS1 or very very slightly included, represents the top tier grades on the diamond clarity scale. It falls under the premium range of diamonds. These diamonds are the  closest thing to perfection and make up less than 1 % of the worlds diamonds. The inclusions on this grade are only visible through 10x magnification and are not visible with the naked eye making this grade of gem one of the purest of its kind.

ApolloGems are the second hardest stones in the world with the  hardness of 9.5 making it completely scratch and chip resistant! We are so confident in our product that all our stones carry a lifetime guarantee! 

ApolloGem compared to the diamond has a higher reflective index, specular gloss and dispersion index making ApolloGem the most vibrant, clear and brilliant gem on the market!

Cut

We use the same process used to cut normal diamonds so you can get the exact shape and look that you need. ApolloGem have a wide variety of cuts and sizes. On Indiegogo, we are offering backers 5 types of cuts, namely: round, oval, pear, cushion and emerald. If it is something specific you are looking for we have a wide variety to choose at a backers discount! Just get in contact with us at info@apollogem.com and we will get back to you promptly.  

We are product ready and offer and a 14 day worldwide delivery guarantee!

Our labs are currently working on bringing new hues to the market and we are happy to present them next month. 

Our next project

 We will also be presenting two jewelry collections 'Yes' and 'For You' using white gold 18 carat and platinum. Please follow us on our social media to get more updates on our exciting new project! Backers will get emailed updates. 

Our Team

Our team consists of group of trusted, qualified gemologists who have been in the industry for more than 20 years. We are a workforce that thrives off passion and professionalism. If you have any queries surrounding your dream ApolloGem stone you can contact us at info@apollogem.com and we will get back to you with expert advice that suits your needs. 

 Backers donation

We wish to build our business and would greatly appreciate any support in boosting our campaign. Backers who donate $5 or less get a personalized email, and backers who donate $20 dollars or more will receive a personalized postcard from the ApolloGem team!

With the current state that the world is in it is our duty now more then ever to act responsibly surrounding the betterment of the planet, and improve our way of living by creating sustainable alternatives.

Help us save the Earth.

story:
Background:

Microplastics are polluting our environment and endangering our health!

Every day, there are media reports about plastic waste polluting our oceans. Most people immediately think of the Great Pacific Garbage Patch and starved seabirds with stomachs full of plastic particles. However, one aspect is almost completely ignored: a significant amount of microplastics in our streams, rivers, lakes, and seas is released into the environment through our wastewater.

 

 

The danger is that microplastics are barely visible to the naked eye and thus represent an invisible threat. Due to their chemical properties, they can collect pollutants and toxins, hormones, drug residues, and also cancer-causing substances from the wastewater on their surface, from which they can also release these substances to humans, animals, and plants.

Much of the microplastics come from our daily lives. Sources are synthetic textiles which release up to 2000 fibers per washing cycle, tire abrasion which gets washed into the sewer by the rain, and scrub and abrasive particles which are added to cosmetics and cleaners.

Wastewater treatment plants are unable to filter microplastic particles from our wastewater. As a result, the particles, together with the adhering toxins and pollutants, reach our environment, our food chain, and the human body.

The ECOFARIO technology will change that!

 

 

The Problem:

The fundamental problem with microplastics is its size. The particles are so small (down to the nanometer scale) that they are almost invisible to the naked eye. As a result, they are distributed everywhere around the globe. Scientists have found microplastic particles even in the most remote regions of the earth, e.g. in the Antarctic and in mountain lakes of Mongolia.

Another problem resulting from the chemical nature of microplastic particles is that they can adsorb on their surface countless toxins and pollutants, e.g. drug residues, hormones or cancer-causing substances.

  

 

These pollutants then pass through the food chain, first of all into our flora and fauna and then into the human body. In marine wildlife, microplastics can be found in mussels, fish and even in freshwater plankton, one of the major food sources of many freshwater fish. Even in our food, microplastics can be found everywhere. Examples are beer, honey, and bottled water. Thus, it is not surprising that scientists can even detect microplastics in the human body.

This message is alarming!

The biggest problem with this is that the wastewater treatment processes are currently not designed to filter out such small particles. Thus, these particles, together with the adhering toxins and pollutants, can enter the environment almost unhindered. Although established technologies such as micro-, ultra- or nanofiltration could filter extremely small particles out of water, these technologies are less suitable for the use in wastewater treatment plants due to the use of a filter medium, resulting in limited flow rates and very high energy consumption.

 

The Solution:

Of course, the ultimate solution to this problem would be the complete abandonment of plastic of any kind. Since this solution is utopian, unfortunately, we must prevent the microplastic particles from entering our water cycle.

This is where the ECOFARIO technology comes into play:

After entering our High-G Separators, the polluted water is forced into heavy rotation (up to 2000 G). Due to these extremely high G-forces, we are able to separate the microplastic particles from the wastewater. 

  

 

Our patented ECOFARIO technology is based on the hydrocyclone principle and has been modified by us in such a way that it can even separate particles like microplastics, which differ only minimally from water in terms of their density. 

  

 

The microplastic particles filtered out of the wastewater, together with the adhering toxins and pollutants, are then put into thermal recycling. This is the only way that the particles, and above all the toxins and pollutants, can never get into the environment again.

The underlying ECOFARIO effect will also allow us to use our technology in many more fields of application. These are for example separating oil from water after oil disasters or filtering powder coat particles from industrial paint shop wash waters.

 

Who We Are:

 

We are a team of four entrepreneurs and friends from the Munich area in Bavaria, Southern Germany. Each of us has a different vocational background which can be perfectly combined to realize our common goals.

Since we are all very close to nature and because water has always been of high importance to our way of life, we feel a very specific motivation to keep our planet as clean as possible.

  

 

To support us, just click

 

If you want to have additional information, you can visit our website www.ecofario.eco, contact us directly at info@ecofario.eco, or follow us on

Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Youtube, LinkedIn

story:
Charge your devices and relax like never before

 

 

The world is changing, and renewable, solar energy plays a huge part in meeting our global energy needs.  Here at Solar furniture we are proud to showcase our latest ‘must have’ accessory for your outdoor entertainment – our range of Solar Sun Lounges.

 

Introducing the Solar Sun Lounge Range.

 

Designed for your comfort and convenience, our solar sun lounge is the perfect pool and garden furniture allowing you to secure and charge your devices - Iphone / IPAD / Tablet / Laptop / Camping Fridge, etc.

 

 

What does the Solar Sun Lounge Do ?

 

Never before has our lifestyle balance been more important.  With this, comes an ever increasing demand to use our mobile devices at home, at the office and on holidays which constantly need charging and powering.

We have integrated solar power into our sun lounges, enabling all the functions on the lounge to run entirely from the built-in solar panel.

 

With ultra modern designs our solar sun lounges come with standard features including waterproof dual USB ports and 12v power outlet as standard.

Simply plug in and watch that movie on your tablet or portable device with no concern about battery life!

 

 

Our lounges feature slide-out accessories for your food and drinks, and a built-in lockable foot locker allowing you to secure your valuables should you need to, or to truly enjoy your day outdoors try filling the locker with ice and your favorite beverages.  

 

 

 

Now, we know that not everyone wants to lie in the hot sun, but you still want to enjoy the outdoors right?  Well, working with our partners, we are able to provide you with our state of the art solar panel technology, so you can enjoy the benefits of solar power sitting in the shade of a tree, under an umbrella, or even on your deck.    There is no need to be in the direct sunlight.

 

How do I keep my valuable safe in the Locker ?

We have built a lockable foot locker into the foot of the lounge to allow you to lock away your valuables if you need to walk away from the lounge for a time ( swimming, bathroom, etc).  Simply place all your items in the locker then lock with the key.

 

 

We have included this fantastic silicon wrist band which allows you to store the key in the back of it so you wont lose it when swimming or walking around - No need to worry pockets or what to do with the key!

 

 

- Silicon wrist bands shown in Blue and Clear - choice of colours available

 

More Of The Range Of Designs:

 

Made from commercial grade aluminum our Solar Sun Lounges are designed to last which is why we offer a full 5-year warranty.   The Solar Sun Lounges are available in 6 designs and powder coated in colors to match your own personal style.  

Solar Sun Lounge Style 1 - shown in Blue

 

 

Solar Sun Lounge Style 3 - shown in Orange

 

 

 

Solar Sun Lounge Style 5 - shown in Purple

Solar Sun Lounge Style 6 - shown in Black

 

Watch the Explainer Video

 

 

The Team

 

The team as it stands right now consists of just me -  David, the owner and founder.

 

 

My business model is simple.  I prefer to outsource the work I need done to experts in their fields, people that I cannot afford to employ ( right now ) and who have all the tools at they need at their disposable to get the job done.

This allows me to keep costs down and ensure that the people involved in the process are professional and just as passionate about the product as I am.

I work very closely with the manufacturers of all parts and components and test everything myself at my home office workshop before they are put into the products at the factory.

 

To ensure things work and do what they need to do, here are my minions making sure it all works.

 

 

 

The Future

 

Whats more, we guarantee that with all new features and technology additions we are working on, you will be able to retrofit them to your existing lounge easily including:

  • Electric Recline - yes, just push the button and effortlessly recline / incline into the PERFECT position - AVAILABLE APRIL 2017 ( here's a sneak peak)

 

  • Sun shade -  Complete with 2 extra solar panels built in for even more power and ..... wait for it ....  a fold down tablet holder, so you are able to lay back in the shade and watch your favourite TV show / movie hands free!  - AVAILABLE MAY 2017 (stretch goal accessory)

 

Why Order Now ?

 

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Solar Sun Lounges off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign.

 

How can I back this Campaign ?

 

To back our campaign is easy, simply click the 'Back It'  button at the top right of the page to donate any amount you like.

Or, choose from one of our Perks down the right side of your screen and follow the payment instructions.

It's that Easy !    And will make a world of difference.

 

Commercial Opportunities

 

We believe that our range of Solar Sun Lounges can give your resort / hotel / hostel or even your cruise line a real point of difference.

We have a complete business model and plan we would be happy to share with any interested owners / GM's / etc, from relevant commercial markets.  

Please contact us directly to discuss this is in more detail.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing this campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post this campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. We want to spread the word far and wide about the solar furniture revolution.

Every contribution makes a difference and puts us one step closer to realizing our vision.

We appreciate your support and thank you for your contribution and are so pleased to have you join our team.

 

Help Out By Sharing with Friends.

Have a friend who needs this? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit the button below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.
Let's do this.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions?

Do you have a question ?   Please contact us with any questions and we will list them all here as we go to help others.

Here are a few common ones:

Can I get a different color cushion to the legs ?

A:  Yes, You can order any design in any of the colors and if you wish to have a different color cushion, just let us know when ordering.  Example, you might like Black supports with a white cushion.

When will I get my Solar Sun Lounge?

A:  First major production run is due to commence beginning April and will take approximately 3 weeks to complete and ship your product.  You will have them in plenty of time for summer!

Will I be able to easily fit optional features later if I want to ?

A:  Yes absolutely.  We know that not everyone wants to buy all the bells and whistles straight up, so we guarantee that if you decide to purchase an electric recline kit, or sun shade or any other optional feature we release, they will be very quick and easy for you to DIY attach.   We will also have full range of instructional videos on our Youtube channel you can watch if you need extra help.

 

THANKS !

Now, we know that not everyone wants to lie in the hot sun, but you still want to enjoy the outdoors right?  Well, working with our partners, we are able to provide you with our state of the art solar panel technology, so you can enjoy the benefits of solar power sitting in the shade of a tree, under an umbrella, or even on your deck.    There is no need to be in the direct sunlight.

 
How do I keep my valuable safe in the Locker ?
We have built a lockable foot locker into the foot of the lounge to allow you to lock away your valuables if you need to walk away from the lounge for a time ( swimming, bathroom, etc).  Simply place all your items in the locker then lock with the key.
 

 
We have included this fantastic silicon wrist band which allows you to store the key in the back of it so you wont lose it when swimming or walking around - No need to worry pockets or what to do with the key!
 

 

- Silicon wrist bands shown in Blue and Clear - choice of colours available
 
More Of The Range Of Designs:
 
Made from commercial grade aluminum our Solar Sun Lounges are designed to last which is why we offer a full 5-year warranty.   The Solar Sun Lounges are available in 6 designs and powder coated in colors to match your own personal style.  

Solar Sun Lounge Style 1 - shown in Blue
 
 

Solar Sun Lounge Style 3 - shown in Orange
 
 
 

Solar Sun Lounge Style 5 - shown in Purple

Solar Sun Lounge Style 6 - shown in Black
 
Watch the Explainer Video
 

 
The Team
 
The team as it stands right now consists of just me -  David, the owner and founder.
 

 
My business model is simple.  I prefer to outsource the work I need done to experts in their fields, people that I cannot afford to employ ( right now ) and who have all the tools at they need at their disposable to get the job done.
This allows me to keep costs down and ensure that the people involved in the process are professional and just as passionate about the product as I am.
I work very closely with the manufacturers of all parts and components and test everything myself at my home office workshop before they are put into the products at the factory.
 
To ensure things work and do what they need to do, here are my minions making sure it all works.
 

 

 
The Future
 
Whats more, we guarantee that with all new features and technology additions we are working on, you will be able to retrofit them to your existing lounge easily including:
Electric Recline - yes, just push the button and effortlessly recline / incline into the PERFECT position - AVAILABLE APRIL 2017 ( here's a sneak peak)

 
Sun shade -  Complete with 2 extra solar panels built in for even more power and ..... wait for it ....  a fold down tablet holder, so you are able to lay back in the shade and watch your favourite TV show / movie hands free!  - AVAILABLE MAY 2017 (stretch goal accessory)
 
Why Order Now ?
 

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Solar Sun Lounges off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign.
 
How can I back this Campaign ?
 
To back our campaign is easy, simply click the 'Back It'  button at the top right of the page to donate any amount you like.
Or, choose from one of our Perks down the right side of your screen and follow the payment instructions.
It's that Easy !    And will make a world of difference.
 
Commercial Opportunities
 
We believe that our range of Solar Sun Lounges can give your resort / hotel / hostel or even your cruise line a real point of difference.
We have a complete business model and plan we would be happy to share with any interested owners / GM's / etc, from relevant commercial markets.  
Please contact us directly to discuss this is in more detail.
 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
 
Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing this campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post this campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. We want to spread the word far and wide about the solar furniture revolution.
Every contribution makes a difference and puts us one step closer to realizing our vision.
We appreciate your support and thank you for your contribution and are so pleased to have you join our team.
 
Help Out By Sharing with Friends.
Have a friend who needs this? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit the button below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.Let's do this.
 

 
Frequently Asked Questions?
Do you have a question ?   Please contact us with any questions and we will list them all here as we go to help others.
Here are a few common ones:
Can I get a different color cushion to the legs ?
A:  Yes, You can order any design in any of the colors and if you wish to have a different color cushion, just let us know when ordering.  Example, you might like Black supports with a white cushion.
When will I get my Solar Sun Lounge?
A:  First major production run is due to commence beginning April and will take approximately 3 weeks to complete and ship your product.  You will have them in plenty of time for summer!
Will I be able to easily fit optional features later if I want to ?
A:  Yes absolutely.  We know that not everyone wants to buy all the bells and whistles straight up, so we guarantee that if you decide to purchase an electric recline kit, or sun shade or any other optional feature we release, they will be very quick and easy for you to DIY attach.   We will also have full range of instructional videos on our Youtube channel you can watch if you need extra help.
 
THANKS !

story:
Short Summary

I've been in the construction industry as a design engineer for the past 14 years and have been part of large-scale infrastructure projects which help to create sustainable living in cities. I have always been interested in improving lives and protecting our planet. I always felt renewable energy is the future but never found a suitable source to make a substantial positive impact to climate change. When I discovered and learnt about Geothermal Energy and its currently untapped potential, I knew this is the energy source that will be a game changer. Therefore, I started UNCHARTED POWER PTE LTD to further Geothermal Development.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are working towards building Geothermal Power Plants to achieve a Fossil Fuel Free Future in Asia. Our first project will be in Myanmar where we have the Myanmar Government's support and we have submitted our proposals for approval.

We are seeking support to fund us in this interim period. We are seeking SGD$200,000 which will be for carrying out Stage 1 Pre-Feasibility tests and studies to select area within the potential site for the next stage detailed testing. Money from your support will go towards:

  1. To obtain and testing of water and ground samples from the area
  2. Carrying out chemical analysis of the samples
  3. Ground modeling to identify the site and planning for further detailed tests

 

The Impact

Today, more than 55% of the global energy sources are still fossil fuels which are harmful to our environment and are limited. We need to find ways to replace fossil fuels.

 

At UNCHARTED POWER PTE LTD, we believe Geothermal Energy have the sufficient and consistent capacity to replace fossil fuels. We are working to further Geothermal Development to realize  a Fossil Fuel Free Future.

 

Your contributions will allow us to take the first concrete steps towards a Geothermal Power Plant in Myanmar to provide much needed electricity. We will use this as our pilot project for more future Geothermal Power Plants in Asia.

 

Risks & Challenges

Presently Geothermal Energy Exploration is not the most accurate which results in high risk and capital cost when selecting the plant sites. Geothermal Energy Exploitation can also be better understood to improve efficiency and safety during the operational phase.  

At UNCHARTED POWER PTE LTD, we seek to collaborate with industry and academic experts to research and improve methods for Geothermal Exploration and Exploitation. We have already in-principle agreements with scientists for collaboration and we intend to use our proposed pilot project in Myanmar as the research site.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Ultimately the mission for UNCHARTED POWER PTE LTD is to replace fossil fuels for power generation. You can help to spread the word and join the movement to help create this change. We need active steps towards climate change to create a cleaner, sustainable future for the next generation.

story:
Our Mission                                                                                                                                                                 UEE exists for one simple reason, to guarantee a cleaner and healthier world today. Our purpose is to create the technologies, systems and education required to end the world's waste issues for good.

NOTE: WE ARE BEYOND THE CONCEPT PHASE. And, because of our inability to showcase video footage, from the prior systems sold to clients by our partner Biodiverse Energies, LLC, we are unable to declare that we are in the prototype or manufacturing phase here on Indiegogo. Biodiverse Energies is now working exclusively with United Earth Energy and together we are focused on bringing this technology to every region on Earth.



Social Challenge
One of the horrible atrocities that our planet faces is the ever-expanding trash mountains and islands that are developing, on our land and in our oceans, due to human waste. Humankind creates an exponentially increasing supply of trash (i.e., consumables, packaging, waste tires, organic matter etc.). Our cities and towns all have landfills that no one wants in their community; these landfills continue to spread and pollute our atmosphere, water supplies and environments.

In the developed world, we either stick our trash in landfills, which creates environmental hazards, or ship it away for other less socio-economically fortunate communities to deal with. Countries like China are closing their doors to receive imported trash. Shipping all that trash, along with intentional dumping, has allowed hundreds of billions of pounds of garbage to find its way into our oceans which is killing marine life and entire bio-systems. Our oceans are on the verge of a great extinction and its predicted there will be more plastic than fish in the oceans by 2050.

The inability to deal with this issue has created a global crisis situation and there has been no viable scalable solution for remediation of this serious issue... until now.

Imagine a company and community devoted to eliminating our collective waste issue while producing energy, water and reusable by-products as a result of cleaning our world up! 

Our Vision 
Our vision is to alleviate the world's garbage, landfill and ocean waste issues. We will achieve this by creating the most effective, affordable, and efficient waste-to-energy systems in the world. We are not talking about relocating the trash, we are talking about transforming and repurposing nearly all of it into useful renewable by-products.We are the first in the world to make biomass and pyrolysis systems that are mobile; this allows for quick and easy deployment in places such as disaster areas, hazardous sites, remote communities with waste issues, on ships to clean ocean trash islands and in agricultural zones dealing with animal waste issues.

Our systems are designed for scalability and modular development; they are built to be easily transportable, and usable nearly anywhere in the world. Our systems are customizable based on the needs of each specific community, client and situation.

Our vision is centered around social benefit impact; whenever able, we will provide use of our mobile systems as a service for areas in distress. At United Earth Energy (UEE), we believe in guaranteeing a cleaner, healthier world by producing green renewable by-products, for energy independence, from the waste humankind collectively generates every day. 

We will track and showcase the metrics of how many hundreds of millions of pounds of waste materials our systems prevent from going into, or reclaim from, landfills. We will also track the data for how many millions of gallons of clean fuels are produced as a by-product of reclaiming this waste and how many communities and bioregions we clean-up.​​

This is the basis for our "sustainability as a business." We believe in this ethos so much, that beyond our own philanthropic projects, we commit a minimum of 5% of all our organizational proceeds to our foundational partners focused on wildlife preservation, ocean restoration initiatives and food sustainability.                                                                                                                                               

How does it work?
Our installation facilities consist of two major components: Resource Recovery Centers and Biomass Waste-to-Renewable Material Production Centers.

All Municipal Solid Waste (MSW), along with tires, organic waste etc, will first go to Resource Recovery Centers where metals, glass, concrete and certain plastics will be sorted out and recycled. The remainder of the MSW will be shredded and sent to our Waste-to-Renewable Material Production Center.

Utilizing a proprietary 3-stage gasification technology, that is unique to U.E.E and BioDiverse Energy LLC, waste will be converted to a variety of useful carbon-based energy products. All of the recyclables will be turned into new green Renewable products such as Bio-diesel, Acetylene, Activated Carbon, Synthetic Coal, Fertilizer, and more. All your waste can now be reused and recycled, and your landfills significantly reduced with the long-term goal of becoming reclaimed and remediated as useful/usable property.

United Earth Energy will take fuel produced from these plants to run electrical generators and produce renewable clean by-products to be sold back to each community at a rate below market value. The sale of the renewable byproducts allows United Earthy Energy and BioDiverse Energy to provide these Biomass Waste Recovery Centers at low cost for each of the communities, cities and countries we serve.

Benefits of Biomass
Biomass is all non-fossil organic materials that have intrinsic carbon content. They include all water and land-based vegetation and trees, virgin biomass, and all waste biomass such as municipal solid waste (MSW), municipal bio-solids (sewage) and animal wastes (manures), forestry and agricultural residues, and certain types of industrial wastes. Unlike fossil fuels, biomass is renewable and sustainable. Renewable in the sense that only a short period of time is needed to replace that which is used as an energy resource. Sustainable through naturally occurring growth cycles, or through a well-managed and coordinated regional bio-waste, agricultural waste and industrial waste strategy. Coupled with a comprehensive strategy, biomass resource solutions address many of our nation's environmental concerns while offering capability to address many of the same concerns facing communities worldwide.

We understand that a comprehensive national policy must meet the public's current and future needs for energy, environmental quality, national security, and a healthy economy, policy makers are beginning to recognize the costs and benefits associated with these public needs. Our nation's governors' recently submitted their support for a national energy policy based on ten principles. Principles that must incorporate a strategy for using renewable and sustainable biomass resources.

What is our target market?
Our clients are governments and enterprises in the private sector that are focused on social impact, clean energy systems, and/or waste remediation solutions. We will shipping, and eventually building, our systems around the world. Our current primary areas of focus, based on existing client requests, are the: United States, Ireland, England, Singapore and the Caribbean.

We understand the range of waste challenges our clients face and have built a model which is adaptable to meet each client's unique goals, while exceeding all EPA regulatory goals and standards.

Environmental Impact Goals...

We have a list of audacious goals that fuels our passion for bringing UEE to the world in a big way. Our commitment is to clean up the collective waste we have generated as a species over the past century. As our business grows, and we continue to build systems for clients around the world, we will be setting aside substantial funds to eliminate certain vital issues affecting us all.

Our first major goal is to partner our fund with the UN, along with aligned government agencies and private enterprises, to bring a quick and thorough solution to one of the most pressing waste issues humankind faces... cleaning up the world's oceans! Yes, we intend to END TRASH ISLANDS in our oceans. Our first objective is to remove the Great Pacific Garbage Patch (largest of the trash islands). Depending upon partnership support, we know that our technology can clean the oceans over the next 3-5 years. Our goal is to have all of the islands of trash completely cleaned up well within the next decade. We are not talking about relocating the trash, we are talking about transforming and repurposing nearly all of it into useful renewable by-products.

 

Community Funding                                                                                                                                                      
We have already raised $500k from friends and family and completed approximately 90% of our demo system and facility in Texas.. We require an additional $400k to complete our system while covering some vital engineering costs and basic operating expenses. So, we are now opening up to the larger community to invite assistance and collaboration in bringing this proven dream to life, after over a decade of testing and improving this technology, for the benefit of both our individual wellbeing and shared planetary experience.

With your generous donations and contributions, we will be able to finalize our demo site. In doing so, we will be able to provide the means necessary for state and federal agencies, such as the Texas Commission of Environmental Quality and the EPA, to verify our zero pollution claim of capability; this will also allow our clients the ability to come view a working system.

We will complete development of our first self-managed system within 30 days of raising these funds. At our demo site, we will be transforming a 5,000,000 tire mono-fill into a waste-free and wholly remediated land.  We chose tires for demonstration site because these are one of the most difficult types of waste to transform. After tires, we will be modeling our ability to transform, without pollution, plastics into energy and clean byproducts.

When given the opportunity to make a difference, our company will be able to provide the products and services that will eventually eliminate landfills globally, reduce carbon emissions and support the alleviation of our global waste problem.
     

Support a Cleaner & Healthier World for Us All! 

How much is clean air, water and land worth?

How much do we all wish to explore our rich natural world with our loved ones before it is one giant landfill?

We invite you to reach into you hearts and feel into what a trash-free life is worth and what you are able to offer to support this vision for a cleaner world.... today.

We welcome all donations as every single dollar empowers our capacity to better serve you and  communities around the world.

Imagine... just 20,000 people contributing $20 to this mission will raise all the required funds to finish our demo system. The same is true of 4000 people contributing $100 each.

Truly unable to make a donation? You can provide invaluable support by sharing our story, and this campaign link, with your family, friends and communities. 

Let's join together to share this vision for a clean world, with as many people as possible, and co-create a reality where the idea of trash doesn't exist anymore.

From all of us here at UEE, Thank you! 

Sincerely, 

Randy & Cody Jacot and the UEE Family

Connect with us here and at www.UnitedEarthEnergy.com

You can provide invaluable support by sharing our story, and this campaign link, with your family, friends and communities. Let's join together to share this vision for a clean world, with as many people as possible, and co-create a reality where the idea of trash doesn't exist anymore.From all of us here at UEE, Thank you! Sincerely, Randy & Cody Jacot and the UEE FamilyConnect with us here and at www.UnitedEarthEnergy.com

story:
We are running out of fresh water all over the world. That's a fact. 

We need a new source of water that doesn't rely on plastic bottles or wells, since wells are drying up or being poised, and plastic bottles are bad for the environment and are expensive to ship and make. Our product makes fresh water for drinking or farming from the air for places that don't have access to fresh water, but do have access to electricity. 

 

Introducing the DG-10, the world's first Bluetooth-controlled atmospheric water generator. This small machine can generate up to 10 gallons of fresh water from air every day simply by condensing the invisible water vapor all around us, filtering it, and dispensing it for collection and consumption.

The mobile app we developed lets you set how much water is made at a time and at what humidity levels the machine should run at for efficiency and indoor atmosphere control.  It also records temperature and humidity to monitor every gallon produced for the life of the machine. As a result, the increased efficiencies can empower farmers to optimize the climate to ensure top quality crops, especially for those horticulturalists who grow indoors.

 

 

 

Use-Cases

Reuben's Journey

My passion for making water out of air began 4 years ago when my parents had their water rights threatened by the State of California due to the drought. I was living near Venice Beach and woke up every day to incredible amounts of dew – which led to my lightbulb moment. Why not make a machine that could capture that dew water directly from the air?

 

I started work right away with a humble sheet of tin foil and a pane of glass but, since inventing has been a hobby of mine since childhood, that quickly escalated. Fast forward to today and I feel like I have really tapped into something that can make a real-world impact – plus it was just great fun and challenging to work on.

 

After 4 years, I had learned a ton about condensation, thermodynamics, farming, geometry, the history of water generators, potential markets, the world water crisis, and so much more. I built different machines to fit different market niches and experimented with Peltier devices, solid and deliquescent desiccants, ultrasonic vibrators, and compressors.  But I kept coming back to my parents’ initial concerns with simply watering their olive trees.

 

As agriculture is the main user of water (over 70% of the water in California used for farming, and 69% globally), we realized we could make the greatest impact by reducing the amount of water farmers draw from an outside system. So that became our goal for the DG-10: a machine that made fresh water right where it's needed, helping farmers grow crops by recapturing the vapor their plants let go of and sending it back to their roots. It’s a process we call Water Neutral Farming.

The Hardware

The DG-10 will be manufactured with NSF-approved parts and a replaceable 6-stage internal filtration system using a sediment, granular activated carbon, CTO, RO Membrane, Post Carbon, and UV light to purify the water far beyond even the harshest standards. We are also selling an alkalizing filter for those who want to remineralize their water, which makes the water taste great, as opposed to using un-alkalinized water that is basically distilled.

The filters are easy to access via a hatch on the front of the machine and will need to be replaced every 6-12 months (depending on filter type) for optimum quality. The water that comes out of this machine before filtration measures at a PH of 6 and is 6 ppm total dissolved solids, which compared to our everyday tap water is 56 times purer.

Basically, it’s the freshest water you have ever had, since it's made the day you drink it- water so fresh you can taste it.

We are also providing an external float switch which can be used to keep water tanks full. This is a $50 extra and comes with 15 feet of wire and the external float switch. A tank with this float switch mounted inside can be drained, which triggers the machine to turn on when put in autofill setting in app. 

The Software

Not only is our hardware great, but our co-founder and software engineer, Pavel Tikhonenko, developed an app to control the machine. This delivers full wireless control to track your water production and agricultural environment over time. To save you power, the app lets you set the humidity level at which the DG-10 turns on. That ability also makes it ideal for controlling the atmosphere of an indoor hydroponics grow.

The machine has an internal reservoir which measures the amount of water made, the time it was made, the temperature and humidity, and records this information to a memory card for the life of the machine. A pump then takes the water out of the reservoir tank through a hose and into whatever storage vessel you desire.

 

DG-10 at Work

By combining this water-making hardware with our wireless control, you have a machine that lets you actually mine your own water. The DG-10 either takes it out of the air or, if gardening inside, recycles the water your plants naturally exhale while balancing humidity for optimum growing. This can potentially allow farmers (in relatively humid indoor environments) to grow crops without using any additional water. Just recycle the water vapor in the air and feed it back to your plants in a closed loop system.

We envision our machine supplying fresh water to fill up everything from water bottles to 5-gallon jugs to large cisterns. With the click of a button on the app, you set how much water you want the DG-10 to make before shutting off – or just let it run continuously.

As it works by condensing humidity, it's important to factor in that the output will change depending on how warm and humid it is. Say it's 35% humidity and 60 degrees Fahrenheit, you're probably not going to get more than a gallon of water a day. So depending on where you are in the world, what season you are in, altitude, and weather, a DG-10 will produce different amounts. This is why we say our machine can make “up to 10 gallons” of fresh water a day, a sizable amount considering most people only consume about 1/5 of a gallon a day.

This variance is also why we recommend using it passively to keep a cistern or water tank full for urban farming. If you live in arid environments like Nevada, New Mexico, Arizona or Colorado, it may be difficult to make water on any given day, since you need at least 35% humidity. In an emergency situation, or when humidity drops below the optimum level for an extended period, our machine can also filter city tap water to ensure purity for drinking via a hatch in the side.

The Blind Taste Test

In April 2016, DewGood conducted a blind taste test with 34 students of California State University Dominguez Hills comparing tap water with filtered DewGood water. 94% stated a clear preference for the taste of DewGood water to tap. An astounding 80% of the students thought they could actually smell or see a difference in the water sources before tasting.

Here’s the deal


We're raising $50,000 to produce the first 40 machines to cover the cost of electrical certification, manufacturing, plus a little overhead to help us grow this company and take it to the next level. The DG-10 retails for $1,999.99, but we are excited to get our product out to the world and are selling this first wave of units for a reduced price. So snatch em up quick!

Perk Breakdown

Stickers, Bottles & Shirts

The Plan

The Impact

Our vision extends way beyond the DG-10. We believe in our lifetimes that we can live without relying on tap and bottled water. The houses and farms of the future will be water neutral, not requiring any additional source. The DewGood mission is to develop technologies to capture the water in the air to fit the needs of homeowners, farmers, and those who don't have ready access. By providing technology to people in those markets, we can develop as a company and deliver product to people whose very lives depend on a fresh source of water.

DewGood is committed to working with charities by donating 1 in every 10 machines to an organization that can get the devices to water-scarce areas.

Who We Are

Risks

We've done everything we can to ensure the delivery of these rewards as quickly as possible, taking so many factors into consideration that it’s kinda mind boggling. For starters, we spent the last year searching from Texas to India to find a manufacturer and assembly house that could confidently produce these machines. We have made countless 3D models, videos, RFPs, phone calls, and meetings to ensure that we will be able to produce our machines and grow the company to provide for the water needs of the world in the coming years.

People have devoted their lives to this product so wholly and unconditionally because they truly believe there’s something special happening. The DG-10, and its successors, has the ability to really dew good for people around the world.

So here’s where we netted out. Our machine is going to be designed in Irvine, California and in Austin, Texas. In regards to designing the production model, some parts will be exchanged from our current prototype which might affect final water output and appearance. We're also getting NSF-approved parts to ensure the water is top quality straight out of the machine. While these adjustments may impact productivity, we're not expecting more than a 5-10% shift in power, output, or other specifications.

FAQs

How does the DG-10 work? It condenses water out of the air by cooling metal ﬁns to below dew point.

What kind of maintenance does the DG-10 require? The air ﬁlter needs to be replaced every 6-12 months, and the internal filters have to be replaced every 6-12 months. 

How much water does the DG-10 make? Given the right conditions, DewGood’s first device is capable of producing 10 gallons of fresh water every 24 hours. Basically, the higher the humidity and temperature, the better the results. Our mobile application helps track every gallon created by the DG-10.

How much power does it use? 500-800 watts – basically the equivalent of a desktop computer.

How much does it cost to make a gallon? Around 30 cents to make a gallon of fresh alkalinized water in good conditions. According to an article on  Business Insider a gallon of bottled water was $1.22 in 2013 with tap around .4¢ a gallon. The DG-10 is much closer to the price of tap water, but much higher quality water, and will only become more efficient as technology improves.

Can I drink the water straight out of the machine? Yes! The DG-10 has built in 6 stage filter, so water that comes straight from the machine is basically distilled. We recommend using our alkalizing filter to remineralize the water and provide a great dew-fresh taste!  

When will you release your next product? April 2018.

Does the app work on Android and Iphone? Yes.

Specifications:

MSRP: $1,499.99

Weight: 55lbs

Dimensions: 20” cube

Voltage: 120v

Wattage: 500w-800w & Can Run Off Solar with Inverter

Temperature Range: 42-110F

Average: 80˚/ 64% RH per 9 Gallon

Max Efficiency: 80˚/ 80% per 10 gallons

Humidity range: 35-100%

Maximum Water Output: 10 Gallons every 24 hours

PH of Water Produced: 6

PPM: 6PPM vs. Tap Water at 500PPM

Maintenance: Change Air and Water Filters Every 6-12 Months (depending on type)

DG-10 Life: Minimum 2 Year Life, with Proper Maintenance and Care, Could Last 5-7 Years

Thank You For Your Support!

 

Special Thanks

Andy Robbins and Steph Sebbag, for your support in marketing and advertising

Alexey Mihailovic, for design consultation

Artem Gusev, for implementing our web design ideas

Rick Pielago, Bob Bartmess, Kristin Hiibner, Karin Levinson, Ben Hirschfeld, and Michael Hirschfeld for your support and dedication to helping us grow this company

Reign Derenzo, Mark Vollmer and Reuben Vollmer I, for helping with the design of early prototypes and engineering assistance

Hohm Farm residents, for providing a perfect incubator for DewGood

And to our whole team: Reuben Vollmer, Pavel Tikhonenko, Joe Pielago, Mike Zharchev, and Denis Shevchenko.
