story:
Impact | Technology | Perks | Perk Summary | Challenges | FAQ


The Vflux Chip

Vflux chips are electric generators the size of computer chips.  They outperform any other type of generator or energy source in any feature:


Compared to other forms of electricity production, Vflux chips are simply superior.  Whether you compare it to solar panels, nuclear reactors, or oil, Vflux outperforms each and every other type of energy source in price, size, functionality, and more.

       



The Vflux Revolution

Never have a phone or laptop battery die on you again.
Drive your car for tens of thousands of miles without ever stopping for gas.
Run an air conditioner all day, every day.
Power your house, your factory, your life, at no continuous cost.

The foundation of our economy is electricity, yet we've been floundering around for the past decade trying to replace fossil fuels.  While other alternatives have been popping up, that's all they've been trying to do -- replace fossil fuels.

Vflux goes past that.  With Vflux alone, electricity can become a never-ending no-cost resource that's available everywhere for everyone.  Prices for commodities, luxuries, and even necessities will go drastically down.  Things that were otherwise unfeasible due to their energy cost -- like desalinating and transporting water for the entire world -- will suddenly become viable.

And that is just the beginning.  It isn't crazy to think that we could end world hunger, or explore deep space, or more.

   

   

“The Vflux concept for converting solar energy into electrical energy is innovative and the result of a lot of research.”
   Ted Van Duzer, PhD Electrical Engineering
Professor Emeritus UC Berkeley.


The Technology

While we covered it briefly in the main video, here's a more technical video explaining things a bit deeper.


Several of our technical references are at the bottom of this page.

In short, each Vflux chip rapidly oscillates between two phases.

GENERATING PHASE:

        


1.  The type II superconductor forms flux vortices when it enters the superconducting state. [1]
2.  These vortices bend magnetic field lines.[2]
3.  Nano coils harvest electricity from the bending of these magnetic field lines, producing the net electricity. [3]

COOLING PHASE:

             


1.  The superconductor leaves the superconducting state and becomes a normal conductor.
2.  Leaving the state in this fashion causes the Superconductor to self-cool. [4]
3.  Heat flows from the warmer air to the colder superconductor (around -400°F).[5]
4.  Once the superconductor returns to its initial temperature, it can enter the superconducting state and generate again.

                          


“Critical physical processes for Vflux are shown to work by experiments. The benefits are immense.”
York Dobyns, PhD Physics
Department of Electrical Engineering, Princeton University.


Perks

Contributor Recognition ($20)  

Everyone who contributes at least $20 can have their name or nickname appear on our special Backer List.   This list will be packaged with every single Vflux product indefinitely, thanking and honoring you forever.   This perk is included with all other perks.   You can opt out of having your name on the list if you want to contribute anonymously.

                                 




Phone Powerpack ($186)
We will upgrade a smart phone of your choice to run on Vflux power.   This Phone Powerpack will replace your phone battery, powering your phone continuously and conveniently.  It will never need to be charged again.  Phone Powerpacks are expected to last longer than the phone itself.  5 year warranty.

                                                         

Add on an additional Phone Powerpack to any pledge by increasing your pledge amount by $160 for each one.


 Reporter Special ($186 $98) 

Up to 1,000 contributors can claim a Phone Powerpack at a massive discount, but with a catch:  You have to pinky-promise that you'll tell at least three other people about Vflux whom haven't heard of it before.

                              

                                        

                                                                 We trust you.




Portable USB Powerpack (The PUP: $58)

The PUP is a pocket USB generator that will continuously run and also slow charge many small USB powered device, such as handheld gaming devices, phones, and more.  Add a small flashlight built into your PUP for $5.

             

Add on an additional PUP to any pledge by increasing your pledge amount by $50 for each one ($55 with flashlight).   Color selectable.  5 year warranty.



 Family Pack Special ($598 $398) 

Three Phone Powerpacks
Two PUPs with flashlights,
One Massive discount.
            

                                                      

We know how tough it can be for a family, especially when you need to think of your kids, your parents, or other friends and relatives.  We have families too.  After a lot of thought, we decided to give a huge discount on this special package deal in order to make it easier to give everyone in the family a little love.

 The OutLET ($400-$2,000 for 400-2,000 Watts) 

The OutLET is a small, light-weight carrying case (with a handle) that gives you access to electrical outlets where ever you go; whether you are just sitting on the couch, out at the park, or off on a mountain top.  You always have an OutLET.   Like all Vflux products, anytime you use an OutLET in place of your own home outlets, you save money and help the environment. 

For every additional $1, we will increase your OutLET's watt output by 1, starting at 400 watts to a maximum of 2,000 watts.  Color selectable.  5 year warranty.



 Revolutionary Recognition ($1,000)  

Soon after the first successful Vflux chips are produced, we are going to host a private launch event where we unveil Vflux technology to the world.   You get a personal ticket to attend.   Add $600 onto your pledge per each additional ticket.

You also get your name, nickname, or even company name displayed publicly on the outside of all Vflux product boxes.

                                   




Portable Infinity Generator
(PigLET: $3,750 to $7,500 for 5K-10K Watts) 

PigLETs are designed to supplement or completely power a small or energy-conscious household or apartment.   They're the same size as the average portable generator, but are lighter, produce more wattage, and of course need no fueling or recharging.   A single PigLET can drastically reduce or eliminate your electric bill and provide vital electricity in case of a power outage.

                               

For every additional 75 cents, we will increase your PigLET's watt output by 1, starting at 5,000 watts to a maximum of 10,000 watts.  Color selectable.  5 year warranty.



Powerful Infinity Generator (The PIG: $+10,000, for +20,000 Watts)

When a PigLET grows up, we get a PIG.   PIGs are designed to completely run every average households --and then some-- reducing your electrical bills to 0, and potentially making you money as you send excess energy back to your electric company.  High-watt PIGs, or multiple PIGs, can even be used to power an entire factory or other energy guzzling complexes/machinery.  There is no limit to the size of a PIG.

                        

For every additional 50 cents, we will increase your PIG's watt output by 1, starting at 20,000, with no maximum wattage.  Color selectable.  10 year warranty.



  Historic Recognition ($10,000) 

You get one of the very first working Vflux test chips, in addition to the benefits of the Revolutionary perk: your name on the box, and a personal invite to the launch event with VIP access ($600 for additional launch tickets).

                               

                                                             You are a true hero.



 Custom Installation ($75,000)

We'll send our personal team of experts over to personally install Vflux technology into just about anything: an electric car or other vehicle, a large mansion off the grid with bonus air conditioning, factory equipment, or more.   If you select this perk, be sure to send us a message or e-mail so we can work out the details of what you want Vflux installed into, and where you want it.

               


Perk Summary

Risks and Challenges

The biggest challenge is also the biggest reward:
We are doing something extraordinary that no one else has ever done.


We've proven every aspect of Vflux's processes using various researched, published, and peer reviewed scientific papers and research studies.  We've continued to explain and participate in open and honest about the science.  Despite our attempts, some individuals are set to disbelieve absent of anything but a physical device in their hands.  For these individuals, we've got a dilemma: We cannot get their support to build Vflux until after Vflux is already built.

This is why taking the first step and contributing is so crucial.   When we are successful with demonstrating this technology, when it has integrated with our lives, life will be better for everyone.  No one can disagree with that.  In order to overcome this challenge, we are doing our best to teach people so that they can understand how and why Vflux works; so that you can support our cause with confidence.

   


The Funds

Manufacturing a computer chip is expensive and Vflux chips need specialized tooling beyond even that.  With the money we raise here, we will make/rent the various equipment, masks, tools, and materials we need to produce the first series of Vflux chips and generators.  In addition, it will help cover the costs for fabrication, characterization, refinement, unit testing, optimization, and finally production.

While we have been raising money from investors, this campaign will serve as a final push so that we can take this technology off the ground.  Anything you contribute will help, no matter how small.  We will ensure every contributor receives their perks whether or not we reach our financial goal.

FAQ

Q:  Can I add on <Item> to <Pledge>?
A:  Yes.  Almost all pledges accept any number and any variety of add-ons.  Simply increase your pledge amount by the total price of all your add-ons.  After the campaign ends, we'll send out surveys so you can tell us what exact items, perks and/or wattages you want.

There are only two restrictions:
1. No add-ons are allowed for the $20 Contributor Recognition perk.
2. We can't allow add-ons from discounted prices or limited perks.  (You can, however, add on additional items to a limited or sale special perk).

Q:  How much is shipping?
A:  We offer free shipping to the USA/Canada/Mexica.  To any other location, we charge a flat $15 rate for any order.
Q:  I can't contribute.  How else can I help?
A:  Spread the word like wildfire.  Tell your friends, share our campaign on facebook, tweet about us, post about us on sites like tumblr and reddit.   Be a voice. The more people who are aware, the more support we can get to make this a reality.
Q: Are there vents or fans on the smaller devices?
A: Neither the Phone Powerpack nor the PUP have any vents or fans.   They are small and efficient enough to not need any.

Q:  How do you know this works?
A:  Have you heard the saying "Measure twice, cut once"?  Well, we've spent the last few years doing nothing but measuring -- running simulations, sifting through scientific experiments and data, creating mathematical equations, getting patents, talking with other professional scientists, and more.  Throughout all of this, every piece of evidence we've ever uncovered has supported Vflux.   It works.
Q:  Is this perpetual motion?
A:  No.  Vflux chips require a constant input of energy, which we get from the sun's heat.  Unfortunately, Vflux generators won't run continuously if the sun spontaneously explodes overnight.   They won't operate at all under temperatures of -400°F, and they can't perfectly convert heat into energy.  

More scientifically speaking, the process which Vflux uses to harvest energy complies with all laws of thermodynamics: the total entropy of the system increases as RF energy is emitted.  This side effect, while minuscule, is what stops Vflux from being considered perpetual motion despite converting heat into usable electricity.
Q:  Will Vflux generators cool the planet?
A: No.  The earth is constantly radiating and losing heat.  This isn't an issue for everyday life because the sun is also constantly supplying the earth with heat.  Vflux generators take the heat that would otherwise be radiated into space and instead convert it into usable electricity.   There is no amount of Vflux generators that could impact the temperature of our planet.

Q:  Does a Vflux powered device need to be left or kept in the sun?
A:  No.  Vflux chips work during night, in the arctic, and deep underground.  The only requirement for Vflux powered devices to continue operating is that the room temperature housing the device is warmer than -400°F.

Still feeling lost?   Have a question?  Have a comment or concern?  Send us an e-mail at Vflux.QA@Centerflux.com.   We'll respond to each and every e-mail personally.  You can also contact us on Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, or even send us a message here on Indiegogo.  

                                                                   





The Technical References


1.  A type II superconductor forms flux vortices under particular conditions
Wikipedia: Quantum Vortex
Abrikosov, A. A. (1957) "On the Magnetic properties of superconductors of the second group", Sov.Phys.JETP 5:1174–1182 and Zh.Eksp.Teor.Fiz.32:1442-1452.
Details:  When the magnetic field density upon a Type II Superconductor exceeds HC1, vortices form.  Each vortex is a cylindrical shaped region within a superconductor that is not superconducting.  Since the region is not superconducting, the magnetic field lines move to pass through the material at the location of each vortex.

2.  These vortices bend magnetic field lines.
Wikipedia: Meissner Effect 
Tinkham, M. “Introduction to Superconductivity,” 1996, Mc-Graw Hill, NY
Ekin, J., “Experimental Techniques Low-Temperature Measurements,” Oxford Univ., 2007,  p 410
Details:  In regions between the vortices, the superconductor expels the magnetic field by the Meissner effect.  The field lines move into the center of each vortex since superconductivity is suppressed there.

3.  Coils can harvest electricity from the bending of magnetic field lines.
Wikipedia: Electromagnetic Induction 
Maxwell,  James, “A Treatise on Electricity and Magnetism, Vol. II,” 1904. Third Edition, Oxford University Press, pp. 178–9 and 189.
Harrington, R. “Introduction to Electromagnetic Engineering,” 2003. Dover Publications, NY, p 56
Deaver, "Experimental Evidence for Quantized Flux in Superconducting Cylinders," 1961 Physical Review Letters 7 (2): 43–46 – (Stanford students measuring the “fluxon”) 
Details:  A current is induced in a coil while the magnetic field density through it changes.  This is the basis for electricity currently generated by motion.  During the transition into the superconducting state, there is motion of the magnetic flux.  This motion is powered by the increase in free energy, which occurs since the flux that previously permeated the superconductor's surface in the normal state is propelled by the Meissner Effect, pushing it into the center of the vortices where the flux becomes trapped.  The moving flux during the transition causes a change of flux density in the coils, generating electricity by electromagnetic induction.

4.  When the Superconductor leaves the superconducting state, it self-cools under particular conditions
Shoenberg, "Superconductivity," 1960, Cambridge University Press, pp 58-59 (equations)
Dolecek, R.”Adiabatic Magnetization of a Superconducting Sphere,” 1954 Phys. Rev. 96, 25–28  (US Naval Research Lab)
Details: To measure the change in temperature, a superconductor was placed in a vacuum cryostat with a thermo-transducer attached.  The magnetic field strength was stepped up, so the field overcame the superconductor causing the superconductor to enter the normal state while staying below the critical temperature.  The change in temperature of the superconductor was tabulated.  The change in temperature is the Superconductor Magneto-Caloric Effect, also called an Inverse Magneto-Caloric Effect.  Cooling occurs since heat energy is used to increase entropy.  The non-superconducting state is a higher entropy state than the superconducting state.  Since heat energy is converted to entropy, there is less heat and the temperature drops.  During this transition, the magnetic field causes both cooling and heating.  Heating is by eddy currents, yet since the cooling effect is greater than the heating effect, the net effect is a temperature drop.   

5.  Heat flows from the warm to cold 
Wikipedia: Heat 
Partington, J. “An Advanced Treatise on Physical Chemistry, Fundamental Principles. The Properties of Gases,” 1949, London: Longmans, Green and Co., p 118
Fermi, E. “Thermodynamics,” 1956, Dover Publications, 1956
Details:  All matter emits and absorbs heat.  Hotter matter placed next to colder matter will emit more heat than it absorbs.  This makes the hotter item colder and the colder item hotter until they reach equilibrium of temperature.



Equations for changes in free energy at Superconductor transitions are available in various college level books in Solid State Physics that include superconductors.   Our go-to reference for these equations is the following edition (because it is archived online):
Kittel, C. “Introduction to Solid State Physics,” 8th ed. 2005, John Wiley & Sons, NJ p 272
Details: The change in the available Helmholtz or Gibbs free energy of a superconductor in a magnetic field upon entering or leaving the superconducting state, while staying below Tc, is in proportion to the magnetic field through the volume of the superconductor.  When entering the superconducting state, the free energy increases.  When leaving the superconducting state, the free energy decreases.
story_txt:
Impact |
 Technology |
 Perks | Perk Summary |
 Challenges |
 FAQ


The Vflux Chip



Vflux chips are electric generators the size of computer chips.  They outperform any other type of generator or energy source in any feature:

Compared to other forms of electricity production, Vflux chips are simply superior.  Whether you compare it to solar panels, nuclear reactors, or oil, Vflux outperforms each and every other type of energy source in price, size, functionality, and more.
       

The Vflux Revolution
Never have a phone or laptop battery die on you again.
Drive your car for tens of thousands of miles without ever stopping for gas.
Run an air conditioner all day, every day.Power your house, your factory, your life, at no continuous cost.
The foundation of our economy is electricity, yet we've been floundering around for the past decade trying to replace fossil fuels.  While other alternatives have been popping up, that's all they've been trying to do -- replace fossil fuels.Vflux goes past that.  With Vflux alone, electricity can become a never-ending no-cost resource that's available everywhere for everyone.  Prices for commodities, luxuries, and even necessities will go drastically down.  Things that were otherwise unfeasible due to their energy cost -- like desalinating and transporting water for the entire world -- will suddenly become viable. And that is just the beginning.  It isn't crazy to think that we could end world hunger, or explore deep space, or more.

   
   


“The Vflux concept for converting solar energy into electrical energy is innovative and the result of a lot of research.”   Ted Van Duzer, PhD Electrical EngineeringProfessor Emeritus UC Berkeley.


The Technology
While we covered it briefly in the main video, here's a more technical video explaining things a bit deeper.
Several of our technical references are at the bottom of this page.In short, each Vflux chip rapidly oscillates between two phases.
GENERATING PHASE:
        
1.  The type II superconductor forms flux vortices when it enters the superconducting state. [1]
2.  These vortices bend magnetic field lines.[2]
3.  Nano coils harvest electricity from the bending of these magnetic field lines, producing the net electricity. [3]
COOLING PHASE:

             
1.  The superconductor leaves the superconducting state and becomes a normal conductor.
2.  Leaving the state in this fashion causes the Superconductor to self-cool.
[4]
3.  Heat flows from the warmer air to the colder superconductor (around -400°F).[5]
4.  Once the superconductor returns to its initial temperature, it can enter the superconducting state and generate again.

                          

“Critical physical processes for Vflux are shown to work by experiments. The benefits are immense.”York Dobyns, PhD Physics  Department of Electrical Engineering, Princeton University.


Perks
Contributor Recognition ($20)  

Everyone who contributes at least $20 can have their name or nickname appear on our special Backer List.   This list will be packaged with every single Vflux product indefinitely, thanking and honoring you forever.   This perk is included with all other perks.   You can opt out of having your name on the list if you want to contribute anonymously.

                                  



Phone Powerpack ($186)

We will upgrade a smart phone of your choice to run on Vflux power.   This Phone Powerpack will replace your phone battery, powering your phone continuously and conveniently.  It will never need to be charged again.  Phone Powerpacks are expected to last longer than the phone itself.  5 year warranty.


                                                         
Add on an additional Phone Powerpack to any pledge by increasing your pledge amount by $160 for each one.


 Reporter Special ($186 $98) 
Up to 1,000 contributors can claim a Phone Powerpack at a massive discount, but with a catch:  You have to pinky-promise that you'll tell at least three other people about Vflux whom haven't heard of it before.                              
                                        

                                                                 We trust you.


Portable USB Powerpack (The PUP: $58)
The PUP is a pocket USB generator that will continuously run and also slow charge many small USB powered device, such as handheld gaming devices, phones, and more.  Add a small flashlight built into your PUP for $5.             
Add on an additional PUP to any pledge by increasing your pledge amount by $50 for each one ($55 with flashlight).   Color selectable.  5 year warranty.

 Family Pack Special ($598 $398) 
Three Phone PowerpacksTwo PUPs with flashlights,One Massive discount.
            

                                                      
We know how tough it can be for a family, especially when you need to think of your kids, your parents, or other friends and relatives.  We have families too.  After a lot of thought, we decided to give a huge discount on this special package deal in order to make it easier to give everyone in the family a little love.

 The OutLET ($400-$2,000 for 400-2,000 Watts) 
The OutLET is a small, light-weight carrying case (with a handle) that gives you access to electrical outlets where ever you go; whether you are just sitting on the couch, out at the park, or off on a mountain top.  You always have an OutLET.   Like all Vflux products, anytime you use an OutLET in place of your own home outlets, you save money and help the environment. 

For every additional $1, we will increase your OutLET's watt output by 1, starting at 400 watts to a maximum of 2,000 watts.  Color selectable.  5 year warranty.
 Revolutionary Recognition ($1,000)  
Soon after the first successful Vflux chips are produced, we are going to host a private launch event where we unveil Vflux technology to the world.   You get a personal ticket to attend.   Add $600 onto your pledge per each additional ticket.
You also get your name, nickname, or even company name displayed publicly on the outside of all Vflux product boxes.                                   



Portable Infinity Generator(PigLET: $3,750 to $7,500 for 5K-10K Watts) PigLETs are designed to supplement or completely power a small or energy-conscious household or apartment.   They're the same size as the average portable generator, but are lighter, produce more wattage, and of course need no fueling or recharging.   A single PigLET can drastically reduce or eliminate your electric bill and provide vital electricity in case of a power outage.                               
For every additional 75 cents, we will increase your PigLET's watt output by 1, starting at 5,000 watts to a maximum of 10,000 watts.  Color selectable.  5 year warranty.
Powerful Infinity Generator (The PIG: $+10,000, for +20,000 Watts)When a PigLET grows up, we get a PIG.   PIGs are designed to completely run every average households --and then some-- reducing your electrical bills to 0, and potentially making you money as you send excess energy back to your electric company.  High-watt PIGs, or multiple PIGs, can even be used to power an entire factory or other energy guzzling complexes/machinery.  There is no limit to the size of a PIG.                        For every additional 50 cents, we will increase your PIG's watt output by 1, starting at 20,000, with no maximum wattage.  Color selectable.  10 year warranty.  Historic Recognition ($10,000) You get one of the very first working Vflux test chips, in addition to the benefits of the Revolutionary perk: your name on the box, and a personal invite to the launch event with VIP access ($600 for additional launch tickets).                                                                                            You are a true hero.
 Custom Installation ($75,000)We'll send our personal team of experts over to personally install Vflux technology into just about anything: an electric car or other vehicle, a large mansion off the grid with bonus air conditioning, factory equipment, or more.   If you select this perk, be sure to send us a message or e-mail so we can work out the details of what you want Vflux installed into, and where you want it.

story:
Just briefly

My name is Brian Brechner, as a teenager I had a concept that turned into a dream, and then into passion! My dream was to use trash for renewable energy without harmful emissions.   The bottom line is this; our investors and backers want to know how many Americans truly care about clean energy? So I am asking people for help, I need a team, and we need you.

  • We need team players to share this campaign with friends and family.
  • We need team leaders that are willing to find team players.
  • Maybe you have built an anaerobic digester, or you own one. We could share experiences.

We want to know what you want. Do you boon-dock full time or live in a tiny house? Are you looking for a place to park for a few months or years, or just a few days with free facilities?

We need your input, in order to fill your needs

We are looking to buy land along historic route 66 and near state parks. Places where entrepreneurs chose to live and work. We want to bring back free enterprise.

  • These parks or communities would be for travelers that need fuel or facilities.
  • A lot like the original route 66, we'll need gift shops and cafes, EV charging stations.
  • Family friendly places to stop or spend a few nights before moving on.

Free Enterprise 

Bringing back free enterprise is possible again, because the cost of traveling will be much lower. We have the technology to produce energy that will NOT run out and is cheap to produce.

  • Imagine taking the time to visit historic route 66 without the high cost of an overnight stay.
  • I remember when I worked at my father's Texaco service station, before the oil holdings in June of 1973. Gas was cheap and travelers took their time to shop and see the sights. 
  • There were full service stations and places to stop all along the highways.  
  • Let's start rebuilding route 66, and thus primarily rebuild America!

Risks & Challenges

Yes of course there are risks. Governmental groups such as neighborhood associations will try to stop travelers from parking for free. They did it to Walmart and they'll do it to us. Power is greater in numbers, that is the reason for this campaign. Share and build, and share more.

The challenge is this: Are you going to say it is time to take back America, or are we going to be afraid of wealthy business men that say, "Global warming is a HOAX, it's not real! TRUST ME."

It is time to speak out?

  • Be a Team Player and share with everyone you know, and everyone on your contact list.
  • Be a Team Leader, find other Team Players that would be interested in this campaign.
  • A Team Manager has the option of profit sharing and could make this a career.

Other Ways You Can Help

You do not have to donate money to be on our team.

  • We are looking for compassionate people that are willing to speak out.
  • Social media makes it easy to express your feelings.
  • Tell us in the comments section how you feel, and share your ideas.
  • If you feel you have something other than money to contribute, or would like to express your concerns, please leave your comments in the comment section on this page. Thank you for all your support.

We need team players to share this campaign with friends and family.
We need team leaders that are willing to find team players.
Maybe you have built an anaerobic digester, or you own one. We could share experiences.

We want to know what you want. Do you boon-dock full time or live in a tiny house? Are you looking for a place to park for a few months or years, or just a few days with free facilities?

We need your input, in order to fill your needs
We are looking to buy land along historic route 66 and near state parks. Places where entrepreneurs chose to live and work. We want to bring back free enterprise.

These parks or communities would be for travelers that need fuel or facilities.
A lot like the original route 66, we'll need gift shops and cafes, EV charging stations.
Family friendly places to stop or spend a few nights before moving on.


Free Enterprise 
Bringing back free enterprise is possible again, because the cost of traveling will be much lower. We have the technology to produce energy that will NOT run out and is cheap to produce.

Imagine taking the time to visit historic route 66 without the high cost of an overnight stay.
I remember when I worked at my father's Texaco service station, before the oil holdings in June of 1973. Gas was cheap and travelers took their time to shop and see the sights. 
There were full service stations and places to stop all along the highways.  
Let's start rebuilding route 66, and thus primarily rebuild America!


Risks & Challenges
Yes of course there are risks. Governmental groups such as neighborhood associations will try to stop travelers from parking for free. They did it to Walmart and they'll do it to us. Power is greater in numbers, that is the reason for this campaign. Share and build, and share more.
The challenge is this: Are you going to say it is time to take back America, or are we going to be afraid of wealthy business men that say, "Global warming is a HOAX, it's not real! TRUST ME."
It is time to speak out?

Be a Team Player and share with everyone you know, and everyone on your contact list.
Be a Team Leader, find other Team Players that would be interested in this campaign.
A Team Manager has the option of profit sharing and could make this a career.


Other Ways You Can Help
You do not have to donate money to be on our team.

We are looking for compassionate people that are willing to speak out.
Social media makes it easy to express your feelings.
Tell us in the comments section how you feel, and share your ideas.
If you feel you have something other than money to contribute, or would like to express your concerns, please leave your comments in the comment section on this page. Thank you for all your support.

story:
Who are we?

This is us 18 years ago.. we’re siblings!

And this is us today..

Just kidding. I had show how cute we were! 

As you can tell, we’re still scheming. Only this time the legs are a little longer and the muscles are a little stronger. Also, we’ve finally lost the training wheels!

But here’s the thing. Team Mahali needs our help to get 10 students to Morocco (and back!) next year to represent South Africa in this opportunity of a lifetime: the 2019 Solar Decathlon Africa.

So we’re riding over 1000 km during the Moroccan summer in order to raise funds for our team. Over a 3 week period we’ll be covering coastlines, the Atlas mountains and desert regions on two pedal-powered wheels and bags of dried fruit!

- We're taking over the Mahali Instagram account for a little while so follow our adventures and engage with us there!

- If you’d like to show your support for our adventure and Team Mahali's project below, consider sharing this campaign with interested friends and family or supporting us directly on Indiegogo.

With love,
Ross & Cara

The Competition

The Solar Decathlon is a global competition for the design, construction and operation of affordable, energy-efficient, solar-powered homes. 

“The competition focuses on solar energies and sustainable houses, addressing many of the key challenges, and underpinning the key factors to achieve net-zero energy buildings. The contests epitomize the elements and factors that define green sustainable houses.” - Solar Decathlon Africa

Being the only team from Sub-Saharan Africa chosen to compete in this year's Solar Decathlon Africa, Team Mahali (Swahili: "Place") aims to drive context-driven design and social development innovations in a house that speaks to an African context. 

 

The Why

Long-term sustainability is possibly the greatest collective challenge humanity faces today. Sustainable resource use and ecological regeneration are priorities for anyone sincerely desiring the ideals of global peace, abundance and fulfilling lives for all beings alive today and in the future. 

Part of this transition to sustainability is a technical one. It means greater efficiency and innovative technologies to solve challenges in sustainable development and collective organisation. This is where competitions like the Solar Decathlon fit in. They are primarily about solving important technical challenges. But these solutions are merely one part of a larger narrative that our descendants will recount of the pivotal transition that is now underway.

The other part of the story is about you and me, the animals, the critters, the rivers and the mountains. It is about growing out of a once-necessary but-now-limiting tribal consciousness into a more inclusive planetary consciousness that is calling out to each one of us as the desire to cooperate and collaborate across diverse cultures, race, class and arbitrary state borders in order to face the complex challenges heading our way. Stepping into true stewardship and long-term sustainability will require transformations across all domains of human civilisation, including; our economic systems, material flows, urbanism, culture, relationships, and most importantly, perhaps, a transformation of our own interiors. The emerging planetary culture is at once united by planetary-scale challenges, and therefore as individuals we are prompted to respond to these global challenges as if they had arrived on our own doorsteps. Herein lies both the strength and the urgency that is required. 

Mahali is joined by many thousands of projects and initiatives that are currently driving the sustainability transition on Earth. It is out of the innumerable successes and failures, the relentless process of inner and outer work, and, most importantly, the cooperation of individuals, communities and nation states at every scale that we may begin to see the emergence of a more encompassing and equitable global civilisation.

Other ways to help!

If you believe in our sustainable and equitable future, consider sharing this campaign with friends and family via email or on social media. Every share helps drive this project a step forwards.

Sponsors:

If you represent a company/brand that makes energy-efficient appliances, electric vehicles, power-tools, solar technology or anything of that nature - consider becoming a sponsor at the Solar Decathlon Africa by investing your gear with Team Mahali. Consider choosing the 'Visible Sponsor @ SDA 2019' perk to be eligible as an official sponsor of Team Mahali.

story:
The Power of Waste Heat

There is a hidden source of renewable power all around us that has the potential to provide electricity to charge our phones, spare batteries, and operate LED lights. You can find this power anywhere you find waste heat, like your home furnace or water heater exhaust, car, computer equipment, fireplace or wood burning stove -- or even the sun.

The problem is that the big energy corporations haven't figured out how to make a profit turning everyday, small-scale sources of waste heat into power.  BIG corporations can only make money from BIG energy sources, and waste heat is small power for the little guy.

Tapping into this free power requires thousands of inventors to experiment with different configurations to find out what works and what doesn't.  Like minicomputers in the 1970s, the next energy revolution is more likely to be invented in an empty garage than in a corporate lab.  The Thermopower Inventor's Kit provides everything the next generation of energy inventors needs to get started.

 

What is a Thermoelectric Generator?

Thermoelectric generators use advanced semiconductors to convert temperature difference directly into electricity.  The greater the temperature differential between the hot and cold side, the more energy the TEG will produce, but the TEGs in our Thermopower Inventor's Kit can power an LED bulb at the touch of your hand, using little more than body temperature!

The Department of Energy predicts the market for TEG technologies will grow exponentially to become a multibillion industry over the next two decades.  Right now, these projections are based on really BIG waste heat applications at industrial scale -- using waste heat from immense coal power stations, giant cooling towers for nuclear reactors, and huge steel- or glass-making factories. Not surprisingly, this industrial use market is dominated by powerful players like NASA, Alphabet Energy, and other large-scale waste heat recovery companies.  

 

How Can You Help?

To support renewable energy and clean technologies that will disrupt the corporate energy complex, support our campaign or purchase the Thermopower Inventor's Kit by using the links on the right side of this page. You can also share our campaign on social media by copy/pasting the URL or using the Indiegogo Share Tools.

 

The Thermopower Inventor's Kit, A Path to Personal Power

The first commercially available computers were giant, expensive, power-hungry machines that needed whole teams of engineers and scientists to maintain.  But when Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak offered the Apple 1 as a mail-order home hobbyist kit for only $666.66, they launched the personal computer industry that is now worth trillions of dollars worldwide.

We want to bring the potential of thermopower directly to the inventors, home hobbyists, and consumers who can create an energy revolution we call personal power.  By equipping a community of inventors to tinker, share, and experiment with TEG devices, we hope to empower the next Jobs and Wozniak to invent a cleaner, more personal, and democratic energy future.

 

What is Included?

The inventor's kit includes everything needed to create electric power from waste heat.  Included are two thermoelectric generators, one heat sink, thermal adhesive, and a charge controller.  Additionally, the kit includes an acrylic Fresnel lenses to get you started with your first experiment concentrating sunshine to generate enough heat to charge a cell phone. What's more, inventors can track their power generation using apps like Ampere (available for free through Google play) that turn their cell phones into power meters.  

We are selling the Inventor's Kit at cost because we believe in the mission of empowering everyday inventors and want to promote the use and accessibility of TEGs as alternative renewable energy resources. 

 

Who is the Inventor's Kit for?

From school students to home hobbyists to established engineers, anyone with an imagination can become a scientist and creator with the Inventor's Kit, discovering new sources of waste heat and building customized devices to capture it and transform it into energy they can use right away. The kit makes a great gift for friends and students interested in science and technology.

Because the use of TEGs to capture waste heat outside of industrial settings is a new application for the technology, supporting the Thermopower movement will create a community of co-inventors working on the cutting edge of new research in small-scale renewable energy.

story:
Introducing SORA Water Recycler

Greywater reuse
Clean drinking water
Solar powered

SORA is a Self-Operated Recycling Appliance for greywater reuse. Greywater comes from the household sink, shower, washing machine, and dishwasher. Our goal is to recycle over 75% of that water right back into the home for reuse (or other uses including irrigation). Even more innovative, it's been engineered to also create a percentage of clean, safe drinking water. This machine has the potential to conserve on a huge scale, to give back to the planet, as well as save money on your water bill.  *Before donating or purchasing a kit, please read our disclaimer section below.

Patent Pending

For every kit sold, we will donate $10 to the United Ways' Northern California Wildfire Relief and Recovery Fund.

Press

See who's talking about us

www.ksby.com/story/36211007/cal-poly-alumni-dev...

www.newtimesslo.com/sanluisobispo/catching-up-s...

Abalone Coast Analytical - San Luis Obispo, CA County Water Quality Testing

www.abalonecoastanalytical.com

 

Energy independence is on the rise

It's time to gain water independence...

 

 

​Mother nature knows best, particularly in restoring and purifying water. Through our design of SORA Water Saver, we have mimicked the hydrologic cycle and the many ecologies which filter water, from babbling creeks to slow-flowing wetlands, creating a simple solution for reducing water consumption in homes.

 

What Sets Us Apart

All current water recycling systems for the household use high-maintenance methods which require constant attention, such as replacing expensive filters and manually monitoring performance. SORA stands apart from existing water recycling; it makes water conservation as effortless as nature intended.  From self-monitoring water quality to managing optimal power sources, the SORA stands alone.

 

How it works

The SORA Water Recycler uses technology that does not need any expensive replacement parts or costly maintenance.  It is designed to self-regulate itself and allow you to effortlessly reuse a large percentage of your water from appliances (excluding toilets) and create drinkable water simultaneously.

 

The system works with a series of purification steps.  Our machine is basically a water treatment plant in a box.  First the water flows stabilize, allowing solids to settle, and reducing strain on the system.  Next, the water goes through a series of anaerobic and aerobic reactors, resembling the layer of soil near a river or creek, with limited oxygen. The microbes in a probiotic enrichment layer digest most health-threatening impurities.
 
The aerobic (oxygenated) contact zone has a biofilter that sustains aerobic microbes which treat the water, also disinfecting unwanted contaminants.  Active sand filtration is used, which further disinfects and removes micro sized particles.  Taking things a step further, the solar distiller can purify the water using sunlight and electrically assisted evaporation, making it 100% impurity-free and fully drinkable.  At the end of the recycling process, our machine harvests two purity levels of water: one to be used for home appliances or irrigation, and one for drinking.

More in depth description of technology--->  https://youtu.be/CM9nifarJVY

Before and after treatment

 

What We Need & What You Get

In addition to offering a few prototype kits, we are selling some awesome perk items and seeking donations for this cause.  As a team of recent Engineering grads, we have been working tirelessly to manifest the vision of water independence.  The help we have from California Polytechnic State University and Sangha Energy has been a valuable resource, but to get this vision to reality, we need more.  We are seeking more funding to finalize our research and development, to create a final product that is ready for the market.  This includes more extensive water quality testing, design optimization, and manufacturing.

Currently we are offering our prototype for sale as a kit for early adopters.  This prototype kit will not be our certified product, but will be able to treat water for both plumbing and irrigation reuse in an experimental setting.  What is sold as a working prototype is for experimental/educational purposes only, and although our prototype kit will have advanced laboratory water testing, FDA regulated water quality precision will not be guaranteed until a our prototype has been developed and tested.  There are different kits available:

 

1)   $299 - Basic Solar Distiller plans + custom components, solar power not included, DIY assembly, UV disinfection, partially automated, best paired with Greywater Treatment

2)   $499 – Greywater Treatment plans, works with Solar Distiller, DIY assembly, partially automated, for water reuse and irrigation

3)   $699 – Solar Distiller plans + custom components, includes solar power and UV disinfection, DIY assembly, partially automated, for potable reuse experimentation

4)  $999 - Greywater treatment + Basic Solar Distiller plans combo

5)   $1199 - Greywater Treatment + Solar Distiller plans combo (Max Water Independence!)

 

Once we optimize our design and it becomes available on the market, we will be a resource for early adopters to upgrade their kits.  We will also provide detailed instructions on assembly and application, and we will be available via phone, live chat, and email to assist. 

* Disclaimer: If production funding goals are not met, we will refund all we can. This does not include web sponsors, stickers, and T-shirt perk donations, only SORA kit contributions. There is no guarantee for a full refund in the event of discontinued production. All donations are for the purpose of research & development of the product.

 

Future Vision

Our vision is to have excellent ergonomics and style for the SORA.  There will be customizable paneling and color matching options.  The Sora Water Recycler will self-monitor water quality with various electronic sensors to keep your water clean and pure.  Smartphone hookup is also something we're trying to incorporate for water quality monitoring. 

For now we have designed and sized the recycler for households and residential type uses, but the technology is scalable for larger uses.  We plan to explore the viability of larger scale uses and different treatment options with more funding for research and development.

 

Our Team

 

Timeline

 

Our Website/Social Media

Website:  www.SoraWater.weebly.com

Facebook Page:  www.facebook.com/SORAbySangha/

story:
I am graduating this summer with a BSc in Chemistry from the University of Liverpool, a world-ranking University for this major. I have a strong interest in Biorenewables and the economy arising from them. In my final semester, I came across an assignment where I had to research and gather information together about cyanobacteria (blue-green algae). They are in fact, a potential alternative to produce biofuels.The way they produce biofuels is by using the CO2 in the air and photosynthesis, a perfect candidate for the fight against CO2 emissions!

During this assignment, the final task was to write an essay, I came across papers published by David-Lea-Smith and decided to message him on LinkedIn. At first, I didn't expect him to answer, but in fact, I received an immediate response from him. After talking to him, he offered me to work for his startup during this summer at the UEA (University of East Anglia) on cyanobacteria and get involved in the entrepreneurship part of this adventure.

My project will consist of research on a faster method of genetic engineering in cyanobacteria. Engineering these bacteria is a key feature required in order to mass produce fuel from these species, which is the biggest challenge to be able to use this marine biomass on the market and make it join the fight against CO2 emissions along with reusing the CO2 already out there. This project is valuable for the scientific and world communities will lead to the publication of a paper, my first one.

The funds I require for this project are 1500£ which will be spread over the accommodation (900£ for 2 months), the travel expenses from Liverpool to Norwich and within Norwich (200£) and living costs (400£).

Unfortunately, as it is a startup, funds are not available for interns... This is why I am asking the world community to fund this project as it means a lot to me and I would like to contribute to the future of the green energy production and the reduction of the CO2 emission, join this project and you will also contribute to these goals! Even if you can't participate, please share the message with your friends. Thank you all!
story_txt: I am graduating this summer with a BSc in Chemistry from the University of Liverpool, a world-ranking University for this major. I have a strong interest in Biorenewables and the economy arising from them. In my final semester, I came across an assignment where I had to research and gather information together about cyanobacteria (blue-green algae). They are in fact, a potential alternative to produce biofuels.The way they produce biofuels is by using the CO2 in the air and photosynthesis, a perfect candidate for the fight against CO2 emissions!During this assignment, the final task was to write an essay, I came across papers published by David-Lea-Smith and decided to message him on LinkedIn. At first, I didn't expect him to answer, but in fact, I received an immediate response from him. After talking to him, he offered me to work for his startup during this summer at the UEA (University of East Anglia) on cyanobacteria and get involved in the entrepreneurship part of this adventure.My project will consist of research on a faster method of genetic engineering in cyanobacteria. Engineering these bacteria is a key feature required in order to mass produce fuel from these species, which is the biggest challenge to be able to use this marine biomass on the market and make it join the fight against CO2 emissions along with reusing the CO2 already out there. This project is valuable for the scientific and world communities will lead to the publication of a paper, my first one.The funds I require for this project are 1500£ which will be spread over the accommodation (900£ for 2 months), the travel expenses from Liverpool to Norwich and within Norwich (200£) and living costs (400£).Unfortunately, as it is a startup, funds are not available for interns... This is why I am asking the world community to fund this project as it means a lot to me and I would like to contribute to the future of the green energy production and the reduction of the CO2 emission, join this project and you will also contribute to these goals! Even if you can't participate, please share the message with your friends. Thank you all!

story:
As a realtor in the Hamptons the need for sound blocking technology has been all too clear for all too long.  ANC (active noise cancelling) does not work on multiple continuously changing sounds, like traffic and construction and landscaping. For years I suggested that this technology was needed...until I finally went back to my roots in Physics (Cornell) and decided to do it myself. Forming Chromodynamics LLC in 2016. 

I have been exploring the beauty of sound and magnetic fields in my artwork for years (ReneeDahl.com). And I am continually amazed, that we are only beginning to rediscover the amazingly intricate forces of nature that surround us. We have been so focused on the macro and the micro of the Universe that we have overlooked the potential in the "aether" that envelopes our physical existence.

Our first concern is our delicate environment and we hope to use multiples of the earth's own healing frequencies. Testing and development will be extensive to ascertain the most effective frequencies  or layers thereof. We may find that the best solution is in targeted sound, and this avenue will need exploration, and tooling to a much smaller size than the very expensive, and very large emitters currently on the market. Neodymium magnets have a half-life of 700years, so there is little concern that "the magnets will wear out". We also have plans for shielding the magnetic fields created in the workings of emitter arrays.

The possibilities of our Array go far beyond Acoustics and it's application in more serious , protective situations is limitless.

story:
The Necessity of SuperCharging!
 

In 2011 Brandon Nozaki Miller, CEO of digiNow Inc., began hacking his electric motorcycle for racing. One of the first things he realized is to get as much track time as possible he needed to charge the bike FAST. Unfortunately for Brandon, none of the products available on the market could charge his bike fast enough to allow for a full day's racing. From this was born the need for SuperCharging.
 

 

After a few iterations of chargers for use at the track Brandon's friends, like famed Tourmaster Terry Hershner, took notice of his cool charging setups and tools; they wanted the same for themselves, so Brandon built his friends faster charging setups. It didn't take long until more people recognized how awesome SuperCharging was, and Brandon decided to make the SuperCharger available as a product. 

 

 


He started building SuperChargers in his living room and then moved to his garage as he needed more space. From there Terry Hershner introduced him to the inventor of the motorcycle fairing, Craig Vetter, who has since assisted in finding a more adequate facility for digiNow to grow, prototype, and build the first production units. Over the past year Craig's help has been invaluable to digiNow. But, now it's time to move on to the next level and utilize partners in China to move the current small-scale production to full-scale manufacturing.


 




The demand for our chargers is so great right now that we can not produce them fast enough in our current facility. The design is solid enough now that, with your help, we can move manufacturing into a facility with the tools and expertise to build SuperChargers quickly and in large enough volumes to supply the world.

 

What is SuperCharging? 
 

SuperCharging is a means of charging your bike, or other electric vehicle, really really fast! More than that, it is intelligent charging. SuperChargers communicate with your battery to monitor information vital to your battery's health, including C rate, temperature, voltage, and cell level data. Not only do they monitor, but the chargers react accordingly as conditions change.

In the end all of this adds up to being able to charge your vehicle at speeds of 3C safely. We keep it limited to 1C for riders of Zero motorcycles that want to keep their warranty, though. Over 1C, even with our fancy algorithm, is limited to advanced users.

 

Features:

 

  • Full system integration with Zero Motorcycle’s Battery Management System (BMS) to ensure battery longevity, safety and maximum charging speeds.
  • Powerful charging options upto 10 kW providing over 7.6x faster charging than Zero’s standard 1.3 kW onboard charger.
  • 0-80% charge in as little as 36 minutes with 10kW SuperCharger (based on Zero Motorcycle 13.0 kWh models).
  • Lightweight and compact design allowing either modular 3.3 kW charge bricks (FX) or 10 kW unit to fit in the same location occupied by Zero’s 1.3 kW onboard charger with included SuperCharger belly pan.
  • Automatically adjusts charging speed based on battery voltage and temperature to ensure long term battery health.
  • User configurable option to dramatically increase the motorcycle’s battery life by allowing user to hold charge at a desired percentage (i.e. only charge to 80% every night, similar to Daily/Trip charging options in Tesla vehicles). Zero Motorcycles currently does not offer this option so the motorcycle always charges to 100%, which is not ideal for keeping your battery healthy longer. 

 

How do these things work?

 
Plug the EV station, or any other source of power into your bike and let the charging begin! US versions come standard with J1772 inlets, and EU versions come with full 3 phase Mennekes Type 2 support. You can also use an Android or iOS device to adjust max power and voltage. Set your bike to only charge up to 80% for extra longevity. You could also have your charger hold your bike at 60% for long term storage if you really wanted.

The short answer, though, is that you just plug it in.

 

Production & Backer Perks

DigiNow needs $195,000 USD to move production to a shared facility with TC Charger, Di Long Technology, and DuoSida in China. TC Charger has been a key player in the Chinese EV industry, producing reliable and highly durable for EV manufacturers all over the world. Di Long Technology is one of the most respected and trustworthy facilities for charger development and is focused on helping startups like digiNow make an impact in the EV market. DuoSida is a behind-the-scenes manufacturer of EV charging stations and parts for many other manufacturers with certifications of the highest quality. Di Long Tech was recently awarded the High-Tech Enterprise by the Hebei Provincial Science and Technology Agency. With the help of these partners we have made a product rugged enough for the most challenging of scenarios, and small enough that it fits not just in any car, but also on any motorcycle.


With our latest design we have finally come to a final product which we are already building and delivering in a small scale in Carmel, California. With our partners' help we have been able to source suppliers for parts and materials to build not only our high powered electronics, but also our mounting brackets, PCBs, and EV power inlets. 


The funding we collect will be spent on setting up and building our production process and quality checking at the facility in China of 3 Phase & Single Phase supporting chargers to comply with international infrastructure. The 6 places this funding will be used most will be :

  1. Reducing product cost (complete)
  2. 10kw charger small enough to fit on a motorcycle (complete)
  3. Skid pan or bash pan strong enough to support motorcycle riding (complete)
  4. High power inlets and adapters for around the world (complete)
  5. Assembly of all parts into a final product 
  6. Packaging and logistics for product safety during shipment 

 

 

The Perks we are offering, for your support in this, are designed to give you exclusive access to the latest products with the highest quality. We understand that a lot of you may already have our v2.5 SuperChargers which were manufactured here in the states and have the same amount of power. For users who already have our v2.5 we have added in stickers, bike tuning, track days, custom rides with Brandon and Terry, or even training from Brandon directly. And, if none of these sound amazing to you, but you still want to support this awesome company and its progress in the EV industry, you can always hit the pink "BACK IT" button in the upper right side of this page to show us your support without one of the perks too!

For those of you who are still slow charging with just the Zero onboard charger, or charge tank, we have perks that get you everything you need and more for SuperCharging and Zero Touring training.
 

More Than Meets the Eye


Supporting this product and production process not only ensures that SuperChargers will be available for users across the globe in a timely fashion, but also ensures that the digiNow team can have a little breathing room to develop new products to better your EV.


Currently there is no other company coming up with products as safe or game changing as digiNow. We do it because we love EVs and our passion allows us to see the problems we and others have, and come up with fun, innovative solutions for them. We are more than happy to keep building the products in house ourselves, but we would much rather get our products made with our partners' help so we can keep making awesome solutions for everyone! 

 

International Testing


In an effort to insure the highest quality builds, we have tested all our pre-production products for over 1 million miles in :

  • United States
  • Germany
  • Netherlands
  • Belgium
  • Denmark
  • United Kingdom
  • Mexico
  • New Zealand
  • Australia
  • Japan
  • Indonesia
  • Thailand
  • Bahamas

 

 
 
 
 

 

Risks & Challenges


So far, in our 4 years developing the SuperCharger, we have faced MANY risks and challenges. Sourcing quality parts and finding trustworthy vendors has been very difficult. We have had vendors switch product quality on us, and even vendors trying to sell our tech to other companies. We have had to learn about all the individual charge station companies, their choices in implementing the charging standards, as well as international oddities about charging.

Having worked with our partners since 2016 and developing a relationship with their teams, we feel confident we finally have a good set of partners we can rely on. Our teams have good communication, and when we run across difficulties in sourcing materials, parts, or simplifying complicated solutions, we are able to work to successfully overcome any challenge we've come across so far.​ 

 

Community Support
 

We greatly appreciate support from users, like the amazing Terry Hershner putting the chargers through their paces on cross country motorcycle trips with his trusty companion "Charger" the Moto-Husky, and Ben Rich Electric Biker riding from Florida to Maine in all the trecherous weather of the East Coast.
These guys really help us with testing and knowledge-transfer that needs to happen for newer customers who aren't Seasoned Veterans of Electric Touring.

We also have had help with interim documentation from riders such as Brian T. Rice and Kelly Cash. Their help in keeping the community informed on how to use their chargers until this point has been immense and no amount of thanks could ever suffice for their efforts in documenting not just the hardware, but also the apps and how to control your chargers from your phone. Now, with the production units ready, we can finally take full advantage of the community service provided here for official documentation.

But, most importantly, we need to thank members of the community like DoctorBass who helped us design and bring the v2.5 pan to a production ready state. DoctorBass started the project of his own accord after discussing with me what we were working on. His skill and expertise with military-grade products lead to fascinating teamwork and testing which has brought not only a better charger to market, but has allowed us to improve upon Zero motorcycles dramatically.
 

Finally, a big thank you to Luke Workman and the other members of the Electric Wizards Association (EWA, straight out of Santa Cruz).  We cannot thank EVERYONE in the community enough for their individual support in all the ways they have provided it.

Thank you.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you all for all of your help!


Refrence articles :
 

  1. https://www.motorcycle.com/features/diginow-zero-super-charger-2.html
  2. https://blog.motorcycle.com/2018/06/15/electric/diginow-announces-supercharger-v2-5-zero-motorcycles/amp/
  3. https://www.autoblog.com/2017/01/19/diginow-super-charger-v2-tesla-ev/
  4. https://zeromanual.com/wiki/DigiNow/Super_Charger_V2
  5. https://www.businessinsider.com/every-summer-i-take-long-road-trips-on-my-electric-motorcycle-2017-10
  6. https://www.electrans.co.uk/diginow-launches-supercharger-for-zero-motorcycles/
  7. https://www.motorcycle.com/manufacturer/zero/th...
