story:
About Us

We, Team Eurus of Zewail City, are a team of 14 renewable energy engineering students at the University of Science and Technology, Zewail City. Our team members have very high technical skills, by national and international standards. Our team members have previously participated in global competitions such as Global Hybrid-Electric cars competition, Minesweepers Competition, Formula Student UK Competition, and many others. Our members have performed significantly well and achieved top places. 

 

 

About the Competition

The International Small Wind Turbine Contest (ISWTC) is a an annual contest in which University student teams from different countries can compete in designing and building the best performing Small Wind Turbine. The competition has main three phases: 

  1. Design phase (Completed with outstanding theoretical results and analysis)
    Teams should write a full design report in which they describe their design choices, based on theoretical research. In this report they give a description of all systems (mechanical, electrical, electronic and safety systems), provide insight in the affordability, provide mathematical evidence of the turbines capability of withstanding certain load cases etc. The jury will take into account the design report as well as the actual turbine performance in their decision for the overall best design. The jury is formed by independent experts from the wind energy industry.
     
  2. Building Phase (In progress)
     The teams will now apply their designs. As a finale of this part, the small wind turbines will be put to the test in the wind tunnel at the Technical University in Delft. For a few days, the wind tunnel at the Technical University in Delft will be used to test the performance of the competing small turbines. The turbines will first be inspected on electronics safety and mechanical safety systems, then the turbines will be tested in the wind tunnel. The power output of the turbines is measured and the goal is to get the best power production.
  3. Final phase, on the last day of contest week, the teams which have tested their turbines in Delft, will move to the Hanze UAS for a final symposium where they can present their creations to an audience. Here a jury of wind energy experts will assess the presentations, together with their performance in the tunnel and their initial design report to conclude a final winner of the contest.

 

Why ISWTC competition?

  • Participating in such an established competition highly develops the undergrad educational system in Egypt through applying theoretical concepts on a professional level through the small wind turbine which applies on the large scale turbines.
  • We are competing with pioneer and highest research universities in renewable energy in the world. Hopefully, this establishes Egypt in the field.
  • Our participation in such competition supports Egyptian undergrad students and youth to play a vital role in Egypt's 2030 vision. This vision targets making 45% of Egypt's power source from renewable Energy according to the National Renewable Energy Authority (NREA) reports. 

 

What We Need?

We are eager to professionally participate and win the competition. Yet, we have a serious financial situation, on grounds of: 

  • Since the renewable energy field is relatively new, we barely find our components in local markets. We seek most of our items in global markets; this means foreign expensive currency, taxes, and shipping expenses.
  • Our Wind Turbine manufacturing phase is almost completed. We will then need to cover the expenses of shipping to the Netherlands for the competition.
  • On the other hand, each contribution is important and even if the target is not reached, we are seeking all ways to get fund and we will make use of each contribution.
  • We need to cover flight expenses for five team members.

 

The Impact

Prototyping our theoretical results will lead to a wind turbine made by Egyptian undergrad students with 40% power coefficient.

Renewable energy is the future of the world’s energy. Supporting renewable energy initiatives will raise awareness, generate clean energy, boost the Egyptian economy, increase job chances, and partially cure global warming.

 

Total Budget

The total budget needed for manufacturing and shipping the Wind Turbine and travelling to the Netherlands is around  6800$ (113000 EGP) divided as follows:

  • Competition Registration                  680 $        (11300 EGP)    
  • Wind Turbine Body Structure          460 $        (7700  EGP)
  • Mechanical connections                    75 $           (1200 EGP)
  • Electrical Components                       340 $        (5700  EGP)
  • Wind Turbine Round Shipping         1200$       (20000   EGP)
  • Flight Expenses (5 Members)         2950$       (50000  EGP)
  • Accommodation (6 Days)                1100$        (22500   EGP)

 

  **  Our University is partially funding us; however, your contribution is still needed **

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you would like to contribute financially, but the campaign is not a suitable method for you, kindly contact us to provide you with a certified bank account, or whichever any other convenient method. 
  • If you have contacts of potential shipping companies –as partners or sponsors-, or contacts of whoever person/ entity/ institution/ etc. that might support us, kindly let us know.
  • Please help us by sharing this campaign! Your help is much appreciated.

 

Want To Become Our Sponsor?

We have sponsorship benefit packages available too!

note: All Facebook posts (part of social media posts mentioned in the packages below) will be through Zewail City 's official Facebook page that has more than 840,000 followers.

 

Exclusive Main Sponsor 3000$ (50,000 EGP)

The company will solely sponsor the team.

  • Logo included in all social media posts (footer)
  • Logo on T-shirts
  • Logo on the wind Turbine.
  • Availability of our Wind Turbine at corporate events
  • Mentioning in all media interviews, public appearances and presentations
  • Mentioning in any paper publications

 

Golden: 1500$ (25,000 EGP)

  • Logo included in all social media posts (footer)
  • Logo on T-shirts
  • Logo on the Wind Turbine
  • Mentioning in all media interviews, public appearances and presentations
  • Availability of our Wind Turbine at corporate events

 

Silver: 1200$ (20,000 EGP)

  • Logo included in all social media posts (footer)
  • Large-sized Logo on T-shirts
  • Medium-sized Logo on the Wind Turbine

 

Bronze: 700$ (12000 EGP)

  • Logo included in all social media posts (footer)
  • Small-sized Logo on T-shirts
  • Small-sized Logo on the Wind Turbine

 

Simply put, if it wasn’t for faithful supporters like you, we wouldn’t exist. Thank you for taking the time to learn more about who we are and what we do. If you'd like more information, please email:

Abdelrahman Abbas:       s-abdelrahman-abbas@zewailcity.edu.eg

Ibrahim Goda:                     s-ibrahem_goda@zewailcity.edu.eg

Ahmed ElSafty:                   s-ahmed.elsafty@zewailcity.edu.eg

____

Sincerely, 

___________________________________________________________________________

 

نحن طلاب جامعة زويل للعلوم والتكنولوجيا -قسم هندسة الطاقة المتجددة. الفريق مكون من 12 طالب على أعلى مستوى من الكفاءة الأكاديمية والتقنية. أفراد الفيق شاركوا من قبل في عدة مسابقات محلية ودولية مثل السباق العالمي للسيارات المهجنةGHEC'19   ومسابقة تصنيع سيارات الفورميلا العالمية بانجلترا Formula Student UK  و مسابقة الكشف عن الألغام Minesweepers. بالإضافة للعديد من المسابقات الدولية والمحلية الأخرى وتحقيق مراكز أولى وكسر العديد من الأرقام القياسية.

 

عن المسابقة

المسابقة الدولية لطواحين الهواء الصغيرة هي مسابقة دولية سنوية يشارك فيها طلبة جامعيين من دول مختلفة يتنافسون على تصميم طاحونة هواء صغيرة تعمل بأفضل أداء

  1. مرحلة التصميم (تم الانتهاء منها وقد حصلنا على نتائج نظرية مبهرة )

فى هذه المرحلة تقوم الفرق بكتابة تقرير عن التصميم الخاص بهم موضحين به اختياراتهم للتصميم مستندين على أبحاث ونظريات علمية. ويقدمون تقرير عن الأنظمة الإلكترونية وأنظمة الأمان الخاصة بالطاحونة. ويقدم المتسابقون أيضًا أدلة وحسابات رياضية لتقييم تحمل الطاحونة للأحمال المختلفة. ويقوم الحكام بتقييم التقرير الذي يقدمه المتسابقون بجانب الأداء الفعلى للطاحونة. الحكام هم نخبة من خبراء الطاقة المتجددة واختصاصًا الطاقة الناتجة عن الرياح.

  1. مرحلة صناعة النموذج (قيد التطوير)

تقوم الفرق فى هذه المرحلة ببناء النموذج الفعلى للطاحونة ويقومون باختبار هذا النموذج فى ممر الرياح (wind tunnel) فى الجامعة التقنية بمدينة Delft. ستخضع الطواحين أولا  لإختبارات الأمان الخاصة بأنظمتها الإلكترونية والميكانيكية وبعد ذلك سيتم اختبار أدائها فى ممرات الهواء وسيتم قياس مقدار الطاقة الناتجة عن الطاحونة وهدفنا هو أن نحصل على أفضل انتاج للطاقة بأعلى كفاءة وتمكنا من استخراج 40% من الطاقة الموجودة في الرياح علما بأن أقصى رقم يمكن استخراجه هو 59 والذي لم يتم الوصول له على مستوى العالم حتى الآن.

  1.  المرحلة الأخيرة واللتي تُعْقَد في اليوم الأخير من المسابقة تقوم الفرق -اللتي قامت باختبار طواحينها في جامعة TU Delft- بالإنتقال لجامعة Hanze US  لمناقشة أخيرة حيث تقوم الفرق بعرض مشاريعهم للحضور. وهنا يأتي دور هيئة من المختصين في مجال الطاقة المتجددة واختصاصًا طاقة الرياح لتحكيم عرض المشاريع عن طريق القيام تقييم جميع المراحل السابقة والمرحلة الحالية ومن ثَمَّ إعلان الفائز بالمسابقة.

 

 

ماذا نحتاج
 

نحن شديدوا الحرص على المشاركة في المسابقة والحصول على المركز الأول. ولكن هناك بعض الصعوبات المادية:

  • نظرا لظهور سوق الطاقة المتجددة حديثا فإنا لا نجد القطع والأجزاء اللازمة لصناعة الطاحونة في الأسواق المحلية. ولكن نجدها في الأسواق الدولية مما كلف غلاء الأسعار بالإضافة إلى ضرائب ومصاريف شحن إضافية.
  • أوشك انتهاء العمل على الطاحونة الهوائية ويلزم الحصول على تكلفت شحنها إلى هولاندا للمنافسة في المسابقة.
  • نحن نعمل بأعلى درجة من الإحترافية مع مراعاة تحسين الجانب الإقتصادي في الأدوات. كل مشاركة من مشاركتكم في غاية الأهمية. حتى وإن وصلنا لهدف الحملة فإن المزيد من دعمكم يعني زيادة كفاءة ودقة التصنيع واقتصاد الوقت. لذا كل دعم يعتبر مساهمة لتطوير أبحاث الطاقة المتجددة في مصر.
  • على الناحية الأخرى وحتى إن لم يتم الوصول لهدف الحملة فسنحاول جاهدين إستغلال كل دعم موجود والوصول لكل دعم متاح بطرق أخرى.
  • نحتاج أيضا إلى إلى توفير مصاريف المعيشة الأساسية اليومية لخمس أعضاء من الفريق وهو أقل عدد لازم لتجميع التربينة وتشغيلها.

 

أثر المشروع

صناعة نموذج أولي من نتائجنا النظرية سيعد تصنيع طاحونة هوائة بأيدي طلبة جامعيين مصريين قادرة على استخلاص 40% من من طاقة الرياح مع العلم أن أقصى رقم نظريا يمكن استخلاصه من الرياح هو 59% وهو الرقم الذي لم يصل له احد في العالم كله حتى الآن ولا حتى الشركات العملاقة في مجال التربينات الهوائية.

تعد الطاقة المتجددة هي المصدر المستقبلي للكوكب. وقيمكم بدعمها سيقوم بزيادة الوعي وتقدم الإقتصاد المصري وزيادة فرص العمل في هذا المجال ويعالج جزئيا الإحتباس الحراري.
                                                       

إجمالي التكلفة

الميزانية الكاملة اللتي يحتاجها الفريق للتصنيع وشحن الطاحونة والسفر إلى هولاندا تقدر بحوالي ..... مقسم إلى الآتي:

  • تسجيل المسابقة                                     680      دولار        (11300 جنيه مصري)    
  • صناعة جسم الطاحونة الهوائية                 460      دولار        (7700  جنيه مصري)
  • الوصلات الميكانيكية بين الأجزاء             75          دولار        (1200 جنيه مصري)
  • المكونات الكهربية                                 340      دولار        (5700  جنيه مصري)
  • تكلفة شحن الطاحونة لهولاندا                   1200    دولار        (20000   جنيه مصري)
  • تكلفة الطيران لخمس أفراد                       2950   دولار       (50000  جنيه مصري)
  • تكلفة الإقمة لخمس أفراد في فترة المسابقة   1100    دولار        (22500   جنيه مصري)

طرق أخرى للمساعدة

  • إذا كنت ترغب في المساهمة مالياً ، لكن الحملة ليست الطريقة المُثلى ، يرجى الاتصال بنا لتزويدك بحساب بنكي، أو أي طريقة أخرى ملائمة لك.
  • إذا كان لديك معلومات عن شركات شحن محتملة - كشريكة أو راعية للفريق - أو جهات اتصال  لأي شخص / كيان /مؤسسة/ إلخ.. قد تدعمنا ، يمكنك مشاركتنا بذلك.

 

!نشر هذه الحملة هو جزء كبير من الدعم. رجاء نشرها بقدر الإمكان

 

___________________________________________________________________________

 

هل تريد أن تكون من الرعاة؟

ملحوظة: جميع منشورات الفيسبوك (واللتي هي جزء من منشورات مواقع التواصل الإجتماعي المذكورة بالأسفل) ستكون من الصفحة الرسمية لمدينة زويل للعلوم والتكنولوجيا واللتي يقوم بمتابعتها أكثر من 830,000 متابع

الراعي الرئيسي 

.سيقوم منفرداً برعاية الفريق​

  •  وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي
  •  وضع الشعار على الملابس الرسمية للفريق
  •  وضع الشعار  بطول جناح الطائرة
  • إمكانية توافر الطاحونة الهوائية في الأحداث الهامة للشركة 
  •  ذكر الراعي في جميع المقابلات الإعلامية والعروض التقديمية
  •  ذكر الراعي في أي منشورات بحثية

(الراعي الذهبي: 1500 دولار ( 25,000 جنيه 

• وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي
• وضع شعار كبير الحجم على الملابس الرسمية للفريق
• وضع الشعار متوسط الحجم على الطاحونة

 

 

( الراعي الفضي : 1200 دولار ( 20,000 جنيه مصري

• وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي
• وضع شعار صغير الحجم على الملابس الرسمية للفريق
• وضع الشعار صغير الحجم على الطاحونة

 (الراعي البرونزي : 700 دولار( 12000 جنيه مصري

• وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي
• وضع الشعار صغير الحجم على الطاحونة
story_txt:
About UsWe, Team Eurus of Zewail City, are a team of 14 renewable energy engineering students at the University of Science and Technology, Zewail City. Our team members have very high technical skills, by national and international standards. Our team members have previously participated in global competitions such as Global Hybrid-Electric cars competition, Minesweepers Competition, Formula Student UK Competition, and many others. Our members have performed significantly well and achieved top places.   About the CompetitionThe International Small Wind Turbine Contest (ISWTC) is a an annual contest in which University student teams from different countries can compete in designing and building the best performing Small Wind Turbine. The competition has main three phases: 

Design phase (Completed with outstanding theoretical results and analysis)Teams should write a full design report in which they describe their design choices, based on theoretical research. In this report they give a description of all systems (mechanical, electrical, electronic and safety systems), provide insight in the affordability, provide mathematical evidence of the turbines capability of withstanding certain load cases etc. The jury will take into account the design report as well as the actual turbine performance in their decision for the overall best design. The jury is formed by independent experts from the wind energy industry. 

Building Phase (In progress) The teams will now apply their designs. As a finale of this part, the small wind turbines will be put to the test in the wind tunnel at the Technical University in Delft. For a few days, the wind tunnel at the Technical University in Delft will be used to test the performance of the competing small turbines. The turbines will first be inspected on electronics safety and mechanical safety systems, then the turbines will be tested in the wind tunnel. The power output of the turbines is measured and the goal is to get the best power production.


Final phase, on the last day of contest week, the teams which have tested their turbines in Delft, will move to the Hanze UAS for a final symposium where they can present their creations to an audience. Here a jury of wind energy experts will assess the presentations, together with their performance in the tunnel and their initial design report to conclude a final winner of the contest.
 Why ISWTC competition?
Participating in such an established competition highly develops the undergrad educational system in Egypt through applying theoretical concepts on a professional level through the small wind turbine which applies on the large scale turbines.
We are competing with pioneer and highest research universities in renewable energy in the world. Hopefully, this establishes Egypt in the field.
Our participation in such competition supports Egyptian undergrad students and youth to play a vital role in Egypt's 2030 vision. This vision targets making 45% of Egypt's power source from renewable Energy according to the National Renewable Energy Authority (NREA) reports. 
 What We Need?We are eager to professionally participate and win the competition. Yet, we have a serious financial situation, on grounds of: 
Since the renewable energy field is relatively new, we barely find our components in local markets. We seek most of our items in global markets; this means foreign expensive currency, taxes, and shipping expenses.
Our Wind Turbine manufacturing phase is almost completed. We will then need to cover the expenses of shipping to the Netherlands for the competition.
On the other hand, each contribution is important and even if the target is not reached, we are seeking all ways to get fund and we will make use of each contribution.
We need to cover flight expenses for five team members.
 The ImpactPrototyping our theoretical results will lead to a wind turbine made by Egyptian undergrad students with 40% power coefficient.Renewable energy is the future of the world’s energy. Supporting renewable energy initiatives will raise awareness, generate clean energy, boost the Egyptian economy, increase job chances, and partially cure global warming. Total BudgetThe total budget needed for manufacturing and shipping the Wind Turbine and travelling to the Netherlands is around  6800$ (113000 EGP) divided as follows:
Competition Registration                  680 $        (11300 EGP)    
Wind Turbine Body Structure          460 $        (7700  EGP)
Mechanical connections                    75 $           (1200 EGP)
Electrical Components                       340 $        (5700  EGP)
Wind Turbine Round Shipping         1200$       (20000   EGP)
Flight Expenses (5 Members)         2950$       (50000  EGP)
Accommodation (6 Days)                1100$        (22500   EGP)
   **  Our University is partially funding us; however, your contribution is still needed **Other Ways You Can Help
If you would like to contribute financially, but the campaign is not a suitable method for you, kindly contact us to provide you with a certified bank account, or whichever any other convenient method. 
If you have contacts of potential shipping companies –as partners or sponsors-, or contacts of whoever person/ entity/ institution/ etc. that might support us, kindly let us know.
Please help us by sharing this campaign! Your help is much appreciated.
 Want To Become Our Sponsor?We have sponsorship benefit packages available too!note: All Facebook posts (part of social media posts mentioned in the packages below) will be through Zewail City 's official Facebook page that has more than 840,000 followers. Exclusive Main Sponsor 3000$ (50,000 EGP)The company will solely sponsor the team.

على الناحية الأخرى وحتى إن لم يتم الوصول لهدف الحملة فسنحاول جاهدين إستغلال كل دعم موجود والوصول لكل دعم متاح بطرق أخرى.
نحتاج أيضا إلى إلى توفير مصاريف المعيشة الأساسية اليومية لخمس أعضاء من الفريق وهو أقل عدد لازم لتجميع التربينة وتشغيلها.
 أثر المشروعصناعة نموذج أولي من نتائجنا النظرية سيعد تصنيع طاحونة هوائة بأيدي طلبة جامعيين مصريين قادرة على استخلاص 40% من من طاقة الرياح مع العلم أن أقصى رقم نظريا يمكن استخلاصه من الرياح هو 59% وهو الرقم الذي لم يصل له احد في العالم كله حتى الآن ولا حتى الشركات العملاقة في مجال التربينات الهوائية.تعد الطاقة المتجددة هي المصدر المستقبلي للكوكب. وقيمكم بدعمها سيقوم بزيادة الوعي وتقدم الإقتصاد المصري وزيادة فرص العمل في هذا المجال ويعالج جزئيا الإحتباس الحراري.                                                       إجمالي التكلفةالميزانية الكاملة اللتي يحتاجها الفريق للتصنيع وشحن الطاحونة والسفر إلى هولاندا تقدر بحوالي ..... مقسم إلى الآتي:
تسجيل المسابقة                                     680      دولار        (11300 جنيه مصري)    
صناعة جسم الطاحونة الهوائية                 460      دولار        (7700  جنيه مصري)
الوصلات الميكانيكية بين الأجزاء             75          دولار        (1200 جنيه مصري)
المكونات الكهربية                                 340      دولار        (5700  جنيه مصري)
تكلفة شحن الطاحونة لهولاندا                   1200    دولار        (20000   جنيه مصري)
تكلفة الطيران لخمس أفراد                       2950   دولار       (50000  جنيه مصري)
تكلفة الإقمة لخمس أفراد في فترة المسابقة   1100    دولار        (22500   جنيه مصري)
طرق أخرى للمساعدة
إذا كنت ترغب في المساهمة مالياً ، لكن الحملة ليست الطريقة المُثلى ، يرجى الاتصال بنا لتزويدك بحساب بنكي، أو أي طريقة أخرى ملائمة لك.
إذا كان لديك معلومات عن شركات شحن محتملة - كشريكة أو راعية للفريق - أو جهات اتصال  لأي شخص / كيان /مؤسسة/ إلخ.. قد تدعمنا ، يمكنك مشاركتنا بذلك.
 !نشر هذه الحملة هو جزء كبير من الدعم. رجاء نشرها بقدر الإمكان ___________________________________________________________________________ هل تريد أن تكون من الرعاة؟ملحوظة: جميع منشورات الفيسبوك (واللتي هي جزء من منشورات مواقع التواصل الإجتماعي المذكورة بالأسفل) ستكون من الصفحة الرسمية لمدينة زويل للعلوم والتكنولوجيا واللتي يقوم بمتابعتها أكثر من 830,000 متابعالراعي الرئيسي .سيقوم منفرداً برعاية الفريق​
 وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي
 وضع الشعار على الملابس الرسمية للفريق
 وضع الشعار  بطول جناح الطائرة
إمكانية توافر الطاحونة الهوائية في الأحداث الهامة للشركة 
 ذكر الراعي في جميع المقابلات الإعلامية والعروض التقديمية
 ذكر الراعي في أي منشورات بحثية
(الراعي الذهبي: 1500 دولار ( 25,000 جنيه • وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي• وضع شعار كبير الحجم على الملابس الرسمية للفريق• وضع الشعار متوسط الحجم على الطاحونة  ( الراعي الفضي : 1200 دولار ( 20,000 جنيه مصري• وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي• وضع شعار صغير الحجم على الملابس الرسمية للفريق• وضع الشعار صغير الحجم على الطاحونة (الراعي البرونزي : 700 دولار( 12000 جنيه مصري• وضع الشعار على جميع منشورات وسائل الإعلام ومواقع التواصل الاجتماعي• وضع الشعار صغير الحجم على الطاحونة

story:
BACKGROUND

As our civilization grows the need for more energy does as well. The only problem with this is that our main sources of energy, non-renewable resources, are depleting at a faster rate. Research has shown that in the next 70 years the world's entire oil reserves will run out, and if the current consumption of oil continues it will be much less than that. The simple solution is to use renewable resources such as solar and wind power instead, but even with the obvious answer renewable resources only make up around 15% of all the sources of energy used on Earth. Some of the reason we don't just completely convert over to renewable resources is because most of the machines used to harness the energy are large apparatuses that most people don't have access to. So I thought to myself, what if there was a convenient device that allowed anyone to take advantage of the abundance of renewable resources around them? From this thought the AIRBATTERY was created. A light weight and compact device that uses the power of the wind to gather electricity, appropriate for any lifestyle anywhere. I strive to contribute something beneficial to the universe and this small step in cleaning our energy is only the beginning.

WHAT IT IS

The AIRBATTERY is a small and light weight power bank equipped with a small wind turbine used to charge its own battery. The battery can also be charged with a standard micro USB. The device includes one standard USB port. It holds a 12000 mah capacity battery and supplies 15 watts of power to a device with a 3 amp current. It can be used as a portable battery as well as a continuous source of electrical power.

USES

 

 

The AIRBATTERY is perfect for any moving vehicle or bike because it allows you to charge devices on the go. It could also useful in emergencies like stormy weather that can cause outages. Since the wind is so strong simply mount it outside a window and you can supply yourself with energy. 

Other uses include: 

  • biking / motor sports;
  • hiking at high altitudes;
  • winter sports such as skiing or snowboarding on mountains;
  • parasailing;
  • hang gliding;
  • etc.

Anywhere with a substantial amount of wind gives a use to the AIRBATTERY.

HOW IT WORKS

 

 

Atop the power bank section of the AIRBATTERY is a miniature wind turbine with a propeller at the end. Once the device picks up 23-28 mph (37-45 kmh) winds the propeller starts spinning the turbine, the battery will begin to charge, and the USB port receives power. 23-28 mph winds is about 35-40 mph (56-64 kmh) when driving in a car in ordinary weather.

CURRENT STATE OF DEVICE

 

The AIRBATTERY is currently in its prototype stage and almost completely made out of 3D printed plastics. I plan on making several improvements to the device to implement in the future with the campaign funding. Changes such as:

  • water proofing;
  • adding more circuitry and insulation to the device for increased weather resistance and hydro-electrical compatibility for uses in water and natural disaster;
  • making the device out of a better looking material rather than 3D printed plastics;
  • making it so less torque is required to spin the turbine while still generating a sufficient amount of energy;
  • more standard USB ports;
  • a better looking vehicle mount;
  • more color schemes;
  • and more as development continues.

INVENTOR AND ENGINEER

Nnaji Obinelo - 

I am currently a senior in high school with an interest in mechanical and aerospace engineering, and a goal of working in these fields. I dream of a world unbound by restrictions like energy, a world free to invent and innovate without limit, where no problem is unsolvable.

I created the AIRBATTERY in light of these aspirations and to apply my knowledge in the field of engineering. I also wanted to make an imprint, as small as it may be, on the clean energy effort.

 WHY THE AIRBATTERY CAME TO INDIEGOGO

I came in request of funding for the changes I would like to make to this current prototype of the AIRBATTERY for the purpose of making it an even better device. I also wanted to get the device out to the public to shed some light on clean energy and the idea of completely converting to clean energy for a more efficient world. I am still a senior in high school and do not have the connections or team for large scale production of the AIRBATTERY and hope to work with larger companies in the future to make the AIRBATTERY available to all, which is also a reason why there are only a small amount of rewards available.

STRETCH GOALS

Once the project's goal had been reached 100% of any stretch money will go towards  a nonprofit or charity that is focused on clean energy.

Possible Organizations:

  • 10:10 , https://1010uk.org/

  • TREC Education , https://treceducation.ca/

  • Pollinate Energy , https://pollinateenergy.org/

  • Practical Action , http://practicalaction.org/

  • American Council on Renewable Energy , https://www.acore.org/

  • Several Others

The backers get to decide where the money goes. I will conduct an online straw poll with a list of these organizations that each backer can choose from.

NO MONEY NO PROBLEM

Money isn't necessary to help the project. I would be grateful for any word of mouth online or in public you can provide about the device and campaign.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Even though I am still a student I am more than capable of building all the AIRBATTERYs I have promised but even still, like with all projects, there are risks and challenges. Although rest assured they can be overcome.

The main challenge is with the voltage regulation of the power supply module of the device. Every ounce in a while it will cause slow charge times. I am currently trying to fix this problem before shipping.

Another risk of the project is getting the AIRBATTERYs to the generous backers in a timely manner after the campaign is finished. It is not my intention to have late delivery dates but due to multiple factors it is a possibility. 

Even though there are risks and challenges I will keep you updated during the course of the project. I look forward to the outcome of this campaign and opportunities to come.

Kokong S is an autonomous smart socket. That means it automatically switches off the power when it isn’t needed. Kokong S makes your home or office safer. Plus, it saves energy and money. All without you having to do anything. No app needed.

BBC World News called Kokong: "One of the only twenty tech products you need to bother about in 2019".

Charges devices Automatically

Once your device is connected, Kokong turns power "on" to charge it. Once fully charged, Kokong automatically disconnects power. It also prevents any power surges as well as acting as a safeguard against devices catching on fire. Families can sleep safe thanks to Kokong.

 

Better Battery Life For All Your Devices

Kokong disconnects the power supply once your device is fully charged. This prevents trickle charging and prolongs the lifetime and performance of your equipment and batteries.

 

Simple, no app needed!

Kokong is fully autonomous and does not require any installation or app. Just plug it in and it does the work for you. We are bringing an app in late 2019 that will allow you to monitor your energy savings and charging patterns.

 

Simply Plug and Play

Kokong is so easy anyone can use it,  simply plug your devices in and let Kokong do the rest. 

 

Charges Devices Safely

We charge more and more devices in the home and offices. Kokong supervises the charging process so that you can charge anything safely.  Whether you are out, or asleep, or just doing your thing, Kokong does the job for you.

 

No Longer Spend Money On Power You Don't Use
Kokong disconnects the power supply once your device is fully charged or goes into standby mode. Such "vampire power" consumption costs an average household 220$ per year.

Hotels will be safer and save energy by installing Kokong sockets in their rooms.
Your office will be ‘off’ after hours, not sucking vampire power at night when there is no one there.
 

It takes about a second for Kokong to work out what kind of device is being inserted. Then, it adapts to the devices and chargers you have plugged into it. Kokong switches off the power when your devices are fully charged, meaning you can sleep well at night, plus save unneeded energy consumption. This also prolongs battery life.

It also has a neat circular recess in the socket, so it`s easy to plug stuff in even in the dark or in tight spots. With this feature, the plug will always easily go right in. 

Kokong was designed and developed in Norway. It’s inspired by nature and human habits. When we designed Kokong, the idea was to put humans back in harmony with nature and technology.

The electronics were developed by Lightcircle engineers, who have a track record from aerospace and defense electronics. Kokong is made of the highest quality components in the world. This guarantees a safe, high-quality device you can rely on. And as you can see, we´re a partner with Arrow Electronics - and "Certified by Arrow".

We are now all ready to manufacture and then ship Kokong to you. Take a look at this cool Kokong mould below:
 

Kokong boxes all dressed up and ready to meet new owners : -)

 

Every night when I used to say goodnight to my daughter, their smartphone and tablet were typically lying on the bed charging, connected to multiple plugs by the bed.

Given the escalation in the number of fires, close-calls and meltdowns we read about in the media, and the fact that most wall sockets and multipliers are pretty basic and not rigged to handle all the electronics we use in 2019, I decided to change that.

With this product I wanted to remove the human factor, so that our homes would become safer, our electrical bills a bit lower, and our lives a bit easier.

So, when we developed Kokong we wanted a product that was just as effective if used by a small child, a techie buff or old age pensioners in a home.

Invented and designed in Scandinavia, we wanted it to nicely fit into the modern home, but also be inspired by Norwegian nature.   We`re proud of bringing the ideas of harmony with nature, simplicity, and design into one product.

Kokong will serve you in at least three key ways:

1) Kokong turns off power automatically when it is not needed. And "on", when it is. By doing this, we reduce energy consumption, impacting our bills. Hence, we change the way we use electricity, from "always on" to "on demand".

2) Kokong will prolong the battery life of your mobile phone or other devices.

3) By direct consequence of the above, Kokong will prevent risks of fires and other hazards. Kokong increases safety in our homes.

So know this: you`re investing in a product that`s a cool and smart accessory for your devices, but that`s also pretty cool and smart for the planet.

We are the first to make it. You are the first to benefit from it. 

We've had a number of Press coverage BBC called us "One of the top twenty tech products you need in 2019" 

We've had a number of Press coverage BBC called us "One of the top twenty tech products you need in 2019" 

 

WE HAVE EUROPEAN, USA AND UK/UAE PLUG SPECIFICATIONS YOU CAN CHOOSE YOUR PLUG WHEN MAKING YOUR ORDER.

 

  • Carefully selected Nordic colors, inspired by Norwegian and Arctic nature.
  • Certified, quality textile cable (1,5m, 16A)
  • 230VAC to 5VDC and 3.3VDC (US version 110V)
  • Silicon anti-slip sole for softness against the surface and extra stability
  • LED light guides indicating the power mode
  • Circular recess for easy-inserting plugs in the dark or when you have to reach under the night table, sofa etc.
  • Kokong S has been programmed to a 10A capacity, meaning you can have 10A going through either one port or both ports together.
  • Kokong disconnects when it detects power that is not needed, saving you and the environment from power waste.
  • Kokong works by way of detection and preprogramming. No Wi-fi connection or Bluetooth needed.
  • High quality, UV resistant plastic casing (Alcom AWL 109/15 UV)
  • Operating conditions: -20 - 40 °C
  • Storage conditions: -30 - 70 °C

  • $69 (retail price $94.95)
  • $59 (Early bird special offer)
  • $49 (Very early-bird)

  • February - special offers live on Indiegogo
  • March - production of Kokong European version starts
  • April - delivery of the European version
  • May - production, and delivery of Kokong US version
  • June - production and delivery of UK & UAE (type G plug) version.

 

  • We are already "Certified by Arrow", but we are still in final stages of UL certification, and this is scheduled for completion in March for the type C/F (European version).
  • Exact delivery of US version is planned for May. This will be finally confirmed in April.
  • Type G (UK, UAE) will be available in June 2019

story:
Everyone Needs Water and Power

At Chaac Technologies, Inc. we are building the future of water and power for all. Our team has developed a prototype that can provide water and power in one system and we plan to provide our technology to customers in 2021. 

Developing this prototype was challenging and we learned building for the future requires risk, hope, and community. Chaac was founded and will continue to operate on a social-impact charter. Our team at Chaac is asking for your help to support our efforts of building a better tomorrow for us all. A future where no community goes thirsty or hungry. 

The Impact

Our system can be used in many ways that will have a tremendous impact on local economies, the environment, and most importantly to people.  From how communities are developed to how we produce goods or grow our food.   

Our goal is to implement our system in ways that have the most impact on people and society. This includes communities where people have limited access to clean water and to farmers around the world who use the latest technologies to produce food for fast growing populations.

If this sounds ambitious - it is.  We aim for nothing less than a revolutionary product.

www.chaactech.com 

 

Prototype

The first water-producing prototype system has been developed and tested by our engineering team.  We are now optimizing the system for better efficiencies.  We have designed and are fabricating a new electrical turbine based off of tests on the first system.  The prototype is capable of being loaded onto a trailer or truck.

We have already secured one patent for certain aspects of our system and have three more pending.  

Beneficial side effects are that we are able to remove excess moisture in contained environments - which is helpful for many industries - and, the production of an abundance of compressed air which can be used for pneumatic use, HVAC, or a variety of other needs.

As we work towards a production system this will become smaller and more efficient to run.  We are also working on integrations with cutting-edge waste-stream recyclers so this system may eventually produce water and electricity from trash or bio-mass with little to no environmental impact.

Uses

Our first focus is the advanced agricultural field.  Hydroponics and sustainable greenhouse manufacturers and inventors are very interested in a product that can supply their basic needs.  As of this launch, we have already secured several commitments for this system once it is available.  This could lead to an entire revolution of off-grid, fully sustainable, locally-produced produce with smaller footprints and that are more ecologically friendly. 

The oranges you buy at the market could be grown just a few miles down the road from you in organic conditions, even in harsh climates.  Cheaper, more sustainable, and better tasting.

We also have found a major market with developing nations and areas with limited access to water and power.  There are many areas of the world where it is simply not possible to get access to these fundamental resources due to a variety of reasons. 

Beyond that, we see uses for a variety of different uses that will improve our daily lives.  Reliable and renewable access to fundamental utilities will allow local manufacturing of goods to thrive and allow communities to grow.  One day you may have one attached to your house or servicing your neighborhood, producing clean power and water for your family.

What We Are Looking For

We need help to keep this work going.  The co-founders of this project have dedicated their own savings and investment into this project along with some generous investments from others.  Building this type of system is not cheap and there are still hurdles to overcome - from engineering to legal issues to production.  

What You Get

We wish we could deliver one of these systems to every one of our supporters, but quite honestly, we can't.  Our initial customer base will be communities feeling the pinch of the inability to access clean water and energy.  Eventually, though, we envision our systems servicing a variety of markets, to include your home.

Thus, we've structured our support tiers to reflect that you are helping us build a future system.  We want to acknowledge you in a meaningful way as someone who helped us build something revolutionary.  Also, we don't want to offer swag that will just be clutter (and pollution).  So, we are offering to share a portion of your contribution with Wells of Life, one of our non-profit US 501(c)3 partners who is working to alleviate water access issues in Uganda.  

With COVID-19 threatening Africa, Wells of Life has been delivering soap and repairing wells in Uganda. Your support into our campaign directly supports the Wells of Life team that is assisting and delivering these vitally needed supplies.

We want to be fully transparent - this fundraise is for Chaac to help us continue the research and development of the Water and Power System for commercialization.  Chaac is a for-profit commercial entity.  But, we want to donate a small amount of everyone's backing to this excellent cause.  We think this is a better perk than a t-shirt or coffee mug.

  • $1000 / Ultra Backer: name on "Backers" section of the Chaac website and 20% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.
  • $600 / Mega Backer Plus: name on "Backers" section of the Chaac website and 15% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.
  • $300 / Mega Backer: name on "Backers" section of our website and 10% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.
  • $150 / Super Backer: name on "Backers" section of our website and an 8% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.
  • $50 / Backer:  8% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.
  • $25 / Friend of Chaac:  5% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.

Note: due to system limitations of creating perks, we cannot set ranges.  Any backing above one of the stated thresholds will be honored even if you do not select a perk.  For example, a $500 backing will be honored as a Mega-Backer and we will donate to Wells of Life appropriately.

Risks & Challenges

Any new product and company - especially a revolutionary one - is going to have risks and challenges.  We may run into unanticipated scaling or engineering challenges.  We will have regulatory hurdles that will need to be navigated.  We must manage our cash flow responsibly.  

To manage these risks, we have pulled in an experienced team.  Our co-founders have over 40 years of combined experience and we have retained top-level legal, accounting, and board counsel.    

www.chaactech.com

 

Ways You Can Help

If you cannot back us financially, we understand!  In these difficult times, it is tough.  Even if you cannot contribute, please share what we are doing with your friends and family.  We appreciate every mention, like, and share!
story_txt:
Everyone Needs Water and PowerAt Chaac Technologies, Inc. we are building the future of water and power for all. Our team has developed a prototype that can provide water and power in one system and we plan to provide our technology to customers in 2021. Developing this prototype was challenging and we learned building for the future requires risk, hope, and community. Chaac was founded and will continue to operate on a social-impact charter. Our team at Chaac is asking for your help to support our efforts of building a better tomorrow for us all. A future where no community goes thirsty or hungry. The ImpactOur system can be used in many ways that will have a tremendous impact on local economies, the environment, and most importantly to people.  From how communities are developed to how we produce goods or grow our food.   Our goal is to implement our system in ways that have the most impact on people and society. This includes communities where people have limited access to clean water and to farmers around the world who use the latest technologies to produce food for fast growing populations.If this sounds ambitious - it is.  We aim for nothing less than a revolutionary product.
www.chaactech.com  
Prototype

The first water-producing prototype system has been developed and tested by our engineering team.  We are now optimizing the system for better efficiencies.  We have designed and are fabricating a new electrical turbine based off of tests on the first system.  The prototype is capable of being loaded onto a trailer or truck.
We have already secured one patent for certain aspects of our system and have three more pending.  
Beneficial side effects are that we are able to remove excess moisture in contained environments - which is helpful for many industries - and, the production of an abundance of compressed air which can be used for pneumatic use, HVAC, or a variety of other needs.
As we work towards a production system this will become smaller and more efficient to run.  We are also working on integrations with cutting-edge waste-stream recyclers so this system may eventually produce water and electricity from trash or bio-mass with little to no environmental impact.

Uses

Our first focus is the advanced agricultural field.  Hydroponics and sustainable greenhouse manufacturers and inventors are very interested in a product that can supply their basic needs.  As of this launch, we have already secured several commitments for this system once it is available.  This could lead to an entire revolution of off-grid, fully sustainable, locally-produced produce with smaller footprints and that are more ecologically friendly.  
The oranges you buy at the market could be grown just a few miles down the road from you in organic conditions, even in harsh climates.  Cheaper, more sustainable, and better tasting.
We also have found a major market with developing nations and areas with limited access to water and power.  There are many areas of the world where it is simply not possible to get access to these fundamental resources due to a variety of reasons. 
Beyond that, we see uses for a variety of different uses that will improve our daily lives.  Reliable and renewable access to fundamental utilities will allow local manufacturing of goods to thrive and allow communities to grow.  One day you may have one attached to your house or servicing your neighborhood, producing clean power and water for your family.
What We Are Looking For

We need help to keep this work going.  The co-founders of this project have dedicated their own savings and investment into this project along with some generous investments from others.  Building this type of system is not cheap and there are still hurdles to overcome - from engineering to legal issues to production.  
What You Get
We wish we could deliver one of these systems to every one of our supporters, but quite honestly, we can't.  Our initial customer base will be communities feeling the pinch of the inability to access clean water and energy.  Eventually, though, we envision our systems servicing a variety of markets, to include your home.
Thus, we've structured our support tiers to reflect that you are helping us build a future system.  We want to acknowledge you in a meaningful way as someone who helped us build something revolutionary.  Also, we don't want to offer swag that will just be clutter (and pollution).  So, we are offering to share a portion of your contribution with Wells of Life, one of our non-profit US 501(c)3 partners who is working to alleviate water access issues in Uganda.  
With COVID-19 threatening Africa, Wells of Life has been delivering soap and repairing wells in Uganda. Your support into our campaign directly supports the Wells of Life team that is assisting and delivering these vitally needed supplies.
We want to be fully transparent - this fundraise is for Chaac to help us continue the research and development of the Water and Power System for commercialization.  Chaac is a for-profit commercial entity.  But, we want to donate a small amount of everyone's backing to this excellent cause.  We think this is a better perk than a t-shirt or coffee mug.

$600 / Mega Backer Plus: name on "Backers" section of the Chaac website and 15% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.

$300 / Mega Backer: name on "Backers" section of our website and 10% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.

$150 / Super Backer: name on "Backers" section of our website and an 8% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.

$50 / Backer:  8% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.

$25 / Friend of Chaac:  5% of your backing of Chaac will go to Wells of Life.


Note: due to system limitations of creating perks, we cannot set ranges.  Any backing above one of the stated thresholds will be honored even if you do not select a perk.  For example, a $500 backing will be honored as a Mega-Backer and we will donate to Wells of Life appropriately.
Risks & Challenges

Any new product and company - especially a revolutionary one - is going to have risks and challenges.  We may run into unanticipated scaling or engineering challenges.  We will have regulatory hurdles that will need to be navigated.  We must manage our cash flow responsibly.  
To manage these risks, we have pulled in an experienced team.  Our co-founders have over 40 years of combined experience and we have retained top-level legal, accounting, and board counsel.    
www.chaactech.com
 
Ways You Can Help
If you cannot back us financially, we understand!  In these difficult times, it is tough.  Even if you cannot contribute, please share what we are doing with your friends and family.  We appreciate every mention, like, and share!

story:
In the 21st century

 

We still use lighters for different purposes - cigarettes, incenses, candles, campfire, etc... until you realize how many different types lighters are sitting inside your drawer, how many disposable lighters you have thrown away, how many times you have refilled gas...

 

Meet Flamer!

 

For the last year, we have worked on developing Flamer to work perfectly for daily use.

Flamer has a rechargeable 400 mAh battery built-in that can light up to 20-40 times, so you can enjoy using Flamer without worries.

Flamer's outer shell is made of REAL Rosewood and it’s very hard & strong with an attractive wood grain. You may also polish Flamer to get high sheen if desired.

 

 

Technical Specifications

Dimension: 100mm (3.94") length with 16mm (0.63") diameters
Weight: 50g (1.7oz)
Material: Rosewood + Nichrome wire + Internal components
Battery: 400mah Lithium-ion Battery with Charging Protection
Charging Time: Approximately 1.5 hours
Charging Port: Micro-USB

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Now that we have finished the development process (design, testing & packaging), we are ready to begin production immediately. Our trusted manufacturing partner's production line will start as soon as our campaign is closed. We are expecting all backers will get shipment within 60 days from the closing of our campaign, and of course - the early backers receiving theirs first!


 

Risks & Challenges

 

Flamer is a fairly simple product and it is already in pilot production. We are definitely confident that our production line will run smoothly when our campaign closes. We can guarantee that first shipment will go out no later than November 2019 if we successfully get funded. We are committed to meet expectations without any delay in production and delivery.

 

Share our page to get access to our secret perk - Bamboo Flamer!

story:
Bronco Power Boost

 

     My name is Billy Whittaker and I am the owner of Bronco Electric ,  I installed many types of Gas generators and I realized a few problems that I wanted to address.

The environment and being Eco friendly is very important to me and my first issue was to address that and I came up with a battery operated power system that is refueled by solar panels, wind turbine and/or a set of foot pedals.

I realized this belongs in the average homeowners home and even in countries with unreliable energy grids, thus price point is very important.

Being in the industry I found that many people wanted some type of back up power but they wanted the system to work just as well while away as if they were home, concerns were refrigeration and freezers, garage door openers, alarm system's and out side lighting. Our system works 100% automatic.

I designed a battery back up system that will power the essential circuits in your home, such as refrigerator, freezer, internet, charge phone and lap tops, lights, receptacles, gas heat/gas hot water/gas stove top that need a power source to operate. garage door opener, alarm system and much more. The installation is very easy for a qualified electrician (2 hours typically). the unit is all pre wired and everything is inside the 20"x21" that stand 32" high and sits on wheels next or close to your panel. The suggested 2 solar panels, wind turbine and set of foot pedals are included in the package.

Bronco Power Boost is a Eco friendly, 100% automatic affordably solution to your homes back up energy needs.

Standard package includes Bronco Power Boost unit with 2 , 155AH batteries, 2 100W solar panels and cables, wind turbine and a set of foot pedals.

$3,980 plus tax

Typical install $500

If purchased on here the installation (typical) is free.

Free on site quote and we can do install upon request.

I am ready to order my first set of units as I have tested the proto type on my house very successfully.

story:
Hello, I am Reuel Jacques Gnalega , Inventor and CEO of Galileo Technology, I have teamed up with some of the most forward-thinking professionals here at home with Jerrick Cuahutle and others from around the world to bring you our Galileo Solar Earbuds. We are the most forward-thinking company on the planet solely for the Benefit of You our Customers. Our Earbuds are the most practical and Useful in the World. " We insist on a Quality made Product. From the Middle of New York City to the Hills of Mount Everest, Our Galileo Earbuds have an indisputable Use.

                        A PROTOTYPE PHASE OF GALILEO EARBUDS

 

We believe that with a little Ingenuity and further research, as we are doing now, we should be able to rely on clean energy for the devices that we use every day. Our Planet is in crisis as we hear more and more about Global Warming and its destructive effects. Here at Galileo, We Believe that the Time is Now to use our know-how to offer Consumers and Ourselves a Better Way.

                                           SOLAR-POWERED EARBUDS

We can achieve our Technological goals without as much harming our Home Planet and this is the Introduction to cleaner, smarter devices that will give us True and total Independence. Welcome to the beginning of the Internet of the future.

 

                                             WE OFFER YOU THE FUTURE

story:
Makers4Good presents...

HELIO is an ultra-efficient source of light and power. 100% Solar, 100% Heart. HELIO is great for camping, hiking, emergencies, gazebos, use as a night light, stargazing... or wherever your adventures may take you.

HELIO is based on a simple idea: to design a solar light and power source we could use for adventures and emergencies, and that others in need would use daily.

Makers4Good believes that everyone should have access to safe light and power, so 100% of profits from HELIO will be used to provide light and power to those with limited access to electricity.

Let your adventures help others.

 

Dimensions

Exact details may change as development of HELIO continues. The specifications below reflect current plans.

We currently expect to begin shipping rewards to our Kickstarter backers in mid-December. Pre-orders placed through Indiegogo IN DEMAND are expected to begin shipping in January of 2018.

In order to ensure HELIO will be another fantastic product in our lineup, Makers4Good has assembled a team extremely experienced in electronic product design and manufacturing. Members of our team have built products for Apple, Intel, Google, Microsoft, HP, and Sony. Many individuals and companies have donated their time to help this project succeed.  

All profits from each purchase of HELIO will support nonprofit organizations through our Share Light program. These nonprofit partner organizations have provided solar light and energy through a variety of solutions to those in need for the last 6 years. We have worked with each of them over the last year to learn from their deep in-the-field experience about the needs of those living in regions without reliable energy access.

These nonprofit partners, together with you and HELIO, will bring solar light and energy right where it is needed most.

There are over a billion people worldwide who use candles, kerosene, or wood to light up their lives. These fuels are expensive, dangerous, and make it almost impossible for children to study and to achieve their full potential.

Our three Share Light partners each focus on helping different regions, and our backers can choose which nonprofit will receive their support.

  • Global Brightlight Foundation
  • Lalafofofo
  • One Million Lights

The Global BrightLight Foundation (GBL) provides practical, affordable solar energy solutions to rural communities in Peru and Guatamala that currently lack access to electricity. Makers4Good support will fund and expand their Light a Village program for families in Guatemala. Details on this program are available on GBL's site.

Lalafofofo is a community-based organization raising youth in rural Kilimanjaro out of poverty; and inspiring & challanging American youth to contribute to innovative, real-world, cross-national solutions.

"Light up Tanzania” a Lalafofofo program, in collaboration with Last Mile and Makers4Good, provides solar-powered LED lights to Tanzanian communities living in extreme poverty and 12-hour stretches of darkness.

One Million Lights (OML) distributes thousands of solar lights yearly to people in rural communities with no access to electricity as a safe, clean, affordable alternative to kerosene lamps.

Makers4Good’s and HELIO’s support for OML will provide solar lights to students in the Bopolu Distict, Gbarpolu County in Liberia. We have worked together before on this buy-one-give-one program.

The following nonprofits are also helping to support our mission of bringing safe energy to the world.

Help us by sharing HELIO with your friends!

Know someone who would love HELIO? Help us spread the word by sharing on your social media accounts! Sharing is caring. ❤️
