story:
OMG. That's stupid.

Ok, so it happened. President Donald Trump withdrawing the US from the Paris Climate Agreement is a personal insult against every single person in the world. A tremendously bad decision. Or as the president even more eloquently would put it; I know words. I have the best words, I have the best, but there is no better word than stupid. Right?
 
Right.
 
So, where do we go from here? Well, how about making Donald Trump the first climate positive president in the history of the United States? Yes, we can, and with a little help from you guys – we will.

Game plan. Let's go #climatepositive

We've calculated Trump's footprint to be approximately 140 000 tons of CO2 during his 4 years' presidency ('cause he won't get 8). The average US citizen's footprint during the same period is about 70 tons.

In numbers, we try achieving the following milestones:

USD 1 = 440 lbs / 200 kilos of CO2 offsetting

USD 15.000 = 1 month climate positive Trump (3000 tons of CO2)

USD 105.000 = climate positive for the rest of 2017 (21000 tons of CO2)

USD 175.000 = climate positive for a full year (35000 tons of CO2)

USD 700.000 = climate positive for the full 4 years (140000 tons of CO2)

So here's the plan:

1. Climate action movement Chooose will buy loads and loads CO2 emission permits in the name of Donald Trump, making the permits unavailable for polluting industries.

2. One permit represents one ton of CO2. One permit out, means one permit less for the polluting bad guys.

3. Removing permits from the market can contribute in driving the price of polluting up, and accelerate the shift to sustainable solutions.

4. If we reach beyond the target of 140 000 tons of CO2, each additional ton will take Trump from being carbon neutral to being climate positive.

5. We will  annoy the president by making him both climate positive and by making it more expensive for his friends in the coal industry to pollute.

6. To make Trump carbon neutral, we need about USD 700,000 as one permit/ton costs app. USD 5. If we don't reach the target, we will still buy (steal) as many permits as possible, and still make a major impact.

7. Each dollar raised in the campaign will result in 440 pounds/200 kilos of CO2 removed.

That's how cheap it is to make a major impact, and that's the plan.

Perks. Sure.

The main perk is your personal satisfaction of annoying Donald Trump.

OK, but we've got some more. Check out the separate Perks section.

Say what? Is this possible?

Yes it is. Chooose has already stolen 12,000 CO2 permits (blocking this from being emitted) in just 5 months on behalf of its members and partners. Major events have gone carbon neutral (and even climate positive), and more than 1,600 individuals have already joined the movement. We are registered with the EU Climate Quota Register, and have access to the losed CO2 market in Europe. In addition, we buy permits directly from the UN (supporting their work) and from "Gold Standrd" projects across the world.

Chooose is a new form of mitigation that bridges the gap between people and climate action. We are not the radical environmentalists that asks you to move into a cave. Nope, because you would never really go that far, right? But what if you could do som serious earthsaving without changing all of your habits? Well, now you can.

Chooose enables people to effortlessly steal CO2 emission permits from the big industrial polluters. Why? Because we seriously need to start grabbing the ones who is destoying our planet by the balls. And this is the way to do it. 

And there's a lot of ballgrabbing to do - especially now that Trump just gave his short middle finger to our kids' future by leaving the Paris Climate Agreement. 

Not as rich as Trump?

If you don't have the bling, you can still do your climate positive thing. All new "choooseletter" subscribers gets one day of carbon neutrality (about 55 kg CO2 per US citizen), and by spreading the love on at Facebook, Twitter and Instagram (@ChoooseToday), we might just reach out to even more people who wants to go #climatepositive and make an impact.

Please share this campaign to all your friends as well! We will donate 50 tons of CO2 to this "Trump CO2 Fund" in the name of five persons who share our campaign on Facebook.

Want even more? Check out the Chooose website.

The average US citizen's footprint during the same period is about 70 tons.In numbers, we try achieving the following milestones:USD 1 = 440 lbs / 200 kilos of CO2 offsettingUSD 15.000 = 1 month climate positive Trump (3000 tons of CO2)USD 105.000 = climate positive for the rest of 2017 (21000 tons of CO2)USD 175.000 = climate positive for a full year (35000 tons of CO2)USD 700.000 = climate positive for the full 4 years (140000 tons of CO2)So here's the plan:1. Climate action movement Chooose will buy loads and loads CO2 emission permits in the name of Donald Trump, making the permits unavailable for polluting industries.2. One permit represents one ton of CO2. One permit out, means one permit less for the polluting bad guys.3. Removing permits from the market can contribute in driving the price of polluting up, and accelerate the shift to sustainable solutions.4. If we reach beyond the target of 140 000 tons of CO2, each additional ton will take Trump from being carbon neutral to being climate positive.5. We will  annoy the president by making him both climate positive and by making it more expensive for his friends in the coal industry to pollute.6. To make Trump carbon neutral, we need about USD 700,000 as one permit/ton costs app. USD 5. If we don't reach the target, we will still buy (steal) as many permits as possible, and still make a major impact.7. Each dollar raised in the campaign will result in 440 pounds/200 kilos of CO2 removed.That's how cheap it is to make a major impact, and that's the plan.Perks. Sure.The main perk is your personal satisfaction of annoying Donald Trump.OK, but we've got some more. Check out the separate Perks section.Say what? Is this possible?Yes it is. Chooose has already stolen 12,000 CO2 permits (blocking this from being emitted) in just 5 months on behalf of its members and partners. Major events have gone carbon neutral (and even climate positive), and more than 1,600 individuals have already joined the movement. We are registered with the EU Climate Quota Register, and have access to the losed CO2 market in Europe. In addition, we buy permits directly from the UN (supporting their work) and from "Gold Standrd" projects across the world.Chooose is a new form of mitigation that bridges the gap between people and climate action. We are not the radical environmentalists that asks you to move into a cave. Nope, because you would never really go that far, right? But what if you could do som serious earthsaving without changing all of your habits? Well, now you can.Chooose enables people to effortlessly steal CO2 emission permits from the big industrial polluters. Why? Because we seriously need to start grabbing the ones who is destoying our planet by the balls. And this is the way to do it. And there's a lot of ballgrabbing to do - especially now that Trump just gave his short middle finger to our kids' future by leaving the Paris Climate Agreement. Not as rich as Trump?If you don't have the bling, you can still do your climate positive thing. All new "choooseletter" subscribers gets one day of carbon neutrality (about 55 kg CO2 per US citizen), and by spreading the love on at Facebook, Twitter and Instagram (@ChoooseToday), we might just reach out to even more people who wants to go #climatepositive and make an impact.Please share this campaign to all your friends as well! We will donate 50 tons of CO2 to this "Trump CO2 Fund" in the name of five persons who share our campaign on Facebook.Want even more? Check out the Chooose website.

story:
Conquering Plastic Pollution 

We are working to bring Waste Plastic Pyrolysis into Asia as part of our recycling program for end of life plastics. The intention is to work with the worlds leading Pyrolysis Plant Manufacturer, local government and our investors to develop an effective waste management system that can be duplicated and set up in many parts of South East Asia. By converting Trash into a renewable resource we create a value chain in what was once worthless.

Our Vision

The vision is to establish an initiative that effectively addresses plastic waste pollution. Our commitment is to facilitate coastal and communal plastic cleanup. As 80% of the current plastic pollution is from land-based sources, our focus must begin with the land based problem. Our system features a proven, environmentally safe method of cracking plastics back to basic elements, essentially reversing the plastic production process by way of Pyrolysis.  All types of plastics can be processed however some types of plastics have more value as they are and are simply recycled.

We make that value accessible to people by providing collection services combined with rewards and incentive payments.  We convert trash into cash, promote coastal and community cleanup events and provide alternatives such as biodegradable food packaging.

My Name is Andrew Sinclair and I’m an Australian who is passionate about environmental conservation and sustainability. I recently walked away from my job as a commercial diver doing underwater welding and construction to follow my passion of conservation.

I have seen first hand how good waste management can have an enormous effect on not only the environment but also people and the economy. I have also seen first hand how devastating bad waste management can be.

I believe socially conscious entrepreneurs such as our selves should look beyond profit and develop businesses that are not only viable but also tackle social challenges. I believe we have a model that is harmonious with achieving sustainable development goals, which are environmentally, socially and financially sound.

Our Systems

Our pilot Island (Langkawi) has 100 Thousand residents living in 48 Thousand homes and is visited by 2.3 Million Tourists per annum. Over 35 Thousand tons of trash is produced per annum or 95 Tons per day, which is all dumped in-land creating what can only be described as a Trash Mountain. We estimate at least 40% of this material is plastic, 38 Tons of plastic per day.

We plan to capture a majority of this material by supplying 10 Thousand Bins, 5 Compactor Trucks and contracted pickers.

Our recycling station will sort, wash and grind all end of life plastics and process 30 – 40 Tons per day of this plastic feed stock by Pyrolysis producing bio-oil, gas and carbon. The gasses produced are used for the plants heating process and scrubbed reducing emissions to nearly zero. The technology is tried, tested and functioning across the world, conforming to the most stringent environmental standards in the USA, Australia and Europe, producing approximately 15 Tons of bio-oil a day.

Our system is user friendly and secure, each participating household is allocated a bin fitted with a unique code/RFID tag. When the bin is collected our trucks RFID readers log the weight, the address and award the account holder with 1 credit. Each credit is based on 10% of the average daily income of the region according to available statistics.

Our system also features an App or online portal for users to track their credits, check collection dates or request extra pickups. Credits are transferred to the users bank account when requested. Volunteer Cleanup organizations are also awarded credits. Hotels and restaurants are encouraged to be socially conscious, and support their community by paying per bin we collect.

What We Need & How You Can Help

What we need is action Now! There are countless studies, reports, speculations and investigations being funded and they are very necessary but we must take action now. 

We have the vision and the power now we need your support. Your contribution can help in so many ways, on so many levels. A contribution of $50 will pull 1,200 liters (5 Bin loads) of trash from the landfill and off the beaches. $100 will cover 2 Bins for the community and fund 30 collections (7,200 liters) See our campaign perks for more details. Sponsors will be named as founding members on our wall of fame and appreciation. A personal letter of sponsorship will be sent to each of our contributors.  

Your support will show you stand with us, against the massive pollution problem we are facing. When we show a list of our supporters to the authorities they will see how many of us care, how many are demanding action. If you are unable to contribute financially then simply subscribe on our site www.geotrashmanagement.com, share our campaign and show you stand with us.

Every 2 weeks we will email our subscribers an update on our progress and all the happenings as they unfold. When our pilot is complete, and its success is proven we will begin again in the next location. Again and again until all communities that want action have our tools to conquer plastic pollution.

Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign! Use the Indiegogo share tools, become friends with us on Face Book at GEO-TM and/or visit our site. There you will see in great detail how this will work.

If you are a serious ethical investor or part of an investment group looking to finance an environmental project with real potential, please contact us. Investment options are available now. Contact us for more information and request a share holders agreement.

story:
*** Note. International contributors experiencing any problems with indiegogo contributions can process donations directly through paypal using vossahedron@gmail.com  

 

 

2020 Vossahedron Prototype

The Vossahedron is a Multidimensional Consciousness Art & Biofuturism Science Project.

This Indiegogo campaign is focused on securing the resources & final team to prototype an 18 ft diameter x 9 ft high advanced dome structure.

The Vossahedron Project involves the manufacturing of a modular aluminum concrete form as a mold so we can pour an innovative green aircrete high performance concrete mixture that will result in one wedge section of the Vossahedron sacred geometry shape .  This process is repeated 6 times to complete a full dome shell.  We then finish the structure with hexagonal windows and a door.  This completed basic structure is to be utilized as a groundbreaking instrument to study its quantum effects utilizing cymatic resonance fields of sound, coherent light, structured water, coherent electricity, designer magnetics, crystal lattices, and plasma states as subtle energy modalities for the regeneration of the traumatized human body and amplification of our innate consciousness abilities.

2020 Project Milestones

  1. Manufacture aluminum concrete form in Silver City, New Mexico (April to June)

  2. Secure a prototype land site for initial concrete tests (To be decided)

  3. Complete 1 of 6 dome wedges in stages with final concrete mix (July/Aug)

  4. Initial structural performance tests and documentation of research findings (Sept/Oct)

  5. Train an advanced construction team and produce complete media package, Vossahedron building plans and Center of Mass Creation site master plan (Nov)

  6. Secure larger land site for the prototyping of initial Center of Mass Creation energy research labs housed in Vossahedron structures (Throughout Summer)

2020 Budget

  1. Prototype aluminum concrete form/mold $12,000
  2. Vossahedron structure prototyping & performance testing $24,000
  3. ​Securing & preparing permanent Center of Mass Creation land site $108,000

​Budget includes construction equipment purchases, operating expenses and labor

 

Problem and Market Need

At the global level we are experiencing a proven desperation for independence from: 

  • Costly mortgages
  • Increased expenses of utilities & cost of ownership
  • Increased costs of medical services
  • Houses and home products that contribute to chronic disease 
  • Toxic living environments that are forced on families
  • Psychological and physical damage from stressful lifestyles
  • The breakdown of communities and forced labor for survival

 

 At the local level we have reached a deliberate saturation of:

  • Wasteful, Antiquated and Toxic home construction methods
  • Prohibitive home purchasing and home building prices
  • Limited housing options and outdated forms of urban design
  • Restrictive building codes and municipal ordinances based on greed

 

The cost of our housing, health, and lifestyle problems is immeasurable 
 The opportunity for Sustainable Housing and Eco-Communities at the global and local levels begins with the offering of a new kind of home optimized for raw land as a turn-key package. 
Our solution is to roll-out a modular platform for new eco-communities for conscious regeneration positioned to transform entire towns and a transitional template for seeding entire eco-cities of our Biofuture.

 

We are committed to changing the mindset of one community at a time by creating workable models of sustainability, coexistence, and wellness that can inspire surrounding communities to follow suit.

Our team defines Sustainable BioArchitecture as being a conscious solution featuring:

  1. Intelligent Form – Geometry for the site, the house, and the furniture based on ancient wisdom & natural law optimized to flow with Earth’s electromagnetic energy and proportioned to amplify life-force (Chi, Prana, Orgone)
  2. Living Water - Solutions to harvest and structure water from the air and the ground using magnetic, sound, light and crystal technologies in our water filtering process
  3. Healing Food - Integrated facilities for efficiently growing & preparing heirloom organic super-nutrition for DNA repair
  4. Off-grid Energy in Freedom – Human-friendly Earth battery, Magnetic, Plasma and Tesla & Searl energy technology
  5. Bio-Architecture – Efficient biomimicry design balancing heat/cold throughout the year, naturally adapted for each site, non-toxic materials, extreme weather/earthquake resistant and an integrated part of a bio-community
  6. Conscious regeneration - Biofuturistic technology coherently imprinted with clear intent in the geometry, energy modalities and natural earth building materials .  Each day a person lives inside a monolithic Vossahedron instrument is one day less of aging.

Vossa Portfolio: HTTP://www.coroflot.com/vossa

 

Vossahedron Designs

Note.  Latest Vossahedron prototype illustrations to be released 3rd week of February.

Prototype size will be 18 ft diameter x 9 ft high.   

The 2020 prototype will be a 1 story structure. 

Below we are sharing the two story designs of full sized 33 ft diameter concepts

Hexagon window detail

Skylight detail

 

Vossahedron 3D Flythrough!

 

Vossahedron Design Portfolio:  HTTP://www.coroflot.com/vossa/bio-architecture

 

The Concrete Form Mold

The concrete form will be made of aluminum.  This will be a modular system that has 4 levels to assemble.  These 3d renderings give an idea of the shape.  It is to be welded from flat pieces cut from a plasma CNC table from 48" x 96" sheets 1/4" thick.  This form will produce 1 of 6 wedges.  Windows and the door are placed with a frame within the mold to leave an open cavity.
This wedge is approximately 9 ft high and 9 ft wide at the base.  This concre form is designed to be portable and easily assembled by 2-3 people.  


​This aluminum form is designed for 1,000+ concrete pours!

The yellow edge channel are for a tongue and grove intersection of each resulting concrete wedge so we have a true monolithic structure.

Illustration of level 1 of this form to show how this modular concrete form comes together to create the first W shape at the base.  Additional segments are placed on top of this to eventually reach 4 levels at 9ft high.

Vossacrete testing in Nayarit, Mexico rain forest
3

Early 3D Print lab 

Violet laser test to reveal cymatic patterns w Vossahedron scale model over water

Water shock test

Acoustic tests

 

 

The Healing Codex

The Vossahedron Project design principles are based on a 12 dimensional system of integrating natural energy states, the process of an awakening human consciousness and accessing deeper levels of the source of all creation. This system will be explained in upcoming master classes.




*** Personal Healing Codex Research Merchandise http://www.thehealingcodex.com 

 

Research and Early Prototypes

 
Sonic Reiki Technology Prototype 

 

3D Printing of Early Vossahedron Dome Geometry

 

Introduction to The Center of Mass Creation

 

Early Project Advisers and Mentors

 

  

 

The Vossahedron Project is not about thinking.
This is about taking action

Participate - Contribute - Share

story:
Who We Are 

Hello and Welcome!

Thank you for visiting us here at Indiegogo and sharing your valuable time with us. If you watched the opening video, then you saw portions of the Monshaat Innovate 2019 Competition held in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, that we competed in with our new technology, RPS-G1, our patented and award-winning Centrifugal Induced Wind Turbine Generator.

It was extremely surprising (but totally awesome!) to have our company referred to as "Aramco #2", a $2 Trillion company! Happily we are NOT an oil company, but the inference was impactful; Renewable Power Sources LLC will be a company that impacts the world and the way things are done.

We are very fortunate to have won 1st Place and the Gold Medal in that competition!

 

It's been a long, hard road with a lot of blood (literally!), sweat, and tears.

Years spent away from our families and friends, salaries, savings, and 401Ks decimated, pride swallowed, hundreds of meetings attended and presentations given, sleeping in the car for conferences and exhibitions participated in, proudly eating Ramen noodles because its all we can afford, and still we press on in spite of it all. 

As a globally-minded group of people, our company Renewable Power Sources is a small business that reflects our values, and represents a dream realized for all of us working to do something to help make the world our children are growing into, a better and healthier place.

We are garage tinkerers, soldiers, mothers and fathers, sisters and brothers, daughters and sons, who envision something better, for those we love, and for the world.

This campaign is the embodiment of our drive to bring our technology to fruition. To change the world, period. Creating mountains of waste byproducts, some of it very toxic, that will start to rear their ugly peaks beginning about a decade from now is not something we feel is responsible or ethical, so we're DOING something about it.

Our technology can produce all the electricity we need, as the human species, with zero-emissions, 100% recyclable equipment, and at a fraction of the cost and none of the waste of current renewables.

 

What is RPS-G1?

Very simply put, RPS-G1 (Renewable Power Sources - Generation 1) is a new type of electric generator that is capable of producing electricity at utility scale through mechanical means, without the need for fossil, bio-, nuclear, or solar sources. It is scalable, 100% recyclable, produces power 24/365, and its only byproduct is heat.

Brass Tacks Comparison

Truth In Cost: Several state and federal government tax credits, grants, and loan programs are available for qualifying renewable energy technologies and projects. The costs of those technologies and projects are diluted by taxpayers and/or governments.

The cost per MW for RPS-G1 is not subsidized or incentivized.

 

Why Crowdfunding?

We have chosen crowdfunding because we have discovered that regardless of who you meet with and discuss with, whether CEOs of Fortune 500 companies, Vice Presidents, Ministers, Cabinet Members, or even Royalty such as H.R.H. Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz, who by the way told Fahad, the inventor of RPS-G1, that we are "the pride of the Nation", that although they may all love our idea or believe that we have an amazing technology, they just can't or won't commit.

And, even though we won 1st Place in the Monshaat Innovate 2019 Competition, we did not receive the support, nurturing, or direct investment that we were promised as an incentive for all participants to strive for while competing.

In the world of venture capital, we have been given a lot of praise for what we have achieved, but then in the same breath they tell us how they would love to invest except that their massive investments in other renewables just won't allow them to.

On the other hand, when we receive investment proposals, the would-be investors want a ridiculous percentage of equity and full control. Very simply, this will NEVER happen. We have a certain way of doing things, a plan to bring this technology to the world, and although we are a for-profit venture, there are things that we plan to do with those profits for the nearly 1-billion people living with very limited, or no access at all, to electricity. These things won't happen if we hand over the reins to the money-hungry.

With the problems of climate change accelerating, we don't have time for uncertainty, and we as the human collective can take our future into our own hands, and RPS-G1 is where we start.

It can harness the energy market in a straightforward manner to help accelerate low-carbon/low-emissions behavior globally, without the need for an all-encompassing international climate treaty, negotiations over rules, green credit trading schemes, nearly impossible coordination, or endless technical negotiations and political maneuvering.

We need YOUR help to move our technology through the valley of death , because without your help, our technology that can cost-effectively and cleanly deal with our growing climate and  waste problems, is unlikely to materialize now rather than later, when the problems will be nearly insurmountable.

Join us in taking our climate and energy futures into our own hands, and take action NOW.

Your Impact 

What you will be helping us to achieve is monumental: eliminating nearly 50% of greenhouse emissions from energy production and general industry, providing power 24/365 (zero intermittency),  powering the energy-hungry technologies that can clean up the mess we've made in the atmosphere, bringing  reliable power to the nearly 1 billion people living with limited or no access to electricity, and creating jobs and healthier economies worldwide, building a clean, stable energy future for all of us.

THAT is what you will be a part of. THAT is what YOU can help us do.

Our plan is to recognize every individual who believes in what we are doing and makes a contribution to making RPS-G1 a reality for the world.

For all of you who have the vision to see the opportunity to help create a better world for all of us and make ANY donation to help achieve it, you will ALL receive a Letter of Thanks and Appreciation signed by the Inventor of RPS-G1, Mr. Fahad Abdulaziz Abduldayem.

For those who are able to make larger contributions, additional perks may include (depending on the amount of the donation) having your full name, with the name of the city, state, and country you live in inscribed,  as well as having your photograph added to the Wall of Visionaries that we plan to build as the capstone of our first official RPS-G1 Utility-scale Power Plant.

What If We Don't Reach Our Goal?

There is always the chance that we won't reach our goal. We chose Flexible Funding for our campaign for the simple reason that we absolutely need every penny to keep moving this project forward. It's a matter of necessity. That's the long and short of the matter. The more money we are able to raise, the closer we get to bringing this technology to life, and to the world.

 

The Idea

In the early spring of 2009, our Chairman and the inventor of RPS-G1, Fahad Abdulaziz Abduldayem of Saudi Arabia, had an idea. At the time, he was living in Rancho Cucamonga, California with his wife and 3-year-old son, and waiting to be accepted for admission to CalPoly.

While he waited, he bought a conversion kit for his car, a 1992 Honda Civic. The kit was to convert the car from a combustion engine to full-electric power, and though Fahad was able to get the conversion done without any issues, he realized that the maximum range for the newly converted car was about one-hundred miles.

Annoyed to no end, he started thinking about ways to increase the driving range of the battery pack. Along these lines of thought, he was working on the car in the garage one morning, thinking about the whole alternator/generator train, and he had an idea. A new type of generator that uses mechanical means instead of gas or diesel fuels to generate power, but something was missing.

Have you ever had a moment when you know something, but you don’t know how you know?

With his idea running around in his head and just out of range of that cliched ‘Eureka!’ moment, Fahad packed up his wife and 3-year-old son and headed to the local playground to let his little one run amuck for a bit.

While they were there, Fahad’s wife pointed at the old-style merry-go-round that some of the kids were playing on. You know the one? Kids sit on it and an adult, or another kid, push it around faster and faster until everyone riding it is spinning like mad and holding on for dear life? All the while, the merry-go-round is trying to launch all passengers in every direction? Yeah, that one!

 

Breakthrough.

 

 

From that moment, the project that started off as a desire to be more environmentally conscientious and maybe wring a few more miles out of a battery pack, became a discovery that could produce electricity on a utility-scale; massive amounts of power with no negative environmental effects.

 

What We Need: $12,000,000

Woah! That's a LOT of money, but I can tell you, even with our penny-pinching and Ramen noodle eating, that money is going to be stretched to the very limit. "Plan for the worst-case scenario" is our motto, and we've discovered that when you're working to change the world, and fighting to swim against an almost all-powerful current (the renewable energy industry status quo), the worst-case scenario is always hovering just over our shoulders.   

This campaign is focused on securing the resources & final team to prepare, plan for, and build a 20m x 20m x 9m, 720 kW RPS-G1 unit.

Cards-on-the-table breakdown:

Phase 1 - $5,000,000

Engineering - we need a lot of engineers, and we have been working with them for several years. We have reached the point of fine tuning in preparation for building our proof of concept/prototype. We have worked with companies such as Altran and Siemens in the development of certain aspects of our technology.

$5,000,000 is going to get us to prototype stage.  This will cover the costs of contracting the engineering we need in order to finalize our design specifications, the development of our Facility Operations & Predictive Maintenance Software, as well as cover operating and administrative costs.

The engineers we are working with are in the following fields:

  • Mechanical
  • Aerodynamics
  • Electrical
  • Material
  • Industrial
  • Manufacturing

Additionally, we need to work with software developers in order to build and maintain the systems that will regulate and monitor the entire RPS-G1 power plant, from predicting module failure by identifying potential mechanical problems within any particular RPS-G1 module, to disengaging individual RPS-G1 modules for maintenance or replacement while maintaining continuity of power generation. 

Phase 2 - $7,000,000

Prototyping - The RPS-G1 prototype process will allow us to conduct testing of the structure as it relates loadbearing, wind pressures, and turbine efficiency, as well as to finalize our integrated step-down transformer consoles that split power generated for RPS-G1 utilization and transmission of power to a substation. The prototype will also assist system design in order to perfect the Facility Operations & Predictive Maintenance Software we are developing.

Specifically, the RPS-G1 Prototype Project will encompass the manufacturing of a single modular high-performance unit that will demonstrate its capability to produce power cleanly, efficiently, and with minimal space requirements in comparison to other renewable energy technologies.

Since RPS-G1 is modular, it means that although the modules function collectively as a single power producing system, each unit can be independently modified, repaired, or exchanged without shutting down the entire system. That said, the prototype will serve to help finalize turbine blade design through Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) of Air Flow Analysis.

 
Examples below of CFD Analysis showing air flow reaching the concave portion of the blade, which will generate forces for rotation of turbine blade. 
 

​

 

General 3D View of the Turbine Base Frame

The base structure is modeled as a three-dimensional finite element model using the Structural Engineering software of Bentley STAAD, Pro V8i. The complete structure is modelled below using three different Sections properties.

Fig.(a) Model is using Tubular Pipe Truss elements, Fig.(b) Model is using the I-Section beams and Fig.(c) Model is using the RHS (Rectangular Hollow Sections).

                                Fig.(a)                                    Fig.(b)                                 Fig.(c)

 

The majority of the components for this RPS-G1 Prototype Project are not off-the-shelf, they will be fabricated specifically to our design specifications, and from various alloys, treated steel, carbon fiber, and possibly graphene (Translation = Expensive!!). Computerized Numerical Control (CNC) Machining is a method used to perform a wide range of manufacturing tasks, which are all carried out by computerized devices. The objective behind the use of such a variety of materials and systems is to build machines that can withstand continuous wind pressures and loads, lasting for decades.

We know there are a lot of questions, Please Ask Them!

www.rps-limited.com

Submit your questions with our Contact Us form

 

Risks & Challenges

Challenges to Energy Innovation

Innovation is a complex process with many different stages and inherent risks. It requires a large investment of time and money before any positive effects become visible.

The biggest risks we face are the most obvious, like lack of funds to finalize our work, indifference from those in positions that could help accelerate the introduction of RPS-G1 to the world, and naysayers that don't believe our technology works who spread misinformation through their ignorance.

There are many other risks, but the ones we mentioned above have had the biggest impact on our ability to get RPS-G1 to the world.

Major challenges we face:

  • Lack of a True Innovation Ethos: Historically within the energy industry, the focus has not been on new "plug and play" or "out-of-the-box" solutions. Most energy companies have never encouraged a true innovation philosophy. They have simply contracted others to develop solutions for problems. 
  • Focus on Technology Development Not Innovation: The technologies energy companies (or contractors) developed have usually been evolutionary, not innovative technologies. Evolutionary technology advances rarely offer an extreme difference, nor do they change the industry landscape, and render onlookers wonderstruck.
  • They Have Too Much money: The problem with the energy industry is that there is too much money.  Not having huge financial constraints stifles innovation since constraints breed creativity. 

Options we consider to face challenges:

  • Professional Advice - consultants, industry professionals or contacts in business networks that can provide valuable insight into our market.
  • Joint Ventures - possibly sharing the development process with a business partner to spread the risk, and benefit from their expertise and resources (last resort?) 
  • Licensing - offers a balance of risk and reward allowing you to leverage the success of an already established company for distribution for a fee and royalties.
  • Ongoing Research - keep up to date with market research and technological developments that may influence your business.

Protecting Our Business and Our Innovations

When you innovate, it's important to protect all your business assets – not just the premises and equipment, but also your intangible assets such as knowledge, motivation, vision and intellectual property (IP).

Although these may be difficult to quantify, we can still protect them. We have assessed what our assets are and we have protected them, and it is always an ongoing process.

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand and recognize that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help.

Another way that you can help us is to spread the word about our campaign by sharing it with your friends and family through social media.

Anything you can do to help us bring RPS-G1 to world will be appreciated more than you know!
story_txt:
Who We Are 
Hello and Welcome!
Thank you for visiting us here at Indiegogo and sharing your valuable time with us. If you watched the opening video, then you saw portions of the Monshaat Innovate 2019 Competition held in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, that we competed in with our new technology, RPS-G1, our patented and award-winning Centrifugal Induced Wind Turbine Generator.
It was extremely surprising (but totally awesome!) to have our company referred to as "Aramco #2", a $2 Trillion company! Happily we are NOT an oil company, but the inference was impactful; Renewable Power Sources LLC will be a company that impacts the world and the way things are done.
We are very fortunate to have won 1st Place and the Gold Medal in that competition!

 
It's been a long, hard road with a lot of blood (literally!), sweat, and tears.
Years spent away from our families and friends, salaries, savings, and 401Ks decimated, pride swallowed, hundreds of meetings attended and presentations given, sleeping in the car for conferences and exhibitions participated in, proudly eating Ramen noodles because its all we can afford, and still we press on in spite of it all. 
As a globally-minded group of people, our company Renewable Power Sources is a small business that reflects our values, and represents a dream realized for all of us working to do something to help make the world our children are growing into, a better and healthier place.
We are garage tinkerers, soldiers, mothers and fathers, sisters and brothers, daughters and sons, who envision something better, for those we love, and for the world.
This campaign is the embodiment of our drive to bring our technology to fruition. To change the world, period. Creating mountains of waste byproducts, some of it very toxic, that will start to rear their ugly peaks beginning about a decade from now is not something we feel is responsible or ethical, so we're DOING something about it.
Our technology can produce all the electricity we need, as the human species, with zero-emissions, 100% recyclable equipment, and at a fraction of the cost and none of the waste of current renewables.
 
What is RPS-G1?
Very simply put, RPS-G1 (Renewable Power Sources - Generation 1) is a new type of electric generator that is capable of producing electricity at utility scale through mechanical means, without the need for fossil, bio-, nuclear, or solar sources. It is scalable, 100% recyclable, produces power 24/365, and its only byproduct is heat.

Brass Tacks Comparison

Truth In Cost: Several state and federal government tax credits, grants, and loan programs are available for qualifying renewable energy technologies and projects. The costs of those technologies and projects are diluted by taxpayers and/or governments.
The cost per MW for RPS-G1 is not subsidized or incentivized.
 
Why Crowdfunding?
We have chosen crowdfunding because we have discovered that regardless of who you meet with and discuss with, whether CEOs of Fortune 500 companies, Vice Presidents, Ministers, Cabinet Members, or even Royalty such as H.R.H. Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz, who by the way told Fahad, the inventor of RPS-G1, that we are "the pride of the Nation", that although they may all love our idea or believe that we have an amazing technology, they just can't or won't commit.
And, even though we won 1st Place in the Monshaat Innovate 2019 Competition, we did not receive the support, nurturing, or direct investment that we were promised as an incentive for all participants to strive for while competing.
In the world of venture capital, we have been given a lot of praise for what we have achieved, but then in the same breath they tell us how they would love to invest except that their massive investments in other renewables just won't allow them to.
On the other hand, when we receive investment proposals, the would-be investors want a ridiculous percentage of equity and full control. Very simply, this will NEVER happen. We have a certain way of doing things, a plan to bring this technology to the world, and although we are a for-profit venture, there are things that we plan to do with those profits for the nearly 1-billion people living with very limited, or no access at all, to electricity. These things won't happen if we hand over the reins to the money-hungry.
With the problems of climate change accelerating, we don't have time for uncertainty, and we as the human collective can take our future into our own hands, and RPS-G1 is where we start.
It can harness the energy market in a straightforward manner to help accelerate low-carbon/low-emissions behavior globally, without the need for an all-encompassing international climate treaty, negotiations over rules, green credit trading schemes, nearly impossible coordination, or endless technical negotiations and political maneuvering.
We need YOUR help to move our technology through the valley of death , because without your help, our technology that can cost-effectively and cleanly deal with our growing climate and  waste problems, is unlikely to materialize now rather than later, when the problems will be nearly insurmountable.
Join us in taking our climate and energy futures into our own hands, and take action NOW.

Your Impact 

What you will be helping us to achieve is monumental: eliminating nearly 50% of greenhouse emissions from energy production and general industry, providing power 24/365 (zero intermittency),  powering the energy-hungry technologies that can clean up the mess we've made in the atmosphere, bringing  reliable power to the nearly 1 billion people living with limited or no access to electricity, and creating jobs and healthier economies worldwide, building a clean, stable energy future for all of us.
THAT is what you will be a part of. THAT is what YOU can help us do.
Our plan is to recognize every individual who believes in what we are doing and makes a contribution to making RPS-G1 a reality for the world.
For all of you who have the vision to see the opportunity to help create a better world for all of us and make ANY donation to help achieve it, you will ALL receive a Letter of Thanks and Appreciation signed by the Inventor of RPS-G1, Mr. Fahad Abdulaziz Abduldayem.
For those who are able to make larger contributions, additional perks may include (depending on the amount of the donation) having your full name, with the name of the city, state, and country you live in inscribed,  as well as having your photograph added to the Wall of Visionaries that we plan to build as the capstone of our first official RPS-G1 Utility-scale Power Plant.

story:
Short Summary

We created this tester to be able to charge and discharge batteries in a single go, be it small or large cells with up to 20A discharge and at least 10A charge (10A confirmed stable, higher than that is still being calibrated in the design and can theoretically go as high as 20A with cooling). With small software tweaks, we can go from capacity testing to longevity cycling and data logging. The beauty of an arduino based device is you can easily adapt it to your own needs.

At RePowered Batteries, we process thousands of cells, and so efficiency is key in making our business viable. Theses tools we've created for ourselves would not have been possible without all the open hardware and software platforms out there, so it's only fair that we share it back with the community.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising funds by selling early production units. The software for battery testing is mostly complete, and working reliably. The data logging features have not yet been re-integrated, but did work in past hardware versions that are no longer compatible. This means we know we can get it done, but it's just a matter of doing it. Software upgrades will be free as the project is open sourced (www.pabl-o.com) and all the code is available for modifications.

Hardware features:

  • Charging current and discharging current limits
  • short circuit prevention (in case faulty custom code is used)
  • hardware selection of the charging voltage and hardware based fine tuning of the voltage
  • compatible with multiple cell holder size and types
  • auxiliary battery input through XT60 for large or unusuall cells
  • Rack style board for the use of many testers at once
  • LED MOSFET indicator so you know for sure which fet is on/off when testing code

Software features

  • Open sourced software to integrate your own decision rules
  • two main software versions available for battery testing or longitudinal endurance testing and data logging

The Impact

Test small or large cells for cheap, all with a single device.

Data logging of cell cycling normally requires expensive equipment or dedicated computers, not so with this independent SD card based device.

Risks & Challenges

We already had working devices, along with basic software. We did do a redesign with new MOSFETs and a different DC-DC converter. It is Texas Instrument brand so we trust it, but we have not done extended tests on it yet. Now we want the community to get involved and help push the development along further and faster!

Other Ways You Can Help

Know how to program? We are looking for people to help us clean up our code. Or spread the word.

Future Development

Right now, the software does the cell cycling and capacity measurement, but there are extra ports for features we are working on.  There are 2 temp probe ports for ambient temperature and cell temperature, having both allows for an adjusted cell temperature that accounts for local conditions. We also have the microSD card slot for data logging, and the rotary encoder for selecting the number of cycles / mode of operation. Once enough data has been collected, we plan on using charge/discharge differences to find heaters without the need for a temperature probe. We also want to add IR measuring, but specifically IR measuring at 80% capacity which is where the battery is at its optimal IR level (which is where manufacturers measure it of course).

story:
With new industry comes new industrial waste. Waste management is one of the most common environmental law issues for industrial cannabis and medical marijuana businesses.

Do you know what legal cannabis growers do with their waste? I didn't so I asked.

The CEO of one of Florida's licensed growing facilities told me, it's a trade secret involving various ways with lots of processes. My guess is they burn it. It’s the only way to insure waste seeds won’t grow, but that’s not true. High heat composting kills all plant seeds. Stop burning cannabis waste and polluting the environment. CannDoo™ repurposes cannabis waste into a silica rich compost.

Whatever is happening to cannabis waste, there’s going to be a lot more of it and very soon. 

The benefits of cannabis silica

Silica tops the list of beneficial elements most often used by gardeners, but the only commercially available source of plant soluble silica is synthetic. Nobody wants to buy synthetic. We want authentic, natural and sustainable. Our product provides just that.

CannDoo™ is patent pending technology which converts cannabis by-product (waste) into a plant beneficial soil compost rich in silica. Although silica is not essential for plant growth and development, it provides many benefits. It helps strengthen cell walls, guards against environmental stress, improves the uptake of water and minerals and adds an extra level of protection against fungal diseases minimizing the need for pesticides. 

Humans have composted for thousands of years. It's time for a change. With your help we will reduce industrial cannabis waste and provide silica rich compost with CannDoo™. The compost revolution starts here!

The Cannabis Boom!

News streams and headlines are full of reports on the health benefits as well as legalization of cannabis. The industry around the production of cannabis is huge! The North American marijuana market posted $6.7 billion in revenue in 2016, up 30% from the year before, according to a new report from Arcview Market Research. In the case of the cannabis boom, Arcview CEO Troy Dayton credits legalization with reeling in the stigma against the plant and bringing new users to the market…

"So when you look at the global market, the world has never seen something that will have such consistent growth over such a long period of time as the cannabis industry," Dayton said.

These statistics illustrate the quantity and consistent availability of cannabis coming into the market place. With large scale production comes an equally large amount of waste. After the desired elements of cannabis (medicine, fiber, oil, protein, etc…) have been removed from the stalk, there remains about 75% of the plant. This bulky by-product is going to be plentiful and cheap, and this is the by-product we'll use.

Cannabis is uncommonly rich in silica and biodegrades quickly! Cannabis by-product takes only 8 weeks to completely biodegrade to compost quality. Cannabis is the perfect ingredient for the secret recipe that is CannDoo™

Here’s how we got here

Scotts Miracle Gro is the single largest manufacturer of do-it-yourself lawn, garden and home protection products in North America, Europe and Asia. In an article for Forbes, ‘Cannabis Capitalist: Scotts Miracle-Gro CEO Bets Big On Pot Growers’, (July 26, 2016) Scotts CEO is reported to have paid $120 million for a 75% stake in an Amsterdam-based lighting and hydroponics equipment outfit. Scotts strategy is to target cannabis growers in America. To us that seems like a relatively small segment of the do-it-yourself gardening market. So we thought, ‘Why limit sales to cannabis growers when you can sell cannabis to everyone?’ With this in mind we came up with the idea of CannDoo™. Rather than limiting distribution to one type of grower we’ll bring the growing benefits of cannabis to the everyday shopper, our neighbors and friends.

Here’s how you can help

We need funding to proceed from provisional patent to full patent status with CannDoo™. Research and equipment are top of the list. 

Equipment and labor: Five dual body compost tumblers, three compost tea kits, manure, chemicals and labor will provided the compost samples needed for testing. Estimated cost for equipment and labor is $4,263.00.

Research: Includes chemical testing and pest deterrent evaluation. A single chemical test for silica is $45.00, but each sample must be tested for NPK as well. NPK is Nitrogen (N), Phosphorus (P) and Potassium (K), each of these being essential in plant nutrition. Structural pest deterrent evaluations are more costly. Estimated cost for testing is $5,100.00.

Patent Attorney: Up to this point we’ve had the assistance of an intellectual patent attorney in D.C. He kindly donated his time, but going forward we need to hire a local patent attorney to work with during the research process and after. Estimated cost (based on information found at patentfile.org) is $8,500.00.

Estimated total cost: $17,863.00

Perks

For the folks who help we have some special gifts. We’ll ship all items (for deliveries outside the U.S., we cannot be responsible for any duty fees or extra charges).

4X4 Custom die cut CannDoo™ sticker set

Set of 3 CannDoo™ stickers and  receive project updates and be kept in the loop on deals and developments.

CannDoo™ Koozie

Foldable, screen printed CannDoo™ can cooler.

CannDoo™ Baseball Cap

Embroidery CannDoo™ logo, 6-panel structured, flat bill baseball cap.

 

CannDoo™ T-Shirt

CannDoo™ pre-shrunk 100% cotton t-shirt adult size lg.

CannDoo™ Compost 5 lb product sample from testing batch.

Be the first to try CannDooo™ (in it’s formative stage) and tell us what happens. At this funding level your name and company name will be mention in our eBlast updates and we’ll share your experience with the CannDoo™ online community.

 

Can't Contribute? No Problem. Just Spread the Word!

Believe us, we know what it's like when money is tight. But you can still help! Simply share our campaign on social media and with friends, family, your crazy, passionate, environmentalist aunt, or whoever you think might be interested in knowing about us. Your voice is a powerful tool!

Thanks for taking the time to read about us, and happy growing!
story_txt: With new industry comes new industrial waste. Waste management is one of the most common environmental law issues for industrial cannabis and medical marijuana businesses.Do you know what legal cannabis growers do with their waste? I didn't so I asked.The CEO of one of Florida's licensed growing facilities told me, it's a trade secret involving various ways with lots of processes. My guess is they burn it. It’s the only way to insure waste seeds won’t grow, but that’s not true. High heat composting kills all plant seeds. Stop burning cannabis waste and polluting the environment. CannDoo™ repurposes cannabis waste into a silica rich compost.Whatever is happening to cannabis waste, there’s going to be a lot more of it and very soon. The benefits of cannabis silicaSilica tops the list of beneficial elements most often used by gardeners, but the only commercially available source of plant soluble silica is synthetic. Nobody wants to buy synthetic. We want authentic, natural and sustainable. Our product provides just that.CannDoo™ is patent pending technology which converts cannabis by-product (waste) into a plant beneficial soil compost rich in silica. Although silica is not essential for plant growth and development, it provides many benefits. story:
Bees are still in peril due to colony collapse disorder! 

Over the past two years, we have experienced a 50% loss in hives, while there are "sustainable losses" that our food systems can easily recover from, this trend is unsustainable. Even with a fantastic hive-mind of individuals-researchers, beekeepers, farmers and ecologists- working to solve the challenges, bees still need your help! And so do the crops that those bees pollinate, for that matter! (www.hivelend.com)

If we lose bees, that's a big sting to our food supply, 1/3 of it, to be exact!  

HiveLend focuses on the important role Bees play in our food chain through crop pollination. Farmers require bees to be placed in their farms for fruit to grow. HiveLend is a platform that allows beekeepers and farmers to seek out new opportunities for business growth and increased revenue through pollination contracts.

So, how does HiveLend work?

Pollination brokers help connect bees with farmers, so think of us as a pollination broker meets Uber, but for bees. (Yea, my uber driver wouldn't love that either). But we also want to help those beekeepers that aren't yet making money through pollination, get into the pollination game! Some of these are sideline beekeepers and they have over 500,000 of the hives in the United States, today! Those crops that could be performing better, (I'm looking at you, cotton and berries) well, we are here to provide those crops with the bees necessary to BEE the best that they can! 

We're so glad you asked!!

Nick and Dawn are beekeepers in Baltimore. The two met this past summer as fellows of the 2017 Venture for America Fellowship. They built a bond over beekeeping, and that’s where HiveLend was born! Dawn has been beekeeping since she was fourteen when she saved up money to buy her first hive and went to bee school instead of high school(kind of...not really, does homeschooling count). Nick began beekeeping in college when he was seeking a connection to food systems and nature. 

 

Well, we are asking for you to bee a part of pollination and the HiveLend Team with your donations!

Contributions made to this campaign will allow for the set up and purchase of educational apiary in Baltimore, Maryland and will also provide funds for the platform development of our website (www.hivelend.com). And in exchange we want to offer you some sweet as honey perks! 

 

What will we be using the funds from this campaign for?

We're fundraising to support the launch of an educational apiary in Baltimore, MD and further development of the HiveLend platform. Every $2500 raised will support a hive and allow us to contribute new features to the website. Keep an eye out if you are in Baltimore, you may just see our hives on a roof or two!

Why Might this Bee Risky Bee-siness?

Nick and Dawn know that they will encounter obstacles on the path to making HiveLend’s goals a reality. A substantial portion of the funds will go towards website development for www.hivelend.com, which is why Nick and Dawn have reached out to web development groups with a track record of success, to build out the necessary features.

We will also need beekeepers and farmers to use our website, which is why we have attended local agricultural meetings, beekeeper association meetings, and are writing articles for grower association newsletters.

We Would Love for You to be a part of the HiveLend Team

Please help us by sharing this campaign, spreading the buzz on HiveLend by tweeting about us @HiveLend and checking us out on Facebook @HiveLend!!

A note on crop pollination: We believe that those currently engaged in pollination are doing a great job feeding this country. We want to enable farmers and beekeepers who had not previously worked with one another able to do so with greater ease.

story:
Hello, my name is Adrian and I have spent most of my life in El Paso, Texas but in 2017 I moved to Colorado where I became acquainted with hemp.  Nowadays it is hard to go anywhere without seeing a hemp or CBD product, but when I first arrived it was just getting its start. Since then, I have witnessed hemp's potential in applications that could help to reduce a lot of the damage that is caused by industry.  This idea has since grown and matured into a life mission to help return health to our planet.

My passions have always driven me to healing and helping.  This passion led me to heal others in my professional career as a nurse, and now I'd like to help heal the planet using hemp.  This campaign will be the first in my efforts to move toward my goal of establishing a hemp business in El Paso , Texas.  If it is successful it will help me to work toward a future where my efforts can be amplified to positively impact our planet.

As this is my first campaign, I would like to begin by introducing myself and Crafted Cultivars to the public. Through this campaign I intend to release my first promotional video that will be featured here, my website, and social media.  With the video made, I plan to engage with an audience that is invested in working toward preserving the health of our planet.  The campaign will be the first milestone in moving Crafted Cultivars toward a partnership with our planet in order to preserve life and provide sustainable tools for everyday use.  

For this promotional video I will be asking to be funded in the amount of $1000.  This money will be going toward the funding of the promotional video for which initial estimates are approximately $2050.  On July 10, I finalized an agreement with Colorado Arts Productions to fund and produce this video by mid-September..  Toward this agreement I have already contributed half of the  funds up front and the remaining half is planned to be paid by the funds of this campaign. 

The video will tell my story and share my passion of using my hemp business to reduce the damaging effects of pollution and climate change. It will demonstrate examples of how hemp can be used to positively impact our planet and replace pollutants like plastics and fossil fuels.  Finally, it will explain Crafted Cultivars’ plan and how you can help to us in developing and executing our plan to help heal the planet on a larger scale.  This video will be featured on Indiegogo, our website, and social media to expand awareness and begin a movement aimed at healing our planet before it's too late.

If I do not meet my funding goal, the funds made will still be contributed toward the final cost of producing of this video. With your help Crafted Cultivars would be getting its start in Texas as one of the first industrial hemp companies leading the way in sustainable hemp cultivation and goods manufacturing. The funds would allow the business to send our message to a large audience that is invested in our planet's health.  A larger audience is a benefit toward our goals to implement technologies that begin to reverse the damages of pollution quickly instead of over the long period of time. The reason I would like to begin this project on a large scale is because of the urgent need to begin reversing pollution. Because hemp has so many uses, I believe that if you trust in me Crafted Cultivars will be able to meet and exceed its goals, 

I haven’t yet owned a business but I have experience in many of the team management skills needed for success, thanks to the experiences I have been honored to have while helping to heal patients, Also, during my stay in Colorado I have had the pleasure of being able to develop valuable contacts that will be essential to the success of this project.  I believe that my previous experience, dedication, education and resources will all help me in my pursuit of success. in order to prepare, I have been engaging myself and learning how to cultivate and process hemp on a commercial scale. Through my learning, I discovered ways that it can be used to solve modern-day problems and I will soon be able to provide prototypes of some of the products I plan to offer. 

It has long been a desire of mine to start a business and with the help of my partners and associates I have been learning what I can to successfully run one for the past few years.  I believe  that our character and passions will be a catalyst to the good that can be accomplished by Crafted Cultivars in the effort to heal the planet.  It is more evident now than ever that we cannot wait to help our planet, and for this reason we have chosen to promote textile products instead of the popular CBD products.. Hemp is undergoing a revival at this time after it was removed from the list of federally controlled-substances and Texas is preparing to begin a prosperous future for hemp with its recent passing of HB 1325 which allowed the sale and cultivation of hemp.  There are some problems with cultivating hemp for industrial purposes, the main one being the inability for farmers to sell their crops due to the absence of hemp processing and manufacturing facilities.  This is because hemp has not been present in the U.S. market as well as the extremely high starting costs of equipment. Other risks in cultivating hemp involves CBD oils and extracts.  The FDA has not made an official ruling on the status of CBD in terms of its regulation, and soon it may require expensive licensing to distribute it.  An additional outcome of hemp's recent absence from the U.S. is a shortage of the stable genetics ideal for the production and processing into industrial hemp materials, Crafted Cultivars aims to be a resource to local farmers who seek information and a source of reliable genetics in the state of Texas and surrounding areas.

El Paso is known as the ‘Sun City’ because it has over 300 sunny days a year, and it is a large city in the middle of a desert.  This area offers an environmental challenge to agriculture, however Crafted Cultivars looks to overcome this challenge by using vertical and greenhouse cultivation.  The design of the cultivation areas will focus on efficiency and conservative methods when applying water and nutrients to amplify our impact and reduce waste.  Being in the ‘Sun City’ will have its benefit of being able to produce solar energy for most of every year, which will further our efforts in energy conservation.

The legal infrastructure for the cultivation of hemp in Texas will be established in 2020 and it is said that farmers can expect to see hemp licenses become available for application before the fall.  I will be contributing my life’s savings toward the establishment of Crafted Cultivars and it is my hope that the funds from this campaign and those in the future will provide momentum moving forward. With your help, I believe we can succeed in the goal to heal the planet.

I appreciate all your support and I hope that I can inspire others to help in the global effort to sustain the health of our planet.  I ask that if you are unable to help by providing funds that you will join us in taking daily steps to heal our planet by reducing waste and recycling. I would also like to ask for your help in sharing our story using the links provided on Indiegogo.  If you are interesting in learning more about how you can take action, you can find information on our website where we will share our progress and bring you valuable content on topics on our blog and through our partners.  I am available to answer your questions by email, my website, and social media. 

Thank you for your interest and help in our efforts in healing the planet.

story:
Vertical farming can feed us all, but...

Vertical farming has the potential to feed sustainably the present human population and the three billion more that will arrive on this planet in the next 30 years. It is the practice of growing crops in vertically stacked layers. It often incorporates controlled-environment agriculture, which aims to optimize plant growth, and soilless farming techniques such as hydroponics, aquaponics, and aeroponics. Vertical farming allows to use 90% less water, 95% less land and emits 70% less carbon dioxide compared to conventional agriculture. Thanks to modern technology vertical farms are a reality. However, the biological aspects of vertical farming have received limited attention compared with the technological aspects. With artificial light and nutrient solutions, plants in protected environments have different requirements from the open fields, still, the varieties we are growing today in vertical farming were originally selected for the open field. The varieties on the market are covered by copyrights. More often vertical farmers ask for varieties able to grow better in their systems.

Our solution: Kasveista

Kasveista.com

We believe that selecting varieties of crops specific for vertical farming can solve the limitations of vertical farming. We also believe that these varieties should be a human common, thus released under an open-source license, which would reduce the chances of centralising food production in the future.

We are a team of biologists with expertise in biology, vertical farming and plant breeding and we want to build Kasveista.

Kasveista is a seed company based on the open-source seed concept and its mission is to produce seeds and seedlings of crop varieties selected for vertical farming.

We envision a world where not only greens, but also the whole range of vegetables that are grown in lands can be produced in vertical farms inside the urban centres. Succeeding would increase dramatically our chances to survive climate change and to feed the entire world population now and in the future.

Help us to make it happen

With your contribution to our Indiegogo fundraising, we will have the support we need to start Kasveista, by collecting open-source varieties, selecting the ones that are best grow in vertical farming, and use them to create new varieties.

we estimated that we need 100,000€ that we will use for:

  • Renting a space in Berlin
    According to our market research, the price per square meter of suitable spaces in Berlin is 10€ per month. We consider 200sqm a good amount of space, to begin with, and one year an amount of time reasonable to enter the market. Thus we will need 24000€ for renting the space.
  • Build an indoor growing system 
    We can rely on knowledge and expertise that allow us to build a controlled environment system with hydroponic growth. However, we need to buy materials. We estimated 76000€. You can find a detail of the calculation here.
  • Collect open-source varieties around the world. 
    We aim to dig collections and seed-banks all around the world to find varieties not covered by copyright or released with an open-source license to use in our breeding programs.

Why we need varieties specific for vertical farming?

Close your eyes and imagine for a second be a plant growing on a vertical farm. This is an environment very different than the open field. Here there is no need to stand high up to chase the light from the sun moving in the sky, light is provided in the perfect amount always for the perfect number of hours. No need to wish for rain here, water is provided fresh and clean. Not even need to dig deep in the soil with the roots to search for nutrients trapped in the soil, they are provided with the water. In these conditions, there is no need for big leaves and long roots and the energy can be re-allocated to produce fruits. 

Using cutting-edge techniques of breeding we want to provide the farmers with varieties that can fully exploit the potential of vertical farming. This is actually nothing new as humans already re-shaped the plants when thousands of years ago they took them from their natural environment and transformed them into the crops we use today. By re-imagining the architecture of the plant also the limits of vertical farming have to be reconsidered. Up to this moment, the range of crops that was possible to grow in vertical farming was limited to leaf greens. By re-shaping the plant architecture we aim to provide the farmers with the possibility of growing a larger range of crops. 

Source Chaudhary (2013)

Why Open Source Seeds?

In the words of J. Kloppenburg Jr.: "The plant is the irreducible core of crop production on the farm and the most fundamental agricultural input." To obtain a plant a seed is needed. Who controls the seeds controls the food. We believe that for vertical farming to become a sustainable alternative to conventional agriculture it has to remain accessible to everyone and that centralized control on the production has to be avoided. In the present scenario, breeders have exclusive control over the propagating material (including seed, cuttings, divisions, tissue culture) and harvested material (cut flowers, fruit, foliage) of a new variety for a number of years according to the Plant breeders' rights (PBR), also known as plant variety rights (PVR). The PBR was instituted by the International Convention for the Protection of New Varieties of Plants (UPOV Convention) in 1961. The enforcement of these rights led to a reduction of biodiversity and plants' adaptability to the environment. Recently, alternatives to the copyright system have been proposed. By using open-source licenses it is possible to ensure that the varieties and their propagation material remain accessible to everyone. Kasveista will release the new varieties with an open-source license. Vertical farms will pay for the work behind the seed production, but we will not retain any copyright, allowing the farmers to become the owners of their seeds and to breed their own varieties as long as they release with an open-source license.

Risks & Challenges

We acknowledge that what we aim to do is not simple and that we have many challenges ahead. This does not undermine our determination in pursuing our goal and we are prepared to overcome all the difficulties we may encounter in our journey.

You may have concerns such as:

  • Breeding new varieties can require several years, when are we going to see your varieties? We are working on developing protocols for breeding that, while avoiding genetic recombination, will allow us to improve our varieties faster than in the past. 
  • You are asking for a relevant amount of money, what if you do not reach the target? We are confident that we are going to reach the target and start full speed in a few months. However, if we do not get to 100 % of our target, this will change speed, not direction. We will start slower and smaller confident that in little time we will grow.

We would like to hear from you

Please, if you have any question do not hesitate to contact us at info@kasveista.com

Other Ways You Can Help

You cannot give any money? No worries, there are many other ways you can help us reach our goal.

For example, you can share this page with your friends.

Be part of the community of people who want to improve the future of vertical farming, follow our news, workshops, and seminars on seeds and vertical farming by following us on:

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

LinkedIn

YouTube

story:
What is C.H.A.M.P. ?

Cabled – large disk shaped structure tethered to the ground with strong cables
High Altitude – roughly 20 kilometers off the ground, above clouds and most winds
Modular – made of relatively small and easy to make lighter than air modules
Platform – generate power & relay wireless data

What can it do for Climate?

Above all clouds the Sun always shines. With low temperatures and a lot more of highly energetic UV light on hand, C.H.A.M.P. can generate cheap, reliable and fully predictable solar power anywhere on Earth using almost no land area. With technology of today, going 100% renewable is well within our grasp.

What can it do for the underprivileged?

A single C.H.A.M.P. platform can provide Internet access to an area the size of France. 200 of them could cover the whole world in strong wireless signal. It is especially well suited for remote and mountain areas with no power and Internet infrastructure.

Jobs and prosperity will follow. Poverty and ignorance recede.

Facebook's Aquila or Google's Loon projects are testing similar approaches as well as HAPS, but C.H.A.M.P. is guaranteed to stay put and has non-stop power in MW range, offering clean electricity and making far cheaper client hardware possible.

Why here & why us?

Others have tried with similar ideas and not much traction, including Mr. Davidson, Mr. Kelly and others. That's why YOU are the key to make this happen!
We are a team of engineers from Croatia, homeland of Nikola Tesla, developing C.H.A.M.P. technical solutions for 13 years now.
With your help we want to accelerate development, turn it into a technical blueprint free for anyone to use and build a scaled prototype.

How can YOU help?

Spread the word! Let your friends know about it. Spend a little of your time and make a difference.

Contribute yourself! Are you passionate about science & technology? Do you want to help us with a cool rendering or an explainer video? Visit our project Wiki, doublecheck our facts and help us make it better.

Donate to this crowdfunding campaign and make sure our team meets this challenge full time!

How big are we talking about?

Consider a tethered balloon much lighter than air. Make it twice as big and its frontal area will quadruple but its buoyancy will increase eightfold!

In stratosphere, some 20 km high, there is a sweet spot of moderate wind averaging around 10 m/s. To stay within 10º of a chosen position in up to 50 m/s wind, our calculations show a Helium filled disk needs to be 800 m wide. A bigger unit can also make use of cheap and plentiful Methane gas.

C.H.A.M.P. will be built from many hexagonal cylinders strapped together in a honeycomb pattern, with tethers from each balloon clustered and interwoven together to form a manageable number of streamlined stripes going all the way to the ground. A small overpressure keeps modules in shape and their double envelope between lifting gas and air keeps shape stable as the structure is lifted from ground level to the stratosphere.

Armed with solar panels above and a wireless access point beneath, it is ready to change the face of the planet!
