story:
Introducing

 

Personal Lightning, Storm and Pre-Tornado Detection


Do something about DANGEROUS lightning and severe weather BEFORE it strikes!

The weather affects and influences almost everything you do! With 40 to 50 lightning flashes per SECOND and 1.4 BILLION flashes per year across the globe*, the weather detection hardware, regional data feeds and apps providing general information you currently rely on aren’t good enough to make real-time, local decisions in real-time situations! You can’t do anything about the weather unless you have the best information available, and the NIMBUS™ technology was created to do just that!

The NIMBUS™4 Personal Lightning, Storm and Pre-Tornado Detector is about to change the weather industry

Do you know lightning can strike from the trailing edge of a storm up to 8 MILES away AFTER the storm has PASSED and you have blue skies overhead? That’s often after the umpire, referee, or golf course ranger gave the ALL-CLEAR to resume play!

NIMBUS™ knows.

Do you know when to call the game based on lightning at a baseball, lacrosse or soccer game or tournament? Did the ump or ref base his/her decision by simply hearing or seeing it? Is the customary 30-minute wait correct—sometimes yes, but MOST times NO!



NIMBUS™ knows.

Out Boating on a beautiful day? Do you know when you have just enough time to come about and return to shore when lightning and storms are approaching?



NIMBUS™ knows.

Do you know how many more holes you can safely play before the approaching storm and LIGHTNING threatens the course?



NIMBUS™ knows.

NIMBUSTM4 knows where the lightning and the storms are, how fast they are approaching you, how much time you have before the storm is on top of you, when it is safe to return and so much more! 

Whether you're playing sports, on a boat, biking, hiking or on a golf course, you want accurate weather information.  If you're responsible for children playing outdoors or you're part of a crew, the weather has a direct impact on you. Severe weather can form without warning and quite often people are caught off guard. That's about to change with NIMBUS™4!

NIMBUS™4 will provide you with Estimated Time of Arrival, the speed and direction (NIMBUS™4D) as the storm is forming or moving toward you, time-to-clear, squall lines, lightning strikes, cloud-to-cloud (truly unique to the NIMBUS™) and cloud-to-ground lightning and even pre-tornado conditions.



NIMBUS™ knows and You will too. 


This map is taken from Wikipedia here. This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported license.

Lightning Facts

FACT:  Lightning and severe storm detection is essential to protecting lives.

FACT: Existing lightning detection technology was developed decades ago, is outdated and provides inaccurate data, including false positive alerts. For those of you who are not weather aficionados, false positives are interference from energy all around us, such as lawn mowers, cars, etc.

FACT:  While organizations spend an estimated $8B annually on detection hardware, data feeds, apps and subscription services, we have no better knowledge of when and where locally a lightning might strike, where a tornado might be forming or when to resume play.

We’ve all wondered why weather forecasts are inaccurate or why severe weather warnings cover huge geographic areas but NOT our LOCAL towns. 

As we mentioned before, weather detection technology has not fundamentally changed in decades even though distribution methods have. So, while fancy and really cool graphics show up on your phone, this is just repackaged low quality weather information being widely disseminated to the public at large.

That is about to change!

"Unfortunately few people know that the majority of information you turn to and count on to make weather decisions is often inaccurate, delayed or unreliable data."                                        Edward F. Shaver, CTO Entropy


The passion behind the product...



The technology driving NIMBUS™4 was developed by Edward Shaver, our CTO. He is the physicist who pioneered the commercial hand-held storm detection industry dedicating decades of research and development to earlier generations of hand-held lightning detection devices (the Skyscan® and ThunderBolt® products). He began this work in the 1990’s after learning of a fatal lightning strike of a young child standing on second base during a baseball game. Knowing that you and your child are no safer today with all of the weather apps on your phone or forecasts on the radio or TV, which use technology that is decades old, Edward wanted to offer a scientific solution where others have tried but failed. He has dedicated his life’s work and has developed completely revolutionary proprietary hardware and software with algorithms, 3 microprocessors and patent-pending NIMBUS™4 Quad-Matrix antenna array with you in mind.


STORM DETECTION TAKES A NEW DIRECTION!


Be one of the first to own this breakthrough technology!


REAL-TIME STORM INFORMATION NOW WITH DIRECTIONALITY!

 


The NIMBUS™4D combines the un-paralleled storm detection capabilities of the NIMBUS™4 with Entropy’s patent-pending directional system. Using the high-resolution storm data collected by the 4-channel antenna array, the NIMBUS™ 4D software provides the bearing to storm activity in 20 degree segments. Just as with all storm information provided by the NIMBUS™ technology, the storm direction is based on real-time data processed at the exact location of the NIMBUS™ unit.

The NIMBUS™4D display uses an on-board compass module to display the bearing to storm activity relative to true North. The storm bearing information is updated in real-time using the storm data being collected by the unit.


NIMBUS™4 and NIMBUS™4D Personal Lightning, Storm and Pre-Tornado Detectors


Patent-pending breakthrough technology...

Your participation will help us to change the world of severe weather detection and enhance public safety!

Built on our patent-pending Quad-Matrix array and proprietary software, NIMBUS™ core technology has been developed to create a rich data field of real-time, highly accurate localized information that does not exist in any other system or technology.

The NIMBUS™ data can then be used to identify severe weather events and provide alerts to users with both a speed and accuracy not previously available. In its final form, the NIMBUS™ technology will be deployed through fixed sensors that can be networked to provide very large coverage areas, up to state or national levels. By purchasing your hand-held detector today, you help move us closer to this target and much, much more.  Thank you.


ZERO FALSE POSITIVES - Why this is important

The NIMBUS™ Quad-Matrix antenna array was designed to maximize sensitivity and accuracy of storm data and to reduce the chance of false positive signals to zero. This is the result of the direct-to-digital signal conversion, and the ability of the NIMBUS™ to simultaneously analyze four channels of data. The NIMBUS™ is the ONLY personal storm detector that captures the full incoming waveform, and this information allows the NIMBUS™ to easily see the difference between lightning signals, and signals from any other source of electronic noise (such as lawn mowers, cars, etc.). Older products only use one or two channels for detection, but even these channels simply capture a pulse of energy and NOT the full waveform.  This is the reason these older products are prone to showing false positive warnings, and also prone to missing actual lightning strokes completely. 

How it works...

NIMBUS™ technology utilizes the most advanced, computing power with our patent-pending proprietary antenna array to monitor, analyze and share weather conditions happening around you in REAL TIME. Continuous visual text and strobe alerts keep you informed of local weather activity as it happens. Any storm detector is only as good as the antenna system collecting the data, and the antenna design in the NIMBUS™ is so good that we are getting it patented. Four channels of direct-to-digital data give the NIMBUS™ the power it needs to the job. Your unit is one smart storm detector and it's super easy to use! 

What is does...

NIMBUS™4 will provide you with ETA, the speed and direction (NIMBUS™4D) as the storm is forming or moving toward you, time-to-clear, squall lines, lightning strikes, cloud-to-cloud (truly unique to the NIMBUS™) and cloud-to-ground lightning and even pre-tornado conditions. The NIMBUS™ software architecture includes the ability to store up to a year’s worth of data inside the unit.  Two USB ports allow for a wide range of Internet connectivity to support data networking, remote diagnostics, and control of additional wireless accessories that can make your NIMBUS™ the heart of a complete system. The NIMBUS™ provides you with reliable, real-time severe weather activity within a 600 mile radius from your current location and alerts you to impending danger!  You'll have a continual stream of storm data giving you the power to make decisions including when it is safe to evacuate the playing field but also when to resume outdoor activities.


Product Specifications & Features

· ARM-Based Microprocessor architecture (3) for high resolution with Direct-to-Digital data collection and analysis

· 7.5 X 4 X 1.5 inches and weighs 2 lbs

· 10-12 hours of battery life - rechargeable

· Storm Detection range of 600 miles (965km)

· Early Storm Alerts out 20 miles

· Elimination of false positives

· Ability to detect all lightning strikes (cloud-to-cloud, cloud-to-ground, positive polarity) in complete form

· USB port for connectivity, updates, calibration and field diagnostics

· Software adjustments for latitude and terrain

· 3600 mAh rechargeable Lithium Ion battery (10-12 hr. life)

· 4 pre programmed languages (English, Spanish, French, Portuguese) plus others available for download

· Warning system uses screens and colored display of LED lights


What We Need & What You Get

Our campaign will fund the final completion and launch of our initial products, the NIMBUS™4 and NIMBUS™4D personal lightning, storm and pre-tornado conditions detector (www.nimbus4.com). Cash flow from these products will, in turn, fund the completion of the Nimbus™6 Tornado Detector, Nimbus™ Net (www.nimbus-net.com), military applications, UAV (drone) detection, earthquake detection and more.

Your participation will help us to CHANGE THE WORLD of severe weather detection and enhance public safety!


Who we are...

Florida is the "lightning capital of America" with more thunderstorms and lightning strikes than any other state.   Experienced weather industry executives  founded Entropy Technology Design, Inc. in Florida. 

Tami Fitzpatrick (CEO) established Entropy in the Tampa Bay area, as a woman-owned technology development company in 2014 to develop an integrated software and hardware driven technology for the severe weather and tornado detection/warning markets.

Edward Shaver (CTO), physicist is a co-founder of Entropy Technology Design, Inc. where he and a team of engineers are developing cutting edge technology that will let you make real decisions about the weather in real-time. Entropy is also developing detection of other events emitting low frequency signals, including tornados for deployment in a variety of forms including hand-held devices, a network of fixed sensors and mobile modules and more. 

For more information, please contact us or visit www.entropydesigns.com

Risks & Challenges

We've overcome many of the typical risks and challenges involved in the launching of new products.


  • Engineering specifications and mechanical production packages are complete   
  • Component vendors and manufacturing partner have been selected                       
  • Provisional Patent No. 62326079                                                                                           

Sources:  *National Geographic. http://geology.com/articles/lightning-map.shtml, NOAA

Disclaimer:

The products that serve as Perks are in the later part of development phase. We could encounter technical, economical or other circumstances such as funding issues that force us to delay delivery, production, design or even non-production of Perk. While unlikely, this could result in no product being delivered to the Contributor. Product design and features are also dependent on the success of the funding phase and are subject to change. By making a Contribution, the Contributor explicitly acknowledges the risks associated with the occurrence of any of the above events.  We have made substantial progress developing the product and will make every effort to achieve our development and production milestones. Your Contribution could make the difference!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

fancy and really cool graphics show up on your phone, this is just repackaged
low quality weather information being widely disseminated to the public at
large. 
That is about to change!

"Unfortunately
few people know that the majority of information you turn to and count on to
make weather decisions is often inaccurate, delayed or unreliable data."                                       
Edward
F. Shaver, CTO
Entropy 

The passion behind the product...





The
technology driving NIMBUS™4
was
developed by Edward Shaver, our CTO. He is the physicist who pioneered the
commercial hand-held storm detection industry dedicating decades of research
and development to earlier generations of hand-held lightning detection
devices (the Skyscan®
 and ThunderBolt®
 products). He began this work in the
1990’s after learning of a fatal lightning strike of a young child standing on
second base during a baseball game. Knowing that you and your child are no safer today with all of the
weather apps on your phone or forecasts on the radio or TV, which use
technology that is decades old, Edward wanted to offer a scientific solution
where others have tried but failed. He has dedicated his life’s work and has
developed completely revolutionary proprietary hardware and software with
algorithms, 3 microprocessors and patent-pending NIMBUS™4
Quad-Matrix antenna array
with you in mind.







 STORM DETECTION TAKES A NEW DIRECTION!








 Be one of the first to own this breakthrough technology!




REAL-TIME STORM INFORMATION NOW WITH DIRECTIONALITY!
  

 


        The  NIMBUS™4D combines the un-paralleled  storm detection 
capabilities of the NIMBUS™4 with Entropy’s patent-pending directional 
system.  Using the high-resolution storm data collected by the 4-channel
 antenna array, the NIMBUS™ 4D software provides the bearing to storm 
activity in 20 degree segments.  Just as with all storm information provided by the  NIMBUS™
 technology,  the storm direction is based on real-time data processed 
at the exact location of the  NIMBUS™ unit. 
        
         
        
      




 





The  NIMBUS™4D display uses an on-board compass module to 
display the bearing to storm activity relative to true North.  The storm
 bearing information is updated in real-time using the storm data being 
collected by the unit.






NIMBUS™4 and NIMBUS™4D Personal
Lightning, Storm and Pre-Tornado Detectors 











Patent-pending breakthrough technology...
Your participation will help us to change the world of severe weather detection and enhance public safety!
Built
on our patent-pending Quad-Matrix array and proprietary software, NIMBUS™ core technology has been developed to create a rich data field of
real-time, highly accurate localized information that does not exist in any
other system or technology. 


The NIMBUS™ data
can then be used to identify severe weather events and provide alerts to users
with both a speed and accuracy not previously available. In its final
form, the NIMBUS™ technology
will be deployed through fixed sensors that can be networked to provide very
large coverage areas, up to state or national levels. By purchasing your
hand-held detector today, you help move us closer to this target and much, much
more.  Thank you. 



ZERO FALSE
POSITIVES - Why this is important
The NIMBUS™ Quad-Matrix antenna array was designed to maximize
sensitivity and accuracy of storm data and to reduce the chance of false
positive signals to zero. This is the result of the direct-to-digital
signal conversion, and the ability of the NIMBUS™ to
simultaneously analyze four channels of data. The NIMBUS™ is the ONLY personal storm detector that captures the
full incoming waveform, and this information allows the NIMBUS™ to easily see the difference between lightning signals, and
signals from any other source of electronic noise (such as lawn mowers, cars,
etc.). Older products only use one or two channels for detection, but even
these channels simply capture a pulse of energy and NOT the full waveform. 
This is the reason these older products are prone to showing false positive
warnings, and also prone to missing actual lightning strokes completely.  
How it works...
NIMBUS™ technology
utilizes the most advanced, computing power with our patent-pending proprietary
antenna array to monitor, analyze and share weather conditions happening around
you in REAL TIME. Continuous visual text and strobe alerts keep you informed of
local weather activity as it happens. Any storm detector is only as good as the
antenna system collecting the data, and the antenna design in the NIMBUS™
is so good that we are getting it patented. Four channels of direct-to-digital
data give the NIMBUS™
the power it needs to the job. Your unit is one smart storm detector and it's
super easy to use!  

What is does...
NIMBUS™4 will
provide you with ETA, the speed and direction (NIMBUS™4D)
as the storm is forming or moving toward you, time-to-clear, squall lines,
lightning strikes, cloud-to-cloud (truly unique to the NIMBUS™)
and cloud-to-ground lightning and even pre-tornado conditions. The NIMBUS™
software architecture includes the ability to store up to a year’s worth of
data inside the unit.  Two USB ports
allow for a wide range of Internet connectivity to support data networking,
remote diagnostics, and control of additional wireless accessories that can
make your NIMBUS™
the heart of a complete system. The NIMBUS™ provides
you with reliable, real-time severe weather activity within a 600 mile radius
from your current location and alerts you to impending danger!  You'll have
a continual stream of storm data giving you the power to make decisions
including when it is safe to evacuate the playing field but also when to resume
outdoor activities.




Product Specifications & Features
· ARM-Based Microprocessor architecture (3) for high resolution with
Direct-to-Digital data collection and analysis 
· 7.5 X 4 X 1.5 inches and weighs 2 lbs 
· 10-12 hours of battery life - rechargeable 
· Storm Detection range of 600 miles (965km) 
· Early Storm Alerts out 20 miles 
· Elimination of false positives 
· Ability to detect all lightning strikes (cloud-to-cloud, cloud-to-ground,
positive polarity) in complete form 
· USB port for connectivity, updates, calibration and field diagnostics 
· Software adjustments for latitude and terrain 
· 3600 mAh rechargeable Lithium Ion battery (10-12 hr. life) 
· 4 pre programmed languages (English, Spanish, French, Portuguese) plus
others available for download 
· Warning system uses screens and colored display of LED lights
What We Need &
What You Get
Our
campaign will fund the final completion and launch of our initial products, the
NIMBUS™4 and NIMBUS™4D personal lightning, storm and pre-tornado conditions detector
(www.nimbus4.com). Cash flow from these products will, in turn, fund the
completion of the Nimbus™6 Tornado Detector, Nimbus™ Net (www.nimbus-net.com), military applications, UAV (drone)
detection, earthquake detection and more. 
Your participation will help us to CHANGE
THE WORLD of severe weather detection and enhance public safety!

Who we are...







Florida is the "lightning capital of America" with more thunderstorms and lightning strikes than any other state.   Experienced weather industry executives 
founded Entropy Technology Design, Inc. in Florida.  

Tami Fitzpatrick (CEO) established Entropy in the Tampa Bay area, as a woman-owned technology development company in 2014 to develop an
integrated software and hardware driven technology for the severe weather and tornado
detection/warning markets. 
Edward
Shaver (CTO), physicist is a co-founder of Entropy Technology Design, Inc. where he and a team
of engineers are developing cutting edge technology that will let you make real
decisions about the weather in real-time. Entropy is also developing detection
of other events emitting low frequency signals, including tornados for
deployment in a variety of forms including hand-held devices, a network of
fixed sensors and mobile modules and more.  
For more information, please
contact us or visit www.entropydesigns.com




Risks &
Challenges 
We've
overcome many of the typical risks and challenges involved in the launching of
new products. 




Engineering
     specifications and mechanical production packages are complete    

Component
     vendors and manufacturing partner have been selected                        

Provisional
     Patent No. 62326079                                                                                            



Sources:  *National Geographic. http://geology.com/articles/lightning-map.shtml, NOAA
Disclaimer:
The
products that serve as Perks are in the later part of development phase. We
could encounter technical, economical or other circumstances such as funding
issues that force us to delay delivery, production, design or even
non-production of Perk. While unlikely, this could result in no product being
delivered to the Contributor. Product design and features are also dependent on
the success of the funding phase and are subject to change. By making a
Contribution, the Contributor explicitly acknowledges the risks associated with
the occurrence of any of the above events. 
We have made substantial progress developing the product and will make
every effort to achieve our development and production milestones. Your Contribution
could make the difference!
 Other Ways You Can Help We understand that not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Backstory

During Zimbabwe’s period of land redistribution, 4,500 European owned farms (more than a quarter of the country) were handed over to 245,000 Black farmers. Some believe that Zimbabwe experienced a sharp decline in farm production due to the “fact” that “many of these ‘farmers’ had no experience or training in farming.” Others contend that failure was pre-destined because Black farmers lacked the resources necessary to be successful. 

Before the land distribution, less than 5% of Zimbabwean landowners/leaseholders were women. Afterwards, that number has risen to 20%. To empower these women and encourage more to pursue land ownership and entrepreneurship, blockchain-based financial solution start-up, BitMari, launched the BitMari Agritech Accelerator in partnership with the Women Farmers Land and Agricultural Trust. This is a crowdfunding campaign to award monetary funds--in the form of blockchain based digital coupons-- to women farmers in Zimbabwe so that they can acquire the farming inputs/equipment necessary for success in enterprise farming.

What We Need 

BitMari is looking to raise $20,000 to support three farms that were selected from our first Agritech Accelerator cohort. These entrepreneurs have the unique opportunity to participate in our Solar Modernization project which will help jumpstart their farming enterprises.

2nd Cohort Participants

Jean Kachambwa - Binder Farm | Goromonzi, Mashonaland East Province - Zimbabwe

Crops

  • Maize
  • Tomatoes
  • Lettuce
  • Spinach

Livestock

  • Pigs
  • Fish

Alice Violet - Derbyshire Farm | Gweru, Midlands Province - Zimbabwe

Crops

  • Maize
  • Soya Beans
  • Peanuts
  • Round Nuts
  • Sweet Potatoes
  • Cabbage
  • Onions

Ellah M'Baiwa - Land Scape Farm | Nyabira, Mashonaland West Province - Zimbabwe 

Crops

  • Tobacco
  • Maize (corn)
  • Vegetables

Livestock

  • Cattle

Benefits of Solar Powered Farms

When it comes to solar power, everyone wins. It may seem quite obvious that the agriculture industry benefits from solar power, but the benefits of solar power go far beyond what anyone would normally think. The amount and intensity of sunlight in any area is used to figure out what types of crops would grow best there and the best time of the year to plant them.

So it’s obvious that farms are planted in areas that receive a lot of sunlight, which is also a requisite for getting the most energy out of solar powered equipment.

The benefits to farmers include:

  • Solar energy saves farmers money. As the cost of energy continues to rise, farms that generate their own energy will become more and more important.
  • Solar power systems derive clean, pure energy from the sun. Installing solar panels on farms helps to combat greenhouse gas emissions and reduces our collective dependence on fossil fuel.

  • Irrigation becomes much easier. Where there’s solar power, remote water pumping becomes a possibility because it enables farmers to bring the energy to the equipment. No longer are they tied down by electrical wires. Now all they need is a few solar panels to power their pumps remotely.

The Impact

With our second cohort, BitMari is looking to not only promote ownership and entrepreneurship among women. The company is also looking to enhance each beneficiary’s prowess at her craft and help them to build something to leave to their children, an opportunity not afforded to Zimbabwean women of the past.  

Last year was we raised $23,000 in our inaugural campaign. With that, we were able to recruit, train and accelerate 80 farming enterprising owned by Zimbabwean women.

Other Ways To Contribute

The BitMari Agritech Accelerator is now accepting cryptocurrency donations in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dash, Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin Gold, and NEO.

BTC address: 1Kf5vMVuR5oYnnMfhdRZv3v3dFdztpUF5v

DASH address: Xko3eFY5KxzM3XHANRE9usrm9XqKDyjPyM

ETHER address: 0x5E25B8A6b262D07D3243FA2582C55c45B3457143

LTC address: LLUGTty9Rqt9ptBMjr5W3dyKCx6obmNMGg

BCH address: 16wYETimxkopNVYJCtMqa3j7ZTYapcQA8s

BTG address: GTkXN3vtbeoUXHvaVa4kVzfrLEo6hPtX4G

NEO address: ASPwdwCYbuF6Y1MRw8CWCLt8JgvJ9z2RN1

BitMari Agritech Accelerator in the News

Bitcoin Funding & Education For Zimbabwean Farmers

100 Zimbabwean Women Farmers Will Learn Power of Bitcoin

Bitcoin startup Bitmari introduces farmers in rural Zimbabwe to cryptocurrency as a cash alternative

Bitcoin Accelerator Could Provide Lifeline to Zimbabwean Women Farmers

Backed by Bitcoin: Virtual currency may help Zimbabwe's women farmers

Bitcoin is Improving Lives of Women Farmers in Zimbabwe

BitMari’s Farmers Accelerator Program Aims to “Decolonize African Agricultural Economies"

Bitcoin Funding & Education For Zimbabwean Farmers

About BitMari

BitMari, Inc. provides financial services that significantly lowers the cost and increases the speed of remittance payments throughout the African Diaspora using Bitcoin. Founded in 2015 by Sinclair Skinner and Christopher Mapondera, BitMari is the only Blockchain startup to possess an international license to use Bitcoin for remittances from an African Central Bank.

BitMari was launched in June 2015 with headquarters in Harare, Zimbabwe and office operations in Washington, DC.

story:
English and german text :

Hello, we are Ingo Schanze and Hans-Jürgen Hellpape. We combine experiences as technical Designer and business economist MBA with various backround in marketing, advertising (PR) and buildup companies in all facets.

Through conventional luminous advertising  we developed the great idea to produce luminous signs without any powerline connectivity.

The first result was our WindSunTower, who is running without any powerlines.

An additional USP is the LED-Monitor-Version whitch you can remote via Smartphone or computer from every point of our globe. So you can change fast and effective new information about prices, novelties, welcomes to you customers etc.

By the way more gadgets like lighting, Hotspot, chargingstation for eBikes etc. are possible.

Our first prototype runs since a half year without any problems.

Beside the technical solution we break the mold in marketing and sales. Our customers can buy the WindSunTower on the classic procedure. The retailprice is in accordance with all possible features between 15.000 and 20.000,00 Euro

Often there are financial barriers, therefore we give this product as a present.

These offer we developed for customers with own ground who want´s generate incomming money with advertising space.

Those customers give us about 4sqm free ground for 3 years and we keep the turnover which was generated from advertising customers. After 3 years we give the WindSunTower to the customer for free.

From this point the customer has own sales.

In this case, our turnover is multiple higher as the retailerprice.

The crowdfunding finance we need to cover the costs we have to pay in advance for the „Give Away - Version“ and to cover all costs for developing new products about „powerless“ luminated signs.

In this technical matters we have to be up to date; so we are still working with very experienced people who are working inside solar and new energy branch since decades.

In case of non fullfilling the founding aim, we will start the project with slower speed and smaler sales.

Because advertisement nowadays is an element of life, we will reduce the power consumption through our WindSunTower and all further developments.

The amortisation compare to conventional luminous advertisings and - in accordance with the sizes - 1 - 2 years.

We investigated all risks and barriers whithin the last 12 month, basicly they exists bacause of fundings by our customers. But our “Give-Away-Version” give them a good opportunity without any concerns. Currently we are working on shorter amortisation timeframes.

Another challenge we are working on is, that we plan to customize the WindSunTower.

Currently we have an international request for about 150 Towers; but their needs are: bigger sign-space, turnable sign-space and other new Gadgets.

To the Community: even you aren´t an potential Investor, every help in public relations about these interesting project will help us to  conquer the market soonest and to grown up with this business idea healthy and successful - pls pass on!

German Text

Guten Tag, wir sind Ingo Schanze und Hans-Jürgen Hellpape. Wir vereinen  die Erfahrungen als technischer Designer und und Betriebswirt mit vielfältigem Background im Marketing, der Werbung und dem Aufbau von Unternehmen in allen seinen Facetten.

Über die konventionelle Leuchtwerbung sind wir auf die Idee gekommen, diese stromlos zu kreieren.

Das erste Ergebnis ist der WindSunTower, der stromlos, da die Energie aus der Sonne und dem Wind geschöpft werden, diese Voraussetzungen erfüllt. Ein weiterer USP ist, wenn der Tower mit einem Monitor bestückt ist, kann  mit dem Smartphone oder per Computer, von jedem Arbeitsplatz der Welt die Werbe-Informationen modifiziert ( Preisinfos, Neuheiten, Nur heute, Kundenbegrüßung...) und neu eingespielt werden.

Übrigens sind weitere Gadgets wie Beleuchtung, Hotspot, Ladestation für eBikes u.v.m. möglich.

Der Prototyp arbeitet seit einem halben Jahr störungsfrei.

Neben der technischen Lösung gehen wir neue Wege im Marketing und Vertrieb. So kann der WindSunTower ganz klassisch von Eigenwerbern gekauft werden. Der Verkaufspreis liegt je nach Ausstattung zwischen 15.000,00 und 20.000,00 Euro.

Häufig gibt es Investitionshürden, deshalb verschenken wir den WindSunTower. Dieses Angebot richtet sich an die Kunden, die mit Werbeflächen Einnahmen  generieren.

 Sie stellen uns denStandort zur Verfügung  und überlassen uns 3 Jahre die Einnahmen aus der Werbung. Danach wird der Tower kostenlos übergeben und der Kunde erzielt die Einnahmen selbst. Die Einnahmen für uns ergeben ein mehrfaches des Verkaufspreises.

Die Finanzierung benötigen wir für Abdeckung der Vorkosten, bei der Variante - grüne Werbung geschenkt -, und dem Entwickeln weiterer stromloser Einsatzmöglichkeiten von Leuchtwerbung z. B. stromlose leuchtende Schriftzüge.

Um das Ohr an den neuestens technischen Möglichkeiten zu haben, arbeiten wir mit externen Entwicklern der Solar- und Speichertechnik zusammen.

Sollten wir das angestrebte Fundingziel nicht erreichen, dann würden wir mit reduzierten Mitteln das Projekt starten. Die Einschränkung läge dann im Tempo der Marktbearbeitung.

Da die Werbung elementarer Bestandteil des Lebens geworden ist, wollen wir den Stromverbrauch durch unseren WindSunTower  und nachfolgende Entwicklungen einschränken. Die Amortisationszeit beträgt konträr zur konventionellen Leuchtwerbung, in Abhängigkeit der Größe, 1 bis 2 Jahre.

Risiken und Hindernisse haben wir seit einem Jahr ermittelt, sie bestehen in der Hauptsache in dem Finanzieren durch den potentiellen Kunden. Durch unsere Geschenkt-Variante können wir die Bedenken zerstreuen. Bei den Eigenwerbern arbeiten wir an der Verkürzung der Amortisationszeiten.

Eine der Herausforderung ist die Anpassung des verhandenen WindSunTower an  Kundenwünsche. Uns liegt beispielsweise eine  internationale Anfrage über 150 Stück vor. Die Anforderungen sind: Vergrößerung der  Werbeflächen , drehbare Elemente einzufügen und noch ein paar andere Gadgets zu realisieren.

Daneben gibt es Anfragen aus dem nationalen Markt für insgesamt 50  Projekte, die sofort nach Funding realisiert werden können.

An die Community: auch, wer keine Finanzmittel einbringen kann, jedes weitersagen unseres Projektes hilft uns, den Markt zügig zu erobern und vor allem, neue Ideen rund um den WindSunTower zu entwickeln und zu realisieren.

So kann der WindSunTower ganz klassisch von Eigenwerbern gekauft werden. Der Verkaufspreis liegt je nach Ausstattung zwischen 15.000,00 und 20.000,00 Euro.Häufig gibt es Investitionshürden, deshalb verschenken wir den WindSunTower. Dieses Angebot richtet sich an die Kunden, die mit Werbeflächen Einnahmen  generieren. Sie stellen uns denStandort zur Verfügung  und überlassen uns 3 Jahre die Einnahmen aus der Werbung. Danach wird der Tower kostenlos übergeben und der Kunde erzielt die Einnahmen selbst. Die Einnahmen für uns ergeben ein mehrfaches des Verkaufspreises.Die Finanzierung benötigen wir für Abdeckung der Vorkosten, bei der Variante - grüne Werbung geschenkt -, und dem Entwickeln weiterer stromloser Einsatzmöglichkeiten von Leuchtwerbung z. B. stromlose leuchtende Schriftzüge. Um das Ohr an den neuestens technischen Möglichkeiten zu haben, arbeiten wir mit externen Entwicklern der Solar- und Speichertechnik zusammen.Sollten wir das angestrebte Fundingziel nicht erreichen, dann würden wir mit reduzierten Mitteln das Projekt starten. Die Einschränkung läge dann im Tempo der Marktbearbeitung.Da die Werbung elementarer Bestandteil des Lebens geworden ist, wollen wir den Stromverbrauch durch unseren WindSunTower  und nachfolgende Entwicklungen einschränken. Die Amortisationszeit beträgt konträr zur konventionellen Leuchtwerbung, in Abhängigkeit der Größe, 1 bis 2 Jahre.Risiken und Hindernisse haben wir seit einem Jahr ermittelt, sie bestehen in der Hauptsache in dem Finanzieren durch den potentiellen Kunden. Durch unsere Geschenkt-Variante können wir die Bedenken zerstreuen. Bei den Eigenwerbern arbeiten wir an der Verkürzung der Amortisationszeiten.Eine der Herausforderung ist die Anpassung des verhandenen WindSunTower an  Kundenwünsche. Uns liegt beispielsweise eine  internationale Anfrage über 150 Stück vor. Die Anforderungen sind: Vergrößerung der  Werbeflächen , drehbare Elemente einzufügen und noch ein paar andere Gadgets zu realisieren.Daneben gibt es Anfragen aus dem nationalen Markt für insgesamt 50  Projekte, die sofort nach Funding realisiert werden können.An die Community: auch, wer keine Finanzmittel einbringen kann, jedes weitersagen unseres Projektes hilft uns, den Markt zügig zu erobern und vor allem, neue Ideen rund um den WindSunTower zu entwickeln und zu realisieren.

story:
HOW CAN BEEKEEPING BE IMPROVED UPON?

Humans have been making beehives for eons and Langstroth, Warre, Layens, Perrone, Slavic, Japanese, Ukrainian, Top Bar and other hive systems all have their strengths.  But with North American honey bee colony losses averaging over fifty percent in 2017, conventional practices with typical hive boxes need to be questioned.  We think beekeeping might benefit from some re-thinking, so we’re approaching it with a new look at improving how honey bees are housed.

  •   First is improving the ratio of comb area to hive space for better thermal efficiency.   
  •   Second is reducing the amount of bee disturbance typical during hive inspections. 
  •   Third is tighter hive construction with modular hive components you can grow with. 
  •   Fourth, is exploring alternatives to the questionable practice of re-purposing wax.   
  •   Fifth, is applying technology to enable proactive hive monitoring and management​  

Honeycomb Hives is pleased to introduce Lambrecht's amazing new Hexagonal Prism Hives featuring universally-sized Smart Frames and exclusive Comb Honey Cup Harvesting system, practical accessories and logical options swappable among all 5 Honeycomb Hive types.


   

“Every journey begins with a single step” Lao Tzu 

What started as a single idea morphed into something else altogether and inspiration for a new beehive evolved into an integrative system.  The first step for us was our decision to focus on healthier honey bee environs. Making our innovative hive system more sustainable, affordable, approachable, profitable and available to beekeepers worldwide, is our journey. ​

Doug has come up with a remarkable system of well-fitted parts, manufactured from high-quality exterior plywood, to be assembled per order.  The secret is precision achievable  with CNC Routers. To ensure quality, hive boxes will ship assembled and beekeepers need only decide upon and apply paint or tung oil and  attach hardware and assemble their frames. 

 Honey Bees pollinate about a third of our fruits and favorite foods worldwide 

Beekeeping is an incredibly positive, rewarding activity, and we get honey!

Beekeeping is enjoyed by families worldwide. Photos:  Alessia Franchino, Queen Breeder

 

   How do Honeycomb Hives Work?

Honeycomb Hives are similar to other beehives worldwide in that they use removable comb frames for easy hive inspections and management.  There are five Honeycomb Hive types and all share exchangeable Hexagonal Smart-Frames.   Somewhat like Top Bar hives, these hives have a horizontal, rather than vertical, orientation.  This means beeks are lifting frames instead of heavy supers.   Honeycomb Hives frames can also be easily inspected with one hand. 


   Our Hexagonal Smart-Frames System

Honeycomb Hive’s secret sauce and main differentiator, other than design, is the Smart-Frame System. This is what makes Lambrecht’s system remarkably integrative. Crafted to allow 3/8” bee space below, around and above, these hexagonal frames allow bees freedom of choice for movement amongst frames, improve air circulation and also help reduce propolis. 

The Honeycomb Smart-Frames System includes frame types that accept either wax or plastic foundation, comb honey cups, queen-excluders, frames for natural comb and follower boards. Together with divider boards, these hive tools comprise our Smart-Frame System and are exchangeable among Honeycomb Hive types.

Our Smart-Frames for foundation are also easier and quicker to work with at the bench. When installing foundation, the two frame halves fit together to "sandwich" the foundation between them, so it is fully supported all the way around and no tedious wiring work is necessary

All Smart-Frames also feature knurled-knob adjustable spacers to allow beeks to tweak their frame spacing with a twist of the wrist.  Whether for small cell work, brood boxes, overwintering or honey production, frame spacing adjustments are easy-peasy and no tools are needed.  (variable from 1  1/8”  to  1  1/2”)
 

  Integrative Features and Accessories

Logical options allow beekeepers ultimate flexibility in choosing which hive and frame types best suit their preferences.  For example, any type of foundations are readily accepted or natural beekeepers can opt for our natural comb frames. Feeding options include in-hive divider feeders or 2 quart Cupola feeders or patty boards. Other logical options include observation panes, screen bottoms, pull-out debris trays and pollen traps.

 

  Beekeeping is fun, but Serious Business

The stakes are high!   Honey Bee colonies keep their cluster temperature at 94 F year round to protect their queen and brood. Warm moist air from the bees cluster rises in typical rectangular beehives to meet the cold flat top.  There condensation occurs and rains down onto the clustering bees.  They can usually handle cold but not wet.  HONEYCOMB HIVES Peaked Roof keeps the bees dry.

Hexagonal hives are more thermally-efficient so your bees conserve energy by spending less.

 


  Preferred Beehive Management Practices

1)  Use Follower Boards to right-size hive space as the colony grows. Honey Bees love tight spaces and tighter hives are easier for them to defend.  With a front entrance like Nucs or Starter Hive, a great practice is to use a Follower Board right against the front entrance before inserting comb frames.  This creates a vestibule of sorts where bees can gather and also can defend their entrance.

2)  Don't give your bees too many frames or too much space. Rather, a good practice is to let them grow into their hive space gradually. When installing a new package or nuc, give them only four or five frames to start, backed by a Follower Board. Your queen will be happier with this arrangement and as she fills the combs with brood you can easily monitor progress and move the follower board to add a couple more frames as the girls build them out.  When you see the first full honey frame, you can pull the Follower Board as the queen will rarely venture past that first frame of honey in Honeycomb Horizontal Hives 

 Risks and challenges

Of course all new ventures face challenges, but serial entrepreneurs learn that mitigating risks is all about solid strategies and preparation. Numerous previous startups have helped us learn that success is dependent upon careful advance planning and follow-through. Our production strategy centers on solid product engineering and precise design details and is strengthened by harmonious relations with the factory team that will produce our hive parts. We've already made arrangements for materials on site and preparations for manufacturing have been under way for two years. Similarly, despite being months out, detailed plans for packaging, labeling and fulfillment are already well underway.

We're fine with taking it step by step, but one of the biggest risks a company faces is not being prepared to scale operations if faced with robust demand. In this case we are confident that our planning, supply chain and manufacturer's capability and commitment to scale with us will help us meet whatever level of market demand we are fortunate enough to tap into. Our goal and intention is to fulfill pre-orders and perks before 2019 beekeeping season begins so that our fellow beeks can prepare their new hives for their spring bee package installs.

"The world desperately needs more informed, well-equipped beekeepers to take up the enjoyable practice of responsible husbandry of honey bees"   Doug Lambrecht

 

ABOUT DOUG LAMBRECHT:

I retired last year from thirty years as an investment adviser to devote my full time and attention to helping honey bees and beekeepers find or innovate ways to extend honey bee colony life spans. Serving honey bees and beekeepers is my ikigai. It gets me up early and inspires me. That, and encouragement from my clan, keeps me fully amped.

My work experience and combined skill sets are almost eerily aligned for this project.  In early adulthood I spent 15 years as a furniture designer/craftsman with distribution in 11 states.  I've also founded seven start-up companies, including several retail operations, two manufacturing firms, two Registered Investment Advisory firms (One sold to Suntrust) and an organic specialty foods distributor called Real Wasabi, with nationwide placements with Fresh Markets, Wegmans, Whole Foods, Kroger, Costco and others. (more at realwasabi.com)

As an organic farmer raising vegetables, wasabi, mushrooms, berries, and a mixed orchard of fruit trees, I am fortunate to live in close touch with nature. After noticing a decline in pollinators on our farm some years back, I began beekeeping. After a couple of frustrating seasons, I decided there must be a better way to keep bees than stacks of heavy boxes. I've since invented a new beekeeping system and spent three years bee-testing and refining it. 

ABOUT HONEYCOMB HIVES:

Honeycomb Hives, Inc. is a US-based startup that aims to change the shape of beehives in garden, backyard and urban apiaries, worldwide, offering a game-changing, affordable beekeeping system for more precisely keeping bees and harvesting natural comb honey.

story:
WONGDI PRAYER WHEELS

Hi Everyone, 

    Aka here. I'm the CEO of Kada Imports Ltd. My background has been in business/ entrepreneurship, education, operations and project management. I have a passion for projects that are cultural, well intentioned/ purposeful, and aim to better society (in some fashion). 

This project is hugely exciting for me because it brings a lot of my personal passions together. The Himalayas, where my father is from, where my brother was born, where my mom, dad, and brother (and others) opened a school (Taktse International School) is a region in rapid transition. This transition can be very overwhelming for locals, elderly, the younger generations, etc. There are very few ways that respect the old traditions while integrating new sciences, ideas, and technologies. This is one of them.

If we can make prayer wheels spin better then there will be more good merit/ Sonam (merit) in the world. I think we can all agree that more good energy is needed in this world. It will make spinning prayer wheels enter the modern world (of efficiency) with its culture intact. And the most exciting part for me is that it will create green energy in a part of the world that is known for its connection to nature, spirits and animals and is also connecting two of the largest power using countries (India & China) in the world. 

BRING IT TO LIFE:

Break it down for folks in more detail:

We will need approximately $5k to bring this project from concept to prototype. This funding will go to our engineering team/ partners, to research and implementation, and preparation of the prototype for the market.

Any and all donations are accepted and appreciated. With a certain level of donation you will receive a special gift. All of these gift you can learn more about on our website, www.kadaimports.com. 

 

  • With a donation of $50 you will receive a miniature prayer wheel. (similar to the one in our promo video). It is great for your desk, coffee table, house entrance/exit, etc. 
  • With a donation of $100 you will receive a mini prayer wheel and 1 ounce of Himalayan, black tea. 
  • With a donation of $200 you will receive the two prior items as well as a Himalayan tote bag, stitched together with recycled nylon and a great way to limit your plastic usage. It is strong and great for trips to the grocery store, beach, and more. 
  • With a donation of $300 you get the mini prayer wheel, the tea, the tote bag, and a blessed Kada. Now a kada is, traditionally/ usually, a blessed, white, silk scarf that is draped over your shoulders, a painting, a photo, or something that has meaning to you in your life. 

THE IMPACT

Your donation and support will make us one step closer to making a prayer wheel that spins more efficiently. In an era of perpetually increasing power demands having a mechanism that increases the proliferation of good karma in the simplest of ways, spinning a wheel, seems increasingly important. The prayer wheel has always had a symbolic presence in the Buddhist culture and now it can be updated in a way that preserves that culture but also adds an additional level of functionality. In addition to the increased good karma, these prayer wheels could help supplement the need for energy in these communities. If the prayer wheels are able to create and capture the energy to power things like lights, heaters, internet, and more it makes a unique cross generational and cross cultural connection that benefits all sentient beings.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

This project does not come without risks and challenges. We will have to find a way to make these prototypes scalable with a price point that makes sense for monasteries and communities to adopt them. We will need to make them connect to the power grid or distribute the power. We will need to navigate different cultures, worlds, religions, people, etc. 

Our plan is to first create the prototype. Second is to get feedback from the community we hope to serve. Third is to adjust and modify our invention to be able to meet requirements. Fourth is to strategize/ create an integration and implementation plan.

We have a strong network of problem solvers, business people, entrepreneurs, educators, locals and foreigners, that are resourceful and intentional. This network will help us address the issues and challenges above as well as the unplanned ones both as they arise and we we can see them in the future.  

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Please consider spreading this project across your social networks or introducing it to friends and family or colleagues that might be interested. Crucial to the success of this project is connecting with people that can support through may different ways. Use the Indiegogo tools and help us get this project the publicity, the energy, and the movement it needs to become a spinning reality. 

Thank you - The Kada Imports Ltd. Team

story:
Introduction

Drinking with Fuffee Mug adds another taste to your coffee. By implementing the cutting-edge technology, Fuffee Mug enables you to enjoy your time of coffee drinking, to colorize your social network as well as to improve the quality of your life itself. Giving you the unique feeling & taste for your every coffee moment - this is our ultimate goal & idea under the invention of Fuffee Mug. Please taste the new feeling of drinking coffee and colorize your life with Fuffee Mug.

 

 

 

Features

By harnessing thermal energy from a  coffee Fuffee becomes a battery-free social platform mug that enables you to cooperate with various media's brands and services. You'll feel something different each time you drink your Fuffee.

 

 
  • You can enjoy your coffee in Fuffee with your family far away. Or that could be your loved one.

 

 
  • You can enjoy your coffee time together with your friends of Fuffee. One Fuffee of hot coffee will be enough to upload around 5-10 images. Share your coffee time with friends.

 

 

 

  • Fuffee gives you a possibility of interacting with various media and services if just some hot coffee is in it. You are not only having some coffee but also enjoying social with Fuffee.

 

 
  • You can enjoy your coffee at temperatures between 71.1°C and 85°C (160-185°F), but how? Fuffee will check that out before your tongue. The Fuffee also has a temperature sensor, and it will report back to the paired smartphone app with the current temperature of the coffee.. Wow! 

 

 

  • Or you can write down mind-blowing sayings.

 

Technology

 

Fuffee looks nothing different with ordinary mugs except for the e-paper. Yes, it is. Our mission has always been to enrich coffee moments. At this time we approached enriching from a completely new angle. 

 

 

 

 

 

This Fuffee features a small and simple E-ink which is powered by pouring hot coffee into the cup. The fun thing about e-paper screens is that the latest picture will stay on the screen even after the power runs out. It will remain there until the end of the world, or at least until you pour another cup because there is a button battery in it.

No electricity! No cable! No recharge! Just hot coffee only!!!

 

Product

 

 

 

How to use

 

 

 

Download the application from the company website directly. Make sure your bluetooth is on and open the app. You’ll also need your Fuffee ID number which can be found on the bottom of the cup. If you succeed at this, you can tackle anything.

 

 

Upload your craziest or dorkiest images onto the queue. They will  appear on the Fuffee screen from here. If you already have friends with Fuffee, you can add images to their picture queues.

 

 

 

Why Fuffee?

We compare Fuffee with other mugs. It's your choice now. Fuffee or not?

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We continue to develop the applications to allow you to transfer not only images but also videos. Unfortunately, only black and white images can be displayed on the e-paper now. We hope we can promote something innovative next time to show you colorful images rather than dark ones.
story_txt:
Introduction
Drinking with Fuffee Mug adds another taste to your coffee. By implementing the cutting-edge technology, Fuffee Mug enables you to enjoy your time of coffee drinking, to colorize your social network as well as to improve the quality of your life itself. Giving you the unique feeling & taste for your every coffee moment - this is our ultimate goal & idea under the invention of Fuffee Mug. Please taste the new feeling of drinking coffee and colorize your life with Fuffee Mug.
 
 
 
Features
By harnessing thermal energy from a  coffee Fuffee becomes a battery-free social platform mug that enables you to cooperate with various media's brands and services. You'll feel something different each time you drink your Fuffee.
 

 
You can enjoy your coffee in Fuffee with your family far away. Or that could be your loved one.
 

 
You can enjoy your coffee time together with your friends of Fuffee. One Fuffee of hot coffee will be enough to upload around 5-10 images. Share your coffee time with friends.
 

 

 
Fuffee gives you a possibility of interacting with various media and services if just some hot coffee is in it. You are not only having some coffee but also enjoying social with Fuffee.
 

 
You can enjoy your coffee at temperatures between 71.1°C and 85°C (160-185°F), but how? Fuffee will check that out before your tongue. The Fuffee also has a temperature sensor, and it will report back to the paired smartphone app with the current temperature of the coffee.. Wow! 
 
 
Or you can write down mind-blowing sayings.
 
Technology

 
Fuffee looks nothing different with ordinary mugs except for the e-paper. Yes, it is. Our mission has always been to enrich coffee moments. At this time we approached enriching from a completely new angle. 
 
 
 
 
 
This Fuffee features a small and simple E-ink which is powered by pouring hot coffee into the cup. The fun thing about e-paper screens is that the latest picture will stay on the screen even after the power runs out. It will remain there until the end of the world, or at least until you pour another cup because there is a button battery in it.
No electricity! No cable! No recharge! Just hot coffee only!!!
 
Product

 
 
 
How to use

 
 
 
Download the application from the company website directly. Make sure your bluetooth is on and open the app. You’ll also need your Fuffee ID number which can be found on the bottom of the cup. If you succeed at this, you can tackle anything.
 
 
Upload your craziest or dorkiest images onto the queue. They will  appear on the Fuffee screen from here. If you already have friends with Fuffee, you can add images to their picture queues.
 
 
 
Why Fuffee?
We compare Fuffee with other mugs. It's your choice now. Fuffee or not?
 

 

 


 

 

Risks & Challenges
We continue to develop the applications to allow you to transfer not only images but also videos. Unfortunately, only black and white images can be displayed on the e-paper now. We hope we can promote something innovative next time to show you colorful images rather than dark ones.

story: Campaign No Longer Active
story_txt: Campaign No Longer Active

story:
Zire is eco-friendly, flameless, windproof and uses no butane or other fuels. It is one of the worlds most advanced lighters ever made. With the dual plasma beam technology in a cross-pattern and with the classic and timeless design, we think we have created a winner.

The lighter is made of 0,8 mm thick recycled zinc alloy, anodized in five different colors. The anodizing gives the lighter an extremely durable and scratch free surface.

 

The cross-pattern of the plasma beams creates an incredibly intense point of energy which makes the lighter multiple times more efficient than regular lighters, minimizing the waste of energy.
 


It instantly lights up anything an ordinary lighter does, such as paper, candles, cigarettes, cigars etc. It’s literally impossible to blow out and works when wet.
 

Advanced technology combined with classic and clean design is one of the things that makes Zire the beautiful thing it really is.
 

Cetifications

Zire meets all the conditions required for both the RoHS, CE and FCC certifications. That means it is safe to use and are allowed to be sold, including in the US and Europe. Products that need to but do not hold this label but are yet being sold in the US and Europe is illegal and can be dangerous to use. Over 90 % of the Chinese factories do not have these certifications on their products at all, that’s worth having in mind before buying similar products on cheap websites.
 

Charging

A fully charged Zire can light up as many as 550 candles and the battery can be recharged more than 500 times. It’s charged by a USB cable plugged into a laptop, power bank, car, smartphone charged or anything else with a USB connector. The USB cable is included in the box. 
 

Colors


Available in five different colors – Silver, Black, Gold, Rainbow and Blue
 

Financial Incentives

According to our test, the average disposable lighter can be used 1,5 times longer than a fully charged Zire lighter.

The Zire can be recharged more than 500 times which is equivalent to 333 disposables.

The average price of a disposable lighter in Europe is $1,3 which accumulates to total cost of $433 to match the lifetime of the Zire.

The electricity to fully charge the Zire 500 times is less than 40 cents.
 

The Manufacturing

We already have the tools ready for production and will start the production as soon as the campaign is over. Our goal is to deliver the lighters by late June / early July this summer. 
 

Flexible Funding

This campaign has flexible funding enabled. That means we will receive the funding even if the funding goal isn´t met. Since we already have the tools for production, we need the money to buy some of the components needed. We have a granted credit from the bank for all the money we need but are happy if we won´t be forced to use it. 
 

Thank You

If you decide to back this project - We just want to say that We, Planet Earth and Future Generations is Forever Grateful.

story:
Even though Carro is creating cutting edge innovation, our products are affordable. That’s how we show you we are smart. Our Intelligent Ceiling Fans are sold at Home Depot, Lowes and Amazon where America shops and where America finds good value.   We won’t stop at Intelligent Ceiling fans. Look for new innovation from Carro…..all designed to help you keep your smart life moving forward.    

More Energy Efficient 

Carro’s DC motors release less heat, resulting in less energy loss while providing better temperature control with low frequency sounds.

 

Safer to Install and Replace  

The ultra-low voltage motor design (24V) is 80% lower than other ceiling fans, allowing you to safely install Carro yourself. 

 

  • Remote Control

Conveniently control the fan and lighting from anywhere in your home. No wall switch installation needed. 

  • Wi-Fi Enabled

Connect Carro to your Wi-Fi to customize different modes and settings from your smartphone.

 
  • Smartphone App

Adjust the wind speed, set Warm or White light, and schedule timers using the  App. 

 

  • Voice Control

Adjust the wind speed, set Warm or White light, and schedule timers using the APP.

Trifecte Inc was established as a innovation company. At Trifecte we design simple, yet practical and powerful, technology that helps your smart life stay in motion by linking to devices like Alexa, Google Home and your smartphone. Even though Trifecte is creating cutting edge innovation, our products are affordable. That’s how we show you we are smart. We won’t stop at Intelligent products. Look for new innovation from Trifecte…..all designed to help you keep your smart life moving

story:
Imagine a strong, constant, clean and equally distributed 

source of energy.


Imagine a technology that can exploit it.


Imagine what a paramount advantage it would be for all of us.


What if all this was not a figment of your imagination?




Here we are.


We have found the Source, the High Altitude Winds.


We have got the Technology, the KiteGen Stem.


We are just a step away from making all this possible.



Now it's your turn!! 


Help us make the final step, the installation of our big scale generator, and take part in the new energy era.

Each Non-Profit which is now supporting us will benefit from the revenues that will come from the sale of the energy produced by our 1st KiteGen Stem.




Installation site: Giaveno - TO - Italy


Sound good enough?! Learn more…



We do not go in search of windy areas to install our machines.

We just go wherever energy is needed
!





The KiteGen Stem, now covered by 40 international patents, is based on a quite simple working principle. A giant automatically driven wing, designed and implemented by our team, flies between 600 and 2000 meters to harvest the mechanical energy of the high altitude winds. Two high-strength ropes connect the wing to the base and transmit its tension, which activates the power generators located on the ground, thus producing energy. Along the years, our engineers have developed several prototypes.


2006 - Mobile Gen  

2012 - KiteGen Stem  

2014 - KiteWing - 3MW



...our goal is important and you can offer us invaluable help....


...our success could be a paramount achievement for all mankind...


...this is why we will return the favor!



The more we will be able to implement our technology, the more our partners will get.



Now, imagine what we could do, all together, in favor of the environment and of the people all over the world

HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN!


Our Non-Profit Partners:

  • Amnesty International - The ONG for Human Rights

  • Source International - ONG for environmental pollution and health problems



Bridge For Good - ONG for Corporate Responsability Culture and Activities


Our Supporting Non-Profit Organizations and Associations:

  • Aisiwh
  • Telethon
  • Association Swiss Morning Star
  • East-West Bridge Ginevra
  • Fondazione Candiolo
  • Association Somalya
  • Omnia
  • Fondazione Five Onlus


Our K-Gifts:
KiteGen T-Shirt



KiteGen Hat

     

KiteGen T-Shirt - Limited Edition: The Carousel

We’re offering an exclusive, limited edition version of our KiteGen T-shirt (see below)! Become one of our early backers and receive this special reward! 


KiteGen Gift Kite 
Size is 68*68 cm and can fly with a wind speed of 6 km/h.


KiteGen Trainer
Kite to get a closer idea of our big KiteWing and play with the wind. 
Size is 130*55 cm, 2 cables, can fly with a wind speed of 10 Km/h.


First Energy Power Kite in human history  - Collection piece


Holyweek for 2 people at the KiteGen base - Turin + 2 Expo Tickets



More about High Altitude Wind Energy and KiteGen Technology




Bibliography

- www.nature.com/nclimate/journal/vaop/ncurrent/full/nclimate1683.html

- Archer C.L., Caldeira K.: Global Assessment of High-Altitude Wind Power. Energies, Vol. 2, n 2, 2009, p. 307-319: http://www.mdpi.com/1996-1073/2/2/307

- Schmehl R.: Kiting from wind power. Wind Systems, July 2012, p. 36-43. http://www.windsystemsmag.com/media/pdfs/Articles/2012_July/0712_Kite.pdf

- Casale C., Viani S., Marcacci P.: Valutazione sistemi “kite wind generator”. CESI Ricerca, prot. n°08005694, Febbraio 2009. 

http://kitegen.com/pdf/P%2021%202012%20-%20CESI%20RICERCA%20Valutazioni%20sui%20sistemi%20Kite%20Wind%20Generator%20-%202009.pdf

- National Renewable Energy Laboratory, US department of Energy. LCOE Analysis. http://www.nrel.gov/analysis/tech_lcoe_documentation.html

- NASA AWE Project (http://climate.nasa.gov/news/727)

- USAF AWE assessment (http://www.dtic.mil/dtic/tr/fulltext/u2/a539255...)


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are a technician, a scientist, a communicator, an entrepeneur, an investor or a dreamer of a better world you can spread the voice of our mission and share this campaign. You can also send us an email to collaborate with us. You can help us in several different ways to develop our project worldwide.

Please visit the FAQ page on our website

story:
My name is Ralph Black and I have been an idea guy for as long as I can remember.  Years ago my first idea for a marketable product was "The Comic Leg".  This was a leg that hung out of the trunk of your car and had different sayings like "Boss in Trunk", "Tourist in Trunk" etc.  I have worked in the automotive parts manufacturing and distribution industry as an executive for almost a decade as well as owned my own businesses and ran others over the last 35 Years.  I am an Author of the book "So you Think Your Ready for Life" (to be released in the fall of 2017) a book of stories with lessons to help you get through all types of hiccups in your path through life.  As a father and now a grandfather I own the responsibility of making this world better for my children and my grandchildren.

After the initial designs and prototype used for proof of concept we joined forces with The University of Illinois at Chicago and their mechanical engineer design team.  We needed to model the TPRES and determine feasibility on a large scale.  After the successful completion of the studies we are now ready to build the production scale TPRES TM for in-road testing and that's where we need your help or shall I say contribution to the pursuit of saving our environment for each other and our children.

Your contribution to the TPRES TM brings us closer to producing mass amounts of energy from every day traffic.  Once completed we can fulfill letters of intent we have received from cities and start installing the completed products not only in areas of America but also in other countries where traffic is high but energy resources are minimal.

Imagine having to live each day with only a few hours a day to use electricity to cook, do laundry, access the web, heat or cool your home.  Then from everyday traffic and an installed TPRES TM all of a sudden, you can now utilize electricity throughout the day.  Bringing electricity to the masses and reducing our overall carbon footprint is our goal and we hope its yours too.

What We Need & What You Get

We currently need $244,790.00 to fund the remaining R&D and to build the in-road production unit for live real time usage and final testing.

Since we own the Patent on the TPRES TM the Technology risk is minimal but we are always trying to find ways to increase the power production.  So we need to test different size cylinders and air generation devices to maximize the TPRES TM technology.

Some of our perks are unique for instance for the $20.00 contribution your name appears on our website as one of the key people contributing to a cleaner planet and the $800.00 contribution Gold level your name appears on the first actual TPRES TM unit.  Talk about being on the ground floor of a tech start up with potential, you can't get any closer to the ground than that. 

Even if you can't contribute to our campaign you can still help save the planet by sending the word out to all your social friends and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools.  When they get to the Indiegogo site they can also search #TPRES.  We are grateful for any way you can help get the word out.

If for some reason the campaign is not fully funded the funds we do receive will still go to the advancement of the finished product, it will just take a little longer to get there.

story:
Imagine the possibilities if you could bring a portable power grid with you anywhere you went? Imagine a device so powerful you could light up a treehouse, run a refrigerator out of the back of your car, or set up an office lakeside in the woods? Imagine a world where no hospital, no school, no shelter, no family ever has to go without power again.  A Portable Electromagnetic Generator has the power to make power available to everyone in the world. I have a working prototype and I want to see this product make it to market.

My name is ALLEN SCHWARTZ MD, a licensed medical doctor for over 40 years, in private practice in FLORIDA. I've designed and fabricated a working prototype with the help of engineers from mainland China and the UK. I graduated with a BS with Honors with Thesis from Stevens Institute of Technology, in Hoboken, NJ.

Since 2012,  I've work tirelessly to invent a non-polluting power source FREE FROM THE GRID, affordable, lightweight and portable. The device uses a patented motionless rotor that supplies up to 15,000 Watts of power depending on the model(3,000, 6000, 12,000 and 15,000 watts).  It is based on Faradays Law of electromagnetic induction. It uses and imbedded electronic controller meter that monitors, in Realtime, Power IN, Power OUT, Voltage IN, Voltage OUT, Current IN, and Current OUT using a Wi-Fi feature.  The invention is in the prototype stage and is in dire need of generous donors as yourselves to make this invention moved to market ASAP. This product does not compete with the fossil-fuel industry but rather compliment it as an alternative energy source that can be used anywhere in the world. Moreover, the cost of energy to power your home has become burdensome and in many instances, unaffordable especially among the elderly on fixed income.    

With the help of contributors like yourselves, we can get this prototype to market within 12 months. I am passionate about this product and its potential to change peoples lives, not only in the USA but throughout the world.

On a personal note, several years ago, I was involved in medical volunteer work at a rural hospital in KENYA. The price of power was such, that I personally witnessed that even the local hospital's power was cut off for lack of payment of their energy bills on multiple occasions.  Moreover, even medical doctors' power to their homes was cut off due to difficulty paying their electric bills. So affordable energy is a problem worldwide!

As potential contributors, are you ready to make a generous contribution to this effort???

 

 

Facebook Fundraiser:

https://www.facebook.com/donate/913351209413008/

With the help of contributors like yourselves, we can get this prototype to market within 12 months. I am passionate about this product and its potential to change peoples lives, not only in the USA but throughout the world.
On a personal note, several years ago, I was involved in medical volunteer work at a rural hospital in KENYA. The price of power was such, that I personally witnessed that even the local hospital's power was cut off for lack of payment of their energy bills on multiple occasions.  Moreover, even medical doctors' power to their homes was cut off due to difficulty paying their electric bills. So affordable energy is a problem worldwide!
As potential contributors, are you ready to make a generous contribution to this effort???

 
 
Facebook Fundraiser:
https://www.facebook.com/donate/913351209413008/

story:
Save up to 70% of your water heating bill

 

SolarHotty allows for the LOWEST COST use of Photovoltaic solar panels in the residential and light industrial markets EVER!

Simply connect up to 1500 Watt of solar panels to the SolarHotty and start powering any appliance that makes use of a thermostat and resistive heating element. 

Solar Cooking & Food Prep

 

Don't stop at water heating, SolarHotty can also power electrical cooking plates, ovens, food warmers, grills and whatever else you can find a modern households or restaurant kitchen. 

The fact that you can virtually run two electrical wires from your solar panel installation to your preferred point of use, makes it modular and really hassle free to install in any type of dwelling, whether that be your home, your office building, retail outlet or restaurant. 

Do you want to save money on your energy spend, support renewable integration and be sustainable? Then you simply have to keep reading! 

The technical bits:

  • PV supply is from one or more series-connected solar panels
  • 200-240V 50/60Hz Mains AC Supply to supplement no / low light and evenings.
  • Works on a standard AC thermostat and resistive element
  • No battery or inverter needed
  • Automatic maximisation of PV power using inbuilt Maximum Power Point Tracker (MPPT)
  • Automatic switching between AC and PV DC sources depending on solar level
  • LED indicators for fault indication and PV supply indication
  • Easy mounting through pre-drilled bracket
  • Continual monitoring of system integrity with fail-safe operation
  • Rugged steel housing
  • PV DC supply short-circuit protection against element load failure
  • Protection against PV panel reverse-polarity
  • Zero configuration installation

 

OUR CORE TEAM:

story:
Summary

ChargeSurfing aims to solve the lack of charging locations at a reasonable price for the growing electric vehicle market. The goal is to enable you as end user to manage all electric vehicle charging operations with our app.

You can also become a HOST and start earning money if you have an adequate location to install a charger and share it.

ChargeSurfing is a fully integrated Electric Vehicle Charging Platform both backend (OCPP/MQTT) and front end (Android /iOS app). Check out the videos above with app live working examples.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need funding to continue App and Platform development. Also for accounting, design and marketing.
  • We need to invest in fast charging hardware and be able to install it in suitable locations.
  • You get a worldwide Electric Vehicle Charging Network complementary to other networks.
  • You can be a Host, install a charger, connect it to ChargeSurfing and earn money every time someone charges their vehicle.

The Impact

  • Our project can have a huge impact on the fight against climate crisis.
  • We provide the chance for you to become a ChargeSurfing HOST and start earning with your location and at the same time help save the environment by turning away from fossil fuels.
  • Nowadays there's no doubt that electric vehicles will be mainstream, every automobile brand has at least one model, almost every day we see one more EV model coming. You will be in the forefront providing charging and using our network.
  • We have already working locations and the app is available at the iOS and Android stores, search for ChargeSurfing.

Risks & Challenges

  • If we don't collect enough money to grow our project. That's why we need you!
  • Electric mobility is a no turning back movement. No risk here.
  • Count with an extremely resilient team with several years of experience in IT and electric mobility.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Besides contributing you can always share this project with your friends.

We are the next Airbnb or Uber for EV Chargers. This is the future! Help us building it!

story:
I have been interested in, and have studied fusion energy, for about 40 years.

I believe…

Fusion energy is our best hope for a clean energy future.

For many years, I have been working on a breakthrough for creating a new type of commercial fusion energy power plant. First, I developed a breakthrough in physics that explained why previous fusion power plant designs failed, and what was needed to make them work. Then, I engineered & patented a new method for achieving fusion energy.

For years, I have worked on my own. It has taken me a lot of time, and a lot of money. Now — to reach the next stage — I need help from other people.

Over the course of this year, I will be spending most of my time, building my team, and pitching investors for funding. I will need to obtain millions of dollars of funding. That is not the goal of this crowdfunding campaign.

The goals of this campaign are:

  • to get help getting my story out,
  • to get help paying for miscellaneous personal expenses,
  • and to find backers that might be interested in a future equity crowdfunding campaign.

If I can get my company going this year, I believe, I can build the first, working fusion power plant in less than 5 years.

My story is too long for this short intro. If you are interested in knowing more about: my story, my physics, my fusion power plant designs, or my goals, then please see my Youtube channel. I have made, a long 6-part science movie, and a short biography movie that might interest you.
