story:
French explication: http://ecosource-canada.ca/campagne-sociaux-fin...

French video: https://youtu.be/JwDShFdSmUM

Exceptional concept and performance!

The Valv'econ’eau Kit is the intelligent shower system, it's you who have control ... The designer had the idea by taking an outdoor shower, having bought in a gardening department an article to water the plant in height, a simple hand shower and a manual pressure valve at the other end. Out of curiosity he wanted to check the amount of water used, the result was surprising ... Eureka!  a great way to save water ... He worked on adapting this concept to the indoor shower. Safe, very powerful, here is finally a unique concept.

Its purpose is to reduce the waste of our drinking water in institutional, residential, recreational, commercial and industrial environments during our body treatments.

Environmental issues

This product is eco-responsible; it reduces the impacts associated with the following environmental issues:

  • Climatic changes
  • Availability and quality of water
  • Resource depletion

Benefits for the environment: artesian wells, septic tanks, filtration and wastewater treatment plants, not to mention the hydro bills of consumers. Useful for saving for people with a water meter.

Where do we need Valv'econ'eau?

  • Residence, mini-house
  • Place using an artesian well: secondary house, cottage, camp ...
  • Recreational vehicle (RV): motorized, caravan, fithwheel.
  • Hotel, motel
  • Seniors residence
  • Hospital Center
  • Home care
  • Hair salon, beauty salon, spa
  • pet grooming salon
  • Camp site

In fact, everywhere we want to protect our water!

At a low price, return on investment in just a few weeks. The Valv'econ’eau Kit is simple, easy to install, operation reflected, aesthetic, and this safely.

A beautiful partnership to promote Valv'econ'eau Kit

Ecosource Canada, your distributor of confort in eco energy & solution since 2011,  is partnering with Concept Innovation MP Ltd., a company of Michel Pelletier, designer, to promote the Valv'econ'eau Kit. When Mr. Pelletier introduced us to Valv'econ'eau Kit, we were excited about this invention. Ecosource Canada is very committed to the environment with over 500 family eco energy product line and turnkey solution with ''all service under one roof', we trust the Valv'econ'eau Kit will plays an important role on the water saving for generation's. Water is a natural resource and we must save & care and Valv'econ'eau will do for best.

How does a social campaign financing

You make a donation and we give you an advantage (gift). Your contribution will be used to market if we achieve our goal, otherwise it will be given to you. As for our campaign, you will receive the Valv’econ’eau Kit set (value of $ 75 + taxes) for only $ 60 taxes included, not to mention the savings made.

What does the Valv'econ'eau Kit look like?

The Valv'econ'eau Kit system is easy to install aim after the pipe without plumbers. it is only necessary to screw the pipe, the valve and the shower head; it is as simple as that. Then put the shower head, press to release energy from the water on your body and relax to soap you. This experience is pleasant because when you re-open the water is at the right temperature.

​Is it easy to uninstall if I move?

Moving your valve to a different bathroom is as easy as installing it. Overall, it takes 5 minutes or less and will not damage the walls of the shower, which is ideal for both homeowners and renters. All you need to do is unscrew the valve.

Do you offer different finishes?

The Valv’econ’eau Kit is only available in one finish.

The system Valv'econ’eau Kit

A revolutionary technology of water saving. 3 x less water without pressure drop. A nice gesture for the planet!

  • No need a professional to install this concept.
  • Always keep the same pressure.
  • Always keep the same temperature adjusted at the start.

The Valv'econ’eau Kit is Quebec products. It saves on electricity costs to heat the water, consumption charges, if any. You fill less quickly your septic tank. Hot water accounts for 20% of your electricity bill according to the Canadian Center for Data and Analysis of Final Energy Consumption in the Building Sector

Main uses of hot water by households *

  • 34% - Use of faucets (with aerator down by about 40%)
  • 25% - Showers (75% drop with Valv'econeau Kit)
  • 17% - Baths
  • 15% - Washing clothes
  • 4% - Dishwashing
  •  5% - Leaks

Here is more information about Valv'econ'eau Kit:

According to the analysis page on the Hydro-Québec 2017 website:

Comparable consumption: water and energy (body care (shower) --family of 3 people).

1- Standard shower, consumption of 11 liters / minute so 120 liters / shower of 8 minutes. Annual water costs: $ 416 and use of 65,700 cubic meters per year.

2- Reduced jet knob, consumption of 7.625 liters / minute, therefore 61 liters / shower of 8 minutes. Annual water costs: $ 208 and use of 33,397.5 cubic meters per year.

3- Valv’econ’eau Kit with our valve, consumption of 3.7 liters / minute therefore 30 liters / shower of 8 minutes. Annual water costs: $ 98.55 and use of 16.425 cubic meters per year.

To validate Valv'econ’eau Kit, we transformed a bathroom into a test room (laboratory). The tests were done for 156 hours to make no mistake, always repeating the same technique.

This has shown regularity in drinking water consumption.

1- The valve was installed after a shower.

2- We blocked the bath drain

3- Several people (participants) took a shower; the length of time used for body care varies from 6 to 12 minutes. 8 minutes is the average time.

4- After determining the time allotted for the tests, we have marked the level of water accumulated after each shower.

5- We have calibrated in liter a container.

6- We emptied the bath. Obstructed a second time the bath. Fold liter by liter with the calibrated container up to the registered marks.

7- The results showed between 18 liters to 22 liters each time.

Considering the time diversity that users could use, we prefer to grant an average of 30 liters / shower of 8 minutes and this even if our tests give a lesser result.

On June 21, 2016, we received the Intertek test report in Lachine # 102558569MTL-005, project # G102558569 Requirement of the standard: ASME A112.18.1-2012 / CSA B125.1-12 Plumbing supply fittings.

The prototype has passed the following tests:

  • 5.3.2 Burst pressure
  • 5.6 Endurance test

The Fournier Patent Agency in ville Laprairie has been mandated by Michel Pelletier the designer of the valve for International Patent # PCT / CA2012 / 000722, US # 14 / 236,617 and Canada pending CIPO

We need $ 125,000 to cover the following fees:

Mold, trade mark (CA & US), valve & ptototype design (phase1), homologation (phase 1 and phase 2), internet store, advertising, video (phase 1 and phase 2), translation, manufacturing Valv 'Econ’eau Kit, employee for sending, shower kit (Valv’econeau, WaterSense® shower head,  2 hoses, support), packaging, publicity.

Make a difference!

Help us get to know Valv'econ’eau Kit, advertise around our project, share using Indiegogo tools, talk about it!  Water is a natural resource to protect ...

Ecosource Canada and MP Innovation Concept would like to thank you warmly for your interest, encouragement and help in promoting the Valv’econ’eau Kit.

My water is precious, I save it!

Shipping details

Manufacturing and shipping directly from Boisbriand, your Valv'econ'eau Kit shower system will be shipped in the month of August 2018. It will come with a set of custom accessories to allow effortless self-installation.

Refund & Return Policy

Every Valv’econ’eau Kit Shower System is backed by a 1-year warranty covering all manufacturing defects from the time you receive your order. Additionally, we offer a 15-day money back guarantee (excluding shipping). If you are not satisfied for any reason, please email our support team. It will come with a set of custom accessories to allow effortless self-installation.

To receive a refund, orders must be returned within 15 days from the date of delivery and in the original packaging, with all included components and original hardware. The product must not show signs of damage before or after shipment as determined by our sole discretion.  http://www.ecosource-canada.ca

story:
Short Summary

Why is the Gravity Drive Pod different?

This technology does not violate the laws of conservation of energy or thermodynamics. The Gravity Drive Pod is backed by our provisional patent and computational physics modeling.

 

The Gravity Drive Pod is composed of two independent systems that leverage the torque generated from a falling mass. The first system is comprised of a series of falling masses working against the counter-torque of a generator that acts as a load to generate constant power. The key design solution within the second system lies in utilizing the time domain through the optimization of the mechanical components. As a result, the second system only uses a portion of the generated power to return the masses to their resting position so that they can be dropped again.

“Based on the calculation performed using Newton’s Law’s for Rotational Motion, the power generated by a series of blocks dropping is greater than the power required to retract the blocks, thus the system outputs more power than it consumes.”              Evocativo Engineering, Boulder Colorado

Clean, safe and affordable energy is now within our reach!

 

What We Need & What You Get

One Million Dollars will enable us to build a Prototype of the Gravity Drive Pod and allow us to move forward with plans for High-Volume Production and Licensing. Any level of donation is greatly appreciated in helping us to achieve this goal.

 

    The Impact

    The Gravity Drive Pod represents a game-changing technology with the real potential to benefit humanity and the environment globally.

    This technology will change the way power is supplied to our homes and businesses because you become the power grid with the Gravity Drive.                                                                   

    • Water can be desalinated and transported wherever needed.
    • A Pod network would eliminate the need for battery storage.
    • The Pod is resilient to solar flares and natural disasters.
    • Reliable solution to power remote data centers and cell towers.
    • Electric car charging stations could be placed almost anywhere.
    • High speed rail would become far more affordable and efficient.

    • True hope for the third world who would then have this critical independent resource.

    Energy Comparison Matrix

       

      Risks & Challenges

      We anticipate that the Gravity Drive Pod  technology and associated products may face state, federal and international regulatory resistance because of the independent nature of this technology.

      However, we believe that these potential challenges may be overcome due to the soundness of this technology and an increasing public demand for these solutions.

       

      Perks

      GDI Logo Mug

      A Mug with Gravity Drive Inc Logo and on the back "Driving Global Power."

       

      GDI T-Shirt

      GDI T-Shirt with front and back logo

       

       

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Word Of Mouth!

        Please let your family and friends know of your personal excitement, financial support and involvement in this project as well as how they can become a part of our success story.

        To become more informed and to be better able to share this amazing technology, please visit: www.gravitydriveinc.com.

The Impact
The Gravity Drive Pod represents a game-changing technology with the real potential to benefit humanity and the environment globally.
This technology will change the way power is supplied to our homes and businesses because you become the power grid with the Gravity Drive.                                                                   

Water can be desalinated and transported wherever needed.
A Pod network would eliminate the need for battery storage.
The Pod is resilient to solar flares and natural disasters.
Reliable solution to power remote data centers and cell towers.
Electric car charging stations could be placed almost anywhere.
High speed rail would become far more affordable and efficient.
True hope for the third world who would then have this critical independent resource.

Energy Comparison Matrix



 
Risks & Challenges
We anticipate that the Gravity Drive Pod  technology and associated products may face state, federal and international regulatory resistance because of the independent nature of this technology.
However, we believe that these potential challenges may be overcome due to the soundness of this technology and an increasing public demand for these solutions.
 
Perks
GDI Logo Mug
A Mug with Gravity Drive Inc Logo and on the back "Driving Global Power."

 
GDI T-Shirt
GDI T-Shirt with front and back logo

 
 


Other Ways You Can Help
Word Of Mouth!
Please let your family and friends know of your personal excitement, financial support and involvement in this project as well as how they can become a part of our success story.
To become more informed and to be better able to share this amazing technology, please visit: www.gravitydriveinc.com.

story:
NEW: Have a chance to win fantastic perks with as little as ONE DOLLAR when certain campaign milestones have been reached. Read more about our perk update under "Our Perks" further below.

This Technology Will Revolutionize the Way High-Performance Buildings Are Insulated!

The good ol' Swiss have it all! Chocolate, cheese, Swiss army knives, watches, gorgeous mountains and lakes, an excellent public transportation system and SAF - the Solar Activated Facade, an amazing, green, exterior wall paneling system that uses the power of the sun to keep buildings warm in the winter. BUT IT DOES NOT EXIST IN AMERICA!

Combat climate change with less resources by using the sun

(Note to investors: Please inquire directly for our business plan.)

 

The Skinny

Conventional high-performance walls typically include thick layers of insulation. However, the majority of them are not free of concerns 1) making walls overly thick, applying high-performance materials that 2) significantly burden the environment, 3) increase the carbon footprint and 4) impose health risks on humans, and 5) depending on the choice of building skin can significantly increase maintenance, repair and replacement costs.

SAF is a unique, eco-friendly, one of a kind, exterior wall paneling system made of wood and glass that harnesses the sun's energy in passive solar heat gain, as windows do, thereby giving the building a thermal blanket that can last many hours into the night.

LEAN & GREEN through passive solar heat gain

Through this process a wall requires much less insulation to become high-performing, making walls much thinner to the point where it can save a lot of valuable resources, significantly reduce or even eliminate harmful insulation materials to human health or the environment. Furthermore, the glass cover provides a durable, low maintenance building skin that at the same time protects and maintains the natural beauty of the wood behind it, giving SAF an amazing eco-modern architectural appeal.

SAF can save up to 90% in heating and cooling energy and up to 85% in the wall's carbon footprint.

It gets even better! SAF can be equipped with photovoltaic (solar) cells to generate valuable renewable energy thereby making SAF a passive AND active solar system.

It is our mission to help America toward a carbon-free and energy self-sufficient building environment. Getting our foot in the door is our biggest challenge for which we need your help, because, and unfortunately, it takes a lot of resources and time to go out there, find and convince the first American adopters to trust in the sun that it will do the job and save on the energy bill as well as the environment.

Nearly half of America's CO2 emissions are caused by buildings

This campaign will enable us to build a demonstration site in at least one location (Boston or Vancouver area), in order to showcase SAF to North America reaching an important milestone in our business development that typically is poorly funded by professional investors. Once built it will greatly improve our future capital raising abilities as well as generate sales.

 

Does it Really Work?

Yes it does! SAF has been tested and already been implemented in and around Switzerland many times, of which many have been Minergie® certified and several have received sustainability and design awards. It is a high-quality system that has passed all of the tests and standards in Switzerland.

 

Give "Passive-Solar" a Chance to Break into the Market

We need $250,000 to be able to reach important milestones that are essential for the survival of this business venture within the next 6 to 9 months. These milestones are:

  1. Build a prototype with local manufacturers to set up logistics, establish quality standards and determine accurate system cost.
  2. Build a demonstration site to showcase the technology in order to attract clients, architects and investors. Several demonstration site opportunities already exist.
  3. Build a professional team for marketing, sales and support as well as business development and project management.

 

 

What If We Don't Reach Our Target?

Our ability to operate at full capacity and our financial runway will be significantly diminished eventually jeopardizing our venture to bring SAF to America. More time would have to be spent on raising more capital thereby slowing progress even more. Nevertheless, I, Eric Nelson (founder) will continue to fight, bootstrap, work night time jobs and eat Ramen noodles until we get a demonstration site up.

I believe in the big potential of SAF

If we should go over our target, don't stop donating! A demonstration site will not make the company automatically profitable, but it will certainly get us a lot closer. Future investment round(s) are therefore likely and may involve equity. Let us know if you are interested.

Update Oct. 2nd, 2018:
Our campaign is soon coming to an end, quite a bit short of our target. The money raised will go toward expenses incurred toward pursuing different fundraising opportunities and other administrative cost to keep the company going. A big thank you toward our supporters so far.

Our Perks

It is difficult for us to give you a piece of a SAF wall panel for your support. So, we figured we wanted to offer you something else, but not the standard key chain, mug, t-shirt or hat. Instead we want to offer you something special that is representative of our system, our business culture or our vision, but also something that is personal to show you who we are and how dedicated we are to this venture.

Our thank you gifts are useful and personal

Since some of our perks are very personal, meaning you will temporarily become part of our personal lives, we ask for patience and understanding in scheduling and making good on our promises. If for some reason we are unable to fulfill a perk, we promise to do our best to find an alternative solution.

We have perks for small personal donations as well as larger personal or corporate donations. Check them out!

We have just sweetened the deal!

Perk Update Sept. 12th, 2018:
Have a chance to win a perk when we have reached the following campaign targets:

5,000 $     - Choice of any single "Swiss Army Knife" perk
10,000 $   - The "Swiss Army Knife Assortment" perk
50,000 $   - The "Weekend Escape to Florida" perk
100,000 $ - The "Escape to Florida" perk
150,000 $ - Return transatlantic flight for ONE person between major airports of mainland US/Canada and Switzerland/Europe.
200,000 $ - In addition to the prior transantlantic flight prize. An AirBNB style "Room in Central Switzerland" for up to a week and "A Cheese Fondue Made by a Swiss". (For flights to Switzerland only.)
250,000 $ - Return transatlantic flight for TWO persons between major airports of mainland US/Canada and Switzerland/Europe. Including an AirBNB style "Room in Central Switzerland" for up to a week and "A Cheese Fondue Made by a Swiss". (For flights to Switzerland only.)

The prizes of every milestone reached will be raffled off at the end of the campaign (approx. November 2018).

Note: Each dollar donated counts as a single lot, e.g. you get the Spartan, you have a 100 lots, thus 100 times bigger chance to win the big one. Only one single lot, not the dollar amount, is given to the following purchases: All "Sponsors", "Partners" and "First Adopters".

Your Impact

The latest Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) has detailed how close we are to a turning point in the earth's climate system, thus emphasizing the necessity for immediate and sustained action on climate change to preserve livable conditions on earth.

We want to act for you and with you now. With your donation, no matter how small or how big, we will go out and fight carbon emissions in buildings with our amazing, eco-friendly, passive-solar system SAF.

SAF saves energy, resources, carbon emissions - the planet

We strive for the  2,000 Watt Society, a vision for an economically, socially and environmentally sustainable future.

 

We Have Created a Buzz

We have worked hard in building a network of interested clients, architects, builders and have also drawn the attention of universities and the media, but we have to prove first that we can deliver and that is why we need to build this demonstration site with your help.

Many second-adopters, but who will be the first?

We are currently engaged in several project opportunities with different timescales. This campaign will determine how actionable these opportunities will become for us.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

First, donate! No matter how little or how much, donate now, donate fast and help give this campaign a large fan base and momentum. 

If you really can't donate a small amount, help us by sharing our campaign with others and urge them with a little personal introduction to our campaign to donate. Share this campaign in your social media and tell your friends who care. Share with emphasis!

Many reasons you can emphasize. Here are my favorites ;)

- Don't let the Swiss get away with this. America absolutely needs this!
- Passive solar? Cool! You definitely have to give it a chance!
- Aren't you about to build a house? Build with SAF!
- If SAF is anywhere nearly as good as their chocolate than I will have two.

Win a prize for the most donations raised through your referrals

The top ten people that manage to raise the most donations (outside of their own) through their referrals will receive a free Swiss Army Knife of choice. In order for us to rate your efforts you need to send us some kind of plausible proof (screen shot?) that those funds were raised through your referral. We will announce the winners on our website at the end of the campaign.

 

It is Personal

I am Eric Nelson, founder and CEO of SAF Systems, a Swiss-American dual citizen, sustainable architect, building energy consultant, marine scientist, father of 3.5-year old twin boys, and former employee of Giuseppe Fent, the architect who invented SAF in Switzerland, where it is known as "Lucido".

I love nature, I love people, I love my work, I love my family, and I love my twin boys more than anything else in this world. They give me a purpose for all the sacrifices I make. I am driven by a vision to make this world a better place, a vision I want to share with as many people as possible. Please share my vision and bring us one step closer to reaching our goal.

 

My family and I and the whole team thank you from the bottom of our hearts!

THANK YOU!

 

Legal note: SAF Systems owns the exclusive rights and IP to market, manufacture and sell this Swiss invention SAF in North America. It has no legal or financial affiliations with the original inventor's company in Switzerland.

story:
Who Are We, And What Is The Solar Co-Op?

First, a little about us.  We are an independent, renewable energy company, exclusively producing solar energy.  We develop, own, and operate utility scale solar facilities (solar farms - you know, those big facilities with thousands of solar panels).  In other words, we are solar farmers.  Now when we select a location for one of our projects, we don’t choose a place that only gets a few hours of sunlight each day, or where there’s lots of shade, or where it’s cloudy or raining all the time.

Because that would be dumb.

We choose a location that gets lots and lots of sunlight, all year round, because more sunlight means more electricity.  And that’s what makes a solar farm practical and profitable.  And this is great for people who are able to build solar farms, but it's not so great for everyone else.  And let’s be honest, not very many people are able to build a solar farm.

But what if they could?  What if the average person could build their own solar farm and could benefit directly from the electricity that it generates?

This is what the Solar Co-Op is all about - making it possible for normal people all over the world to become solar farmers.  We think it’s a pretty incredible idea, and we think the world will agree with us.

 

What's The Plan?

Okay, so here’s the deal: we're building the PORCUPINE CARIBOU SOLAR ARRAY (a 2.5MW utility scale solar facility).  We're building it regardless of whether or not anyone contributes to this campaign.

Now, our plan was that if even one person - one single, solitary person, living anywhere in the world, was willing to put up just one dollar because they believed the Solar Co-Op is a good idea, then the PORCUPINE CARIBOU SOLAR ARRAY would be a Solar Co-Op, owned in part by ordinary, everyday people from all over the world.

That was the plan.  But before we could even launch this campaign, people from all over the world had already joined the Solar Co-Op!

 

How Does The Solar Co-Op Work?

 

The solar co-op will allow hundreds, even thousands of individuals to become solar farmers.  Their individual solar farms (some tiny, some large) will be tied together to create the co-op.  It's the same principle as a traditional agricultural co-op where you have a lot of small, family farms that cooperate (thus the term "co-op") so that they can compete in a huge market.  By working together, the little guys can compete with the big guys.

We've taken this agricultural co-op model, successful since the 17th century, and applied it to the modern energy industry.  The solar farming co-op makes solar power accessible to everyone, everywhere so that today, quite literally, anyone can be a solar farmer.  And since we want to solar co-op to be accessible to everyone, we've scaled down the size of the solar farm.  No longer is it necessary to have thousands of solar panels to be a solar farmer.  In fact, with the solar co-op, you don't even need one panel.  Made up of just 3 solar cells, our Nano Farm is the world's smallest solar farm!  For about the price of a large pizza, you can be the proud owner of a solar farm, and that farm will reduce coal consumption and eliminate CO2 emissions every single year. 

The world, and especially young people all over the world are screaming at the top of their lungs for someone, somewhere to do something about the climate crisis.  We at PeakSunNRG sincerely hope that world leaders will listen and act, but...

 

The verdict is in.  The science is indisputable.  Climate Change is real, and within 30 years, if left unchecked, it will destroy our world.

 

 

Check this out: In the past, unless you had thousands of dollars, you couldn't really do much in the way of solar.  But now, if you've got even one extra dollar lying around, you have the power to meaningfully impact climate change.  Really, a dollar - check your couch cushions and that junk drawer in your kitchen for some spare change.  That one-time, one-dollar investment will have an impact on our environment for decades to come!

In the meantime, make your voice heard.  Share this project with your friends and family, and anyone else who will listen.  Use your social media network to let people know that the solar co-op is a thing; that they can actually do something about climate change.

 

"RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE" was a call to arms of the French Resistance fighters during World War II. Their's was a fight for the very existence of their nation and their way of life. 

Today, the climate crisis is an insidious enemy, destroying the world as we know it and threatening the existence of not just one nation, but of the entire human race. A renewable energy resistance against fossil fuels and carbon emissions is all that can preserve our existence, so stand up and fight!

 

For the price of a Venti, Caramel Macchiato, you can JOIN THE RESISTANCE. You'll be reducing coal consumption by about 5 pounds, and CO2 emissions by about 15 pounds, every single year. Resistance doesn't get much easier than that. Plus, your local coffee shop isn't gonna give you a super cool RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE sticker!

 

 

The real beauty of the solar co-op is that your solar farm can be as small as three solar cells! We're talking about a teeny, tiny, itty, bitty, little solar farm here, and that's exactly the point. The solar co-op revolutionizes the solar industry because now, just about anyone, anywhere can be a solar farmer. Not only that, but we do all the heavy lifting!  PeakSunNRG handles all the maintenance and repair and replacements of components.  We tie all the individual solar farms together, and we handle all the administrative tasks associated with a commercial solar facility.  

Plus, at all "solar farmer" levels, we'll send you, not only the RESISTANCE sticker, but one of these cool SOLAR CO-OP, I AM A SOLAR FARMER stickers too.  Display it prominently!  Let people know that you are a solar farmer.

All you need to do is choose what size solar farm you'd like to own.

 

The NANO FARM is the world's smallest solar farm.  But that doesn't mean it's not important in the war on climate change.  In fact, for a one-time, 15 dollar investment, this little solar farm will keep 12.5 pounds of coal in the ground this year, next year, the year after that, and the year after that, and... well, you get the point.  And because we won't be burning that coal, global output of CO2 will be reduced by about 38 pounds every year! 

 

This is pretty simple math here.  The NANO FARM 2X is 2 times the size of the NANO FARM. That means it'll have twice the impact on our climate!

Now, at the MICRO FARM level and above, you can get one of our incredibly stylish t-shirts to let people know you've taken a stand for the climate. Best of all, you don't have to say a word. These shirts will do all the talking.

 

 

The MICRO FARM is still pretty small, but think about this: Every year, this little solar farm is reducing carbon emissions by 150 pounds.  You might not even weigh 150 pounds.  Your farm will be removing your weight in CO2 every, single year!

 

 

At this level you get to customize the small, metal plaque attached to this solar panel.  Put anything you want on it, your name, your kid's names, the name of your significant other, or your farm, anything you like.  Get creative. The MINI FARM reduces coal consumption by around 100 pounds a year, and carbon emissions by about 300 pounds every, single year! 300 POUNDS! 136 KILOS! That's a lot of CO2. Having a tough time picturing what that much CO2 looks like? Check this out.

 

 

A single TINY FARM will eliminate the need for 300 pounds (136 kg) of coal every year.  That coal will stay in the ground, and that means global output of CO2 will also be reduced by about 900 pounds (410 kg) every year.  by 2030, your TINY FARM will be responsible for the elimination of nearly 10,000 pounds (4,500 kg) of CO2. That's an enormous impact from such a tiny farm.

 

 

And don't forget Indigogo's share tools!  They're right there, up at the top of the page.  You may have to scroll for a bit, but it's totally worth it.

 

Risks & Challenges

We wanted to talk for a moment about the risks and challenges that we face in making the world's first, true solar co-op a reality.  Here's the thing, though: there aren't really any.

As we mentioned already, the PORCUPINE CARIBOU SOLAR ARRAY is going to be built regardless of whether or not we get any funding here.  The only question is, "Will this solar facility be a solar co-op?"  That's why we were only asking for a dollar.  We're building this solar farm and we wanted to see if anyone wanted to be a part of it.

It's kinda like if we were in the kitchen and said, "Hey, we're making coffee.  If anybody wants some, it's in the pot."  If you want some coffee, great!  It's in the pot.  If you don't want coffee, that's okay too.  It's still in the pot.

And now, since we had people from all over the world step up and join the Solar Co-Op before we could even launch this campaign, we're already doing it!  So, if you think the solar co-op is a pretty fantastic idea, tell people about it!  If you want to be a solar farmer, reduce fossil fuel consumption, lower carbon emissions, and save some money on your electric bill, this is your chance.

That was the plan.  But before we could even launch this campaign, people from all over the world had already joined the Solar Co-Op!


 

How Does The Solar Co-Op Work?



 
The solar co-op will allow hundreds, even thousands of individuals to become solar farmers.  Their individual solar farms (some tiny, some large) will be tied together to create the co-op.  It's the same principle as a traditional agricultural co-op where you have a lot of small, family farms that cooperate (thus the term "co-op") so that they can compete in a huge market.  By working together, the little guys can compete with the big guys.
We've taken this agricultural co-op model, successful since the 17th century, and applied it to the modern energy industry.  The solar farming co-op makes solar power accessible to everyone, everywhere so that today, quite literally, anyone can be a solar farmer.  And since we want to solar co-op to be accessible to everyone, we've scaled down the size of the solar farm.  No longer is it necessary to have thousands of solar panels to be a solar farmer.  In fact, with the solar co-op, you don't even need one panel.  Made up of just 3 solar cells, our Nano Farm is the world's smallest solar farm!  For about the price of a large pizza, you can be the proud owner of a solar farm, and that farm will reduce coal consumption and eliminate CO2 emissions every single year. 
The world, and especially young people all over the world are screaming at the top of their lungs for someone, somewhere to do something about the climate crisis.  We at PeakSunNRG sincerely hope that world leaders will listen and act, but...

 
The verdict is in.  The science is indisputable.  Climate Change is real, and within 30 years, if left unchecked, it will destroy our world.
 

 
Check this out: In the past, unless you had thousands of dollars, you couldn't really do much in the way of solar.  But now, if you've got even one extra dollar lying around, you have the power to meaningfully impact climate change.  Really, a dollar - check your couch cushions and that junk drawer in your kitchen for some spare change.  That one-time, one-dollar investment will have an impact on our environment for decades to come!
In the meantime, make your voice heard.  Share this project with your friends and family, and anyone else who will listen.  Use your social media network to let people know that the solar co-op is a thing; that they can actually do something about climate change.
 

"RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE" was a call to arms of the French Resistance fighters during World War II. Their's was a fight for the very existence of their nation and their way of life. 
Today, the climate crisis is an insidious enemy, destroying the world as we know it and threatening the existence of not just one nation, but of the entire human race. A renewable energy resistance against fossil fuels and carbon emissions is all that can preserve our existence, so stand up and fight!
 


For the price of a Venti, Caramel Macchiato, you can JOIN THE RESISTANCE. You'll be reducing coal consumption by about 5 pounds, and CO2 emissions by about 15 pounds, every single year. Resistance doesn't get much easier than that. Plus, your local coffee shop isn't gonna give you a super cool RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE sticker!
 


 
The real beauty of the solar co-op is that your solar farm can be as small as three solar cells! We're talking about a teeny, tiny, itty, bitty, little solar farm here, and that's exactly the point. The solar co-op revolutionizes the solar industry because now, just about anyone, anywhere can be a solar farmer. Not only that, but we do all the heavy lifting!  PeakSunNRG handles all the maintenance and repair and replacements of components.  We tie all the individual solar farms together, and we handle all the administrative tasks associated with a commercial solar facility.  
Plus, at all "solar farmer" levels, we'll send you, not only the RESISTANCE sticker, but one of these cool SOLAR CO-OP, I AM A SOLAR FARMER stickers too.  Display it prominently!  Let people know that you are a solar farmer.
All you need to do is choose what size solar farm you'd like to own.
 

The NANO FARM is the world's smallest solar farm.  But that doesn't mean it's not important in the war on climate change.  In fact, for a one-time, 15 dollar investment, this little solar farm will keep 12.5 pounds of coal in the ground this year, next year, the year after that, and the year after that, and... well, you get the point.  And because we won't be burning that coal, global output of CO2 will be reduced by about 38 pounds every year! 
 

This is pretty simple math here.  The NANO FARM 2X is 2 times the size of the NANO FARM. That means it'll have twice the impact on our climate!
Now, at the MICRO FARM level and above, you can get one of our incredibly stylish t-shirts to let people know you've taken a stand for the climate. Best of all, you don't have to say a word. These shirts will do all the talking.
 

 

The MICRO FARM is still pretty small, but think about this: Every year, this little solar farm is reducing carbon emissions by 150 pounds.  You might not even weigh 150 pounds.  Your farm will be removing your weight in CO2 every, single year!
 

 

At this level you get to customize the small, metal plaque attached to this solar panel.  Put anything you want on it, your name, your kid's names, the name of your significant other, or your farm, anything you like.  Get creative. The MINI FARM reduces coal consumption by around 100 pounds a year, and carbon emissions by about 300 pounds every, single year! 300 POUNDS! 136 KILOS! That's a lot of CO2. Having a tough time picturing what that much CO2 looks like? Check this out.
 

 

A single TINY FARM will eliminate the need for 300 pounds (136 kg) of coal every year.  That coal will stay in the ground, and that means global output of CO2 will also be reduced by about 900 pounds (410 kg) every year.  by 2030, your TINY FARM will be responsible for the elimination of nearly 10,000 pounds (4,500 kg) of CO2. That's an enormous impact from such a tiny farm.
 

 

And don't forget Indigogo's share tools!  They're right there, up at the top of the page.  You may have to scroll for a bit, but it's totally worth it.
 

Risks & Challenges
We wanted to talk for a moment about the risks and challenges that we face in making the world's first, true solar co-op a reality.  Here's the thing, though: there aren't really any.
As we mentioned already, the PORCUPINE CARIBOU SOLAR ARRAY is going to be built regardless of whether or not we get any funding here.  The only question is, "Will this solar facility be a solar co-op?"  That's why we were only asking for a dollar.  We're building this solar farm and we wanted to see if anyone wanted to be a part of it.
It's kinda like if we were in the kitchen and said, "Hey, we're making coffee.  If anybody wants some, it's in the pot."  If you want some coffee, great!  It's in the pot.  If you don't want coffee, that's okay too.  It's still in the pot.
And now, since we had people from all over the world step up and join the Solar Co-Op before we could even launch this campaign, we're already doing it!  So, if you think the solar co-op is a pretty fantastic idea, tell people about it!  If you want to be a solar farmer, reduce fossil fuel consumption, lower carbon emissions, and save some money on your electric bill, this is your chance.

story:
We are in the midst of a sea change with regards to the safety, availability and sustainability of our entire food system. Wake up alarms are blaring in every food category and the populace is starting to connect the dots between profits-over-people business practices, non-sustainable food production methods, environmental degradation and human/animal health declines. 90% of the food consumed in Hawai’i is imported, even though we enjoy year-round growing. Consumers are flocking to organic and locally sourced food from farmers they know and trust.

Aquaponics is a very efficient way to raise both protein and produce in a clean, sustainable manner. Kulahaven Farms, LLC, is Hawai’i’s first commercial Rainbow trout hatchery and recirculating trout aquaponics farm. We specialize in both trout and organic watercress, neither of which has any other commercial source in Hawai’i.

Early adopters (local restaurants and produce retailers) are eager to provide their customers with organically certified watercress and Rainbow trout raised on organic, (certified) glyphosate-free feed. Kulahaven Farms is on track to satisfy the market as we scale up for commercial production on the slopes of Haleakala.

The inspiration for a Rainbow trout aquaponics farm began 5 years ago while Kulahaven founder, John Dobovan, was working on his Waimanalo, Oahu aquaponics operation, Nalolicious. He moved to Maui 3 years ago and leased space in Keokea, Maui to create a proof-of-concept trout hatchery and cold-water aquaponic system.

Aquaponics is an extremely efficient, high-yield approach to farming but it requires a lot of capital during the development phase. Scaling his unique system from a successful prototype has required significant resources, along with the vision and support of many in Hawai’i’s agriculture community. The entire system layout has been designed to match terrain at an elevation (3500’) that will reduce the energy costs of keeping tank water between 55-65 degrees.

Most of the infrastructure is in place and we need just $30,000 to bridge the gap to sustainable cashflow. This is an opportunity for health-conscious consumers to be among the first to enjoy our delicious and highly nutritious Rainbow trout and watercress. Money will be used to purchase the materials required to build 7 watercress grow beds, 72 feet long by 4 feet wide. Our stretch goal of $60,000 provides a cushion for the potential of economic instability due to political turmoil in the US.

When in full operation, Kulahaven Farms aquaponics system will generate 2000 lbs of pristine and delicious Rainbow trout per month plus 4000 lbs. of organic watercress for the good people of Maui and beyond.

Kulahaven Team

Founder John Dobovan co-founded a successful aquaponic startup on Oahu in 2012. His unique system design is based on lessons gained there as well as the research and experimentation he has done on Maui for the past 3 years with a prototype trout hatchery and aquaponic system. John has a degree in Sustainable Tropical Crop Management and is a mentor with the Farm Apprentice Mentorship (FAM) program of the Hawai’i Farmers Union United (HFUU). He is joined by 2 interns; Clay Lerback and Max Powell, both 23. Clay was born on Maui and brings a wealth of construction skills and craftsmanship to the farm. He is currently enrolled in the Agriculture program at University of Hawaii Maui College. Max was born in Italy and has been a successful music producer/composer and professional snowboarder. He brings unbounded enthusiasm and energy to the company and is one of the 16 interns in the HFUU FAM program. Both have been involved in all phases of the project for the past 7 months.

What We Need

A $150,000 loan from the Hawai’i Dept. of Agriculture (HDOA) and $10,000 Kiva Zip loan have supported the buildout of the primary infrastructure. We now need an additional $30,000 to build 7 watercress grow beds (288 square feet each) and are seeking an additional $30,000 in operation reserves (stretch goal).

What You Get

We can’t wait for you to experience our delicious Rainbow trout and organic watercress! That is why we’ve created several tasty pre-sale packages to whet your appetite and appeal to any budget. On the low end, a $10 pledge earns our thanks and gives you the satisfaction of supporting the local food movement on Maui. Perks that include perishable food must be picked up at specific times/places on the island of Maui. We are also offering shipping anywhere in the world with perks that reflect the extra handling and shipping. Check the list on the right for the full menu.

The Impact

Hawaii, and the world, needs new sources of healthy, sustainable fish. This project will help lead the way to an entirely new industry here on Maui and will provide a springboard for generations of new farmers to join in. 

Risks & Challenges

This is an entirely unique new venture and we face no local competition. The biggest risk we see ahead is a potentially destabilized economy. We may not be as wildly profitable as expected. But people still need to eat and our team is prepared to tighten our belts, dig in and hunker down for the long haul.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you support sustainable and regenerative practices and the local food movement in Hawai’i and beyond, please support this project by pledging what you can and sharing the campaign on social media and through whatever organizations you are affiliated with. Together, we can set an example.

Mahalo Nui Loa for your support.
